this stuff really does work  on some situations it works overnight and other situations it may take one to three days  and thats still not a long time  i had a pimple or two that popped while washing which was an accident  it ended spreading into a few more pimples and i think it became infected  it looked just horriblei was desperate for something stronger to put on it  i read about bye bye blemish and majority of the reviews were good  to my surprise that situation on my face looked better within a few hours  overnight it looked even better  within a couple of days it was completely gonei think it was infected because as the bbb was drying it out the pus would really ooze out  it was disgusting  after all of the pus finished oozing out within a day or so it just dried up and shrunk away  i was so happy id never seen anything like it
summary: Yes It Does Work. Never Want To Be Without It Again

ive never had a pair of gloves specifically for moisturizing but these work nicely  the description makes it sound like they are impregnated with moisturizer but i think theyre just meant to keep your own moisturizer from getting on the bed sheets  the pink color is definitely girly and the fabric is a smooth cottonive used them several nights now and other than the unusual feeling of wearing gloves to bed i like them  they allowed me to use a thicker layer of cream on my hands than i normally would and helped my hands recover from the abuse of a day of washing dishes gardening carrying boxes up into our attic scrubbing the stains out of baseball pants etc  my hands take a beating every day and i appreciate having special gloves to pamper them at night  the size of these gloves is what i would call womens large  i have large hands and these fit me perfectlyi received a complimentary pair of bellesha ultra moisturizing hand gloves for testing and review purposes
summary: Helps moisturize hard working Mom hands

reviewText: its way too small and i do not have a lot of hair and still fit small i do not really like it did but its okay for the price i paid now belongs to my 3 year old daughter

i like the conair brush  it makes my skin feel cleaner and smoother  the build quality is very nice this brush feels solid  the brush is waterproof and can be used in the shower which is a great feature  the charging stand can be considered a good feature unless you already have a bunch of devces that need to be plugged into an outlet in your bathroom in which case an extra courd may not be all that welcome the latter is my case  the brush just vibrates the disk does not turn at all yet it seems to workalthough i like the conair brush i still prefer my rotary olay brush for the following reasons  first the rotary brush feels like it is scrubbing harder  second the smaller pads of the olay brush make it easier to use it on the upper lip under my nose and closer to the hair line  third i like smaller footprint of the olay brush and the fact it uses aa batteries  i put rechargeable batteries in the olay brush and i do not have to deal with that extra cord on my bathroom counter
summary: I like this brush but I prefer rotary ones with smaller pads.

first i want to get into the cons of this product and then get into my rave review there are only 2 bad things about this product one is that the marketing for it is terrible ive been searching for curling products for my hair for years almost obsessively everything from foams gels creams and sprays to wands irons and every curler or hot roller imaginable and never in all my searching did i hear a word about this product i only came across it by accident online while looking for something else the second bad things is the price this isnt redkin or chi or any high end hair product its some brand that most people have never heard anything about back to that lousy marketing thing yet they charge an insane amount for it for around 20 bucks you get 8 ounces which is less product than you get with any normal bottle of shampoo a lot less if you want the large bottle that comes with a pump youre paying around 50 bucks that is absolutely insane insanebut now on to the pros i have what i call naturally confused hair some days its curly sometimes its straight and poofy and other days i have big weird looking waves its very fine and thin and i normally have a hard time styling it in any way i love the look of curls though and as i said before i had been searching for years online and in stores for a product to help me easily create curls this product is not only great for getting rid of frizz if youre a curly haired girl but it creates curls if you arent a lot of people said this stuff works best if applied to a soaking wet head for me it is best on a slightly damp head i either let my hair mostly air dry or i spray with a spray bottle and then i put a crap ton of this stuff in my hair and scrunch ounce im happy with it i leave it alone doing my best not to touch it until its dry once its dry it feels crunchy and stiff but i scrunch it again and the stiffness turns into soft beautiful shiny natural looking curls not only does this product make my hair look gorgeous and give me a head full of curls that i wouldnt have otherwise but it takes no time to do it probably about 5 to 10 minutes and water reactivates it so if you get caught in the rain or have a beach day youre still left with your beautiful style this leaves people thinking your hair is naturally that curly and gorgeous i am literally throwing away all of my other curling or scrunching products or giving them to friends curl keeper is all that i need well and some water i dont even need a hair spray with this stuff its perfect for everyday use and you can put in a spray bottle or whatever you want which makes it super convenient for travel as far as the product itself goes it is perfect it goes above and beyond any expectations i just hate that they get away with charging so much for it for price alone i had to leave out a star

have you ever had stretch marks scars sunage spots psoriasis eczema or even just dry skinthan you have to check out this beauty product i actually never heard of rosehip seed oil until recently i did a little research and found out that its beneficial for all marks and  actually can make old marks even newer ones look less noticeable and diminishedi noticed how smooth it goes on and it feels just like an oil but doesnt leave a huge greasy feeling all you need is a little bit to get the perfect results it easily gets absorbed on the skin and you can be happy to know that your feeding the skinessential fatty acids  omega 6 3 and 9  it really does feel great and makes you look your best while it works to heal your skin problemsa terrific product for everyone who wants to repair their skin
summary: Fix Your Skin With This Miracle Product!

this heavy cream is the best conditioner ever i have curly coarse hair and i also relax my hair black american the conditioner makes my hair so soft and full of life a couple of months ago i had a lapse in judgment and decided to try a different product with keratin in it and it completely fried my hair i couldnt even run my fingers through my hair and it felt like straw finally after about a couple of months i wised up to the fact that the new shampoo and conditioner was causing the problem with my hair so with my hair heavily damaged i decided to try this shampoo and conditioner again to see if it could repair my damaged hair and im so happy my hair is soft again and very healthy i can run my fingers through it again i will never try a different product because nothing works as well as this and it smells really good i shampoo and condition in the shower and i leave this product on my hair for about 15 mins also use the the shampoo with this product for best results my daughters hair is very coarse and it feels very soft after using this product

i love this brush  firstly the packaging was very hygenic and it shipped very quickly  i had never heard of beauty junkees until i mentioned to a colleague that i needed to buy some extra brushes i was told that there was a brush out there that was much cheaper than the brush i was using by much i mean a lot   good quality nonshedding brushes are important to me because i am a makeup artist  i highly recommend this brush company beauty junkees to anyone but mostly to all aspiring mua trying to build their kit  i first used it with liquid because i wanted to see how well it blend and not make creases more pronounced and i was very impressed it worked just as well as a brush i paid 3x more for  i decided to clean the brush and let it dry to see how well it worked with powders  they indicate on the packing that you can use it for multiple purposes and i wanted to put it to the test  i am very pleased with my purchase  i concealed under eye discoloration and made bags disappear used liquid to create precise contouring used it as a brow highlighter above the cupids bow highlighting and much more  again i cannot speak highly enough of this product and will probably do a youtube review because i think the brush is just that good  i will definitely be purchasing a few more brushes from this company

i have very sensitive fair skin and living in las vegas sunscreen is my best friend out of the tube i was nervous that the sunscreen would look ridiculous on my face because it was so dark but it felt silky and smooth to the touch it applies like mysmashbox jumbo photo finish foundation primer 2 value 2 oz original in a tubewhich is smooth and feels great there is no smell which i love and it blended into my skin and didnt look too dark it provided a nice coat on my skin and the application was great with a matte finish it definitely isnt my color and i would never feel comfortable putting it on and going to work but for a day in the sun it works wonderfullyit did slightly sting my skin when i put it on but all sunscreens do it did a great job protecting my skin as i was in the water for a part of the day i reapplied after every 90 minutes the recommend every 120 minutes and i did not burn comparatively i think this product is fairly priced i would purchase it for my summer sunscreenfoundation if the color matched my skin because i wouldnt need to add anything but concealer as it has a matte finish to it and provides all the coverage i need i wish they offered a light color but as it is i will continue to use this product on the weekends  i love it

reviewText: the first thing i noticed is this shampoo doesnt create tons of lather so dont expect that  fine with me as long as it works  i skip regular conditioner and use it with the its a 10 leavein spray plus keratin  i can easily go an extra day between shampoos with this product

reviewText: after doing a lot of research and seeing everyones positive results i decided to order this product  i have had moderate acne for about 10 years  i am 25  finally in the last 6 months it had gone away except for the occasional break out  however i was still left with scarring  i followed the directions and applied the product  the burning wasnt as bad as i expected it to be i took 2 advil about a half hour before i applied the solution and also used a fan  i put on two layers  i peeled and healed nicely  there were a few days that itched pretty bad and were tight but that is normal  i used emu oil as a moisturizer and suki moisturing cleanser and washed 2x a day  once my face had healed it looked better than it ever had i was so excited  but then about two days after i was completely healed i had horrible purging acne as bad or worse than it has ever been in my whole life  i contacted the sellers of this product for help and they were awesome at giving me adviceprompt shipping too  im a little leary to use this product again because now my face looks as bad as it did before the peel after the 20 breakouts i had right after all at the same time but people say the purging is suppose to get better after the first couple times  i want to try it again just dont want to go through a full week of down time to have no results  ill update if i do again  just use caution if you have a history of acne
summary: Use caution if you suffer from Acne

reviewText: first off id like to say i was scared to but this product because of the reviews i have had lots of problems with nail hardeners in the past however i am thankful i bought it anywayi have the sensationail starter kit and using their cleanser and lamp i apply a coat or two of this when i use this with gel polish i like it because it keeps my natural nails protected underneath when i use this with actual nail polish i  find that for me it helps keeps it on longer then i use a non acetone remover to remove just the polish and just refill the gel as neededoverall i love it because it keeps my natural nails from breaking as im growing them and taking care of them now as far as any added health for my nail i havent noticed much of a difference i mostly use cuticle balms and oils to help with that since i have peeling nails however if you looking for something to help your nails stay hard i would use super thin coats of this
summary: Peeling? What peeling??? Love this stuff.

i really wasnt even sure what a bb cream was until i started researching after i received ponds luminous finish bb complimentary from influenster for testing purposes bb creams are short for beauty or blemish balms i was hesitant at first thinking that it wouldnt provide much coverage but i was wrong i still have to use a concealer for my dark circles but overall ponds luminous finish bb provides enough coverage for the rest of my face alone it gives a dewy look without looking cakey or heavy it spreads evenly and has a smooth texture it claims to visibly fade dark spots i have a few small dark spots and since using this product for almost 2 weeks and i already see them slightly fading i was pleasantly surprised that it smelled more like a scented lotion than makeup the sunscreen aspect of it is nice but i really dont need it i dont spend much time outdoors i would recommend this product to anyone looking for lightweight coverage and to even out their skin tone i am pleased with it and will be a regular user

i just receive this and put it on last nighta couple of months ago i realized that i had somehow neglected my poor aging skin to the point of it being a big parched wrinkly mask not pretty with makeup on and i didnt know what to do ive always had nice skin save for the adult acne i have been battling for 15 years i perused amazon and found some good items to start with they totally helped but this mask was on my wish list i decided to go ahead and still buy it even though my dry skin was no longer an issueit took a while to get here though i received it nearly a month after my initial purchase even though most of my amazon korean purchases have had super fast shippingso after i put it on it does have a slight sticky gellike feeling but nothing annoying i woke up not feeling like i really had a mask on and after i washed my face i couldnt believe my eyes i used my toner then my moisturizer and then my foundation primer and then my foundation the difference was amazing it wasnt just moisturei had greatly reduced pore size and even my nasty chin breakouts were very much calmed i actually felt like i had a flawless finish before i would see my large pores through the foundation primer the makeup  the setting powder but today i cant see the finelines large pores or many of my acne scars that were so large and red just days ago i better order more so that by the time it finally gets here it will be time to need more d

i bought this brush just over two years ago through publishers clearing house of all places  i was tired of the weak handled soft bristled brushes that you can find at any department store  i was always breaking the handle of those brushes because i was pressing so hard because the bristles were too soft broke about 1 per month  i use this brush in the shower to scrub my back lower legs and feet i have a narrow shower stall and a bad back and i can tell the difference in my skin when i dont use the brush  the bristles are a perfect blend of firm closer to the handle and stiffer towards the end of the brushi just broke the handle of this brush recently and went into a panic to find a replacement  i am so glad that amazon carries it  i was beginning to make plans to frankenstein this one back together using pvc pipehmmm still might do that to have it as a backup

ladiesfriendsthis is best thing since spanx  i decided to learn how to apply gel nails myself and order gel polish and a gel lamp  the lamp was defective so now i had to send it back which means a delay in this project  but i tried this opi bond aid since hearing about it on the internet with just regular nail polish  well this is now the 5th day and there is no chipping or peeling  i did also apply sally hansen mega shine and this also helps apply the following day manicure  i even washied dishes and still it looks good  if you are one of those people who have reactions to acetone and so cant have acrylic or gel nails applied  this product will help  ps make sure you pick a superior nail polish or nail lacquer that also helps  i will still wait for the lamp to do gel nails but at least i have options if i dont want to do gel nails  i would definitely recommend this to anyone  if you are a diy person then take the plunge  best wishes

i am approaching 50 years old but look much younger id like to keep it that way and so to fight some signs of aging i decided to try this product here are my findings the cord is awkward and doesnt stay in well while in use i have to unplug and replug it into the unit repeatedly throughout a treatment to keep the unit on the light that indicates when to move to another section on the face only works sometimes i do understand that for the indicator to work you need to keep all posts on the face since i did like the results i got i figured id overlook that since found i could easily gage when to move when i started feeling a bit of warmth when i first started using it id get red rough patches on my skin a day or so later the company suggested i use more prep gel the prep gel is very expensive and you do have to use a fair amount that did resolve the issue thoughfor results id give this 4 stars for the machine itself issues with it and the high price of the gel it gets 2 this is how i cam to three stars for this review

first review i have used this twice and have had no irritation or bad reaction i put it on dry clean skin and it seemed to dry fast and feel tight on my skin like some serums do not my favorite serums by the way i waited a bit then put on my usual moisturizer  the first time i used it in the day time then saw on the box that it makes your skin sun sensitive so from now on ill use it at night only the second time i used it it didnt seem to feel as tight and who knows why on that one ill continue to use nightly and see if i can see any results i have to mention that i dont have problem skin  only 76 year old skin  never had acne no scars not wrinkled except for lines around my mouth and underneath where the sagging has occurred  ill continue to use it and report more later a few days later it no longer feels dry and tight when i put it on clean dry skin it feels nice since ive been using this smoothing fluid along with the eraser cream i cant really tell which one is making the difference but i can definitely see a difference in less than a week the pores seem smaller and my skin is tighter and has a sort of glow that it didnt have before im going to keep using and monitoring and see what happens i think it is probably this smoothing fluid that is responsible for the improvement in my skinfinal review after about 3 weeks i feel like this is drying my skin and it looks duller to me im going to stop using it
summary: Final impression: Doesn't work on my skin

im a natural redhead but i dyed my hair brunette throughout high school and i tried going blonde this past spring but it didnt work out so well i wanted to go back to red based on the models photo this henna dye seemed to match my roots so i decided to try it i whipped it up with a metal whisk in my kitchenaid to avoid chunks and added two tablespoons of extra virgin olive oil and an egg for moisture i left it in for almost twelve hours before rinsing it out and was very happy with the end product the blonde is now gingery autumn virgin red like how my roots aremake sure you have your own gloves on hand as the ones provided are flimsy and difficult to manage rinse in the sink first before bathing if you dont want plant matter that does stain to ruin your shower make sure you use plenty of good conditioner the first few days i like giovannis smooth as silk and v05s strawberries and cream dont shampoo until after day three and use sulfatefree shampoo as well blow dry it after the first few washes to help set the colour also it does have an earthy scent that reminds me a bit of spinach and hay but it fades pretty quickcheers
summary: Wanted to Get My Natural Hair Colour Back

reviewText: the nexcare acne covers seem to work some of the time but not in every caseif you have a visibly mature pimple applying one of these covers over it works perfectly fine within no time the cover absorbs it and the pimple is goneon pimples that are just below the skin not mature or just barely poking through they are pretty much useless at least on myself and another person who i had try themtwo things that i liked about them are one they stick and stick very well i applied one before i went to bed tossed and turned and it never came off they stick so well that you actually forget that its onthe other thing is that they do a great job coveringhiding the pimple so no one really knows youre wearing one or multipleso at the end of the day if you have a visible pus filled pimple these will work in a pinch for those pimples below the skin or just coming through youve got to wait for them to mature to apply one of these covers

i8217ll be honest here  i don8217t have a lot of dark spots or freckles to speak of on my face  outside of a few sunburns when i was very very young and dependent upon someone else to keep me sunsafe i8217ve tried to stay out of the sun and use sunscreen when that wasn8217t possiblewith that said i didn8217t think this product would make much of a difference in the way my skin looked  i was wrongfirst of all it8217s a fantastic moisturizer  most stuff just sits on my very oily skin and doesn8217t want to absorb  not so this my skin drinks it right up  it feels very light on with no greasiness at all  it lends an almost matte look to my skin that lasts a couple of hours  and with my super oily skin that8217s saying something  also it smells greatsecond while i don8217t have a lot of discoloration to fade i did notice that it made my skin almost glow  i don8217t know if this is a lasting effect or something in the product that deflects light normally these products use mica but since mica tends to really irritate my skin i don8217t think that8217s the case here  the amazon listing says that it will 8220reveal your most pearlescent beautiful skin8221 and that8217s the effect i8217m seeing  the product doesn8217t add any color at all trust me i8217d be able to tell but my skin has a lovely pearly sheen afterwardthe only downside is that it doesn8217t contain any sunscreen  i8217m fairly certain that a sunscreen would make it heavy and greasy feeling though  so i8217ve been using it at night and could see myself using it as a day cream under a foundation with at least spf 15for the price 2394 with amazon prime i will certainly use it again

i am a huge fan of essie nail polish and have many bottles when i saw this color i didnt hesitate its a gorgeous periwinkle blue with a hint of whitesilver shimmer if i use a base coat 2 coats of essie polish and a quick dry top coat such as seche vite my favorite my manicure lasts at least 10 days it may be a drugstore brand but id rather purchase essie over more expensive brands this color looks amazing with a tan or on ladies with a natural tandeep complexion loving this one

to start i have combination skin and occasionally have cystic acne breakouts despite being in my early 40s i was hesitant to try another face oil since in the past oils have caused major breakouts essentially ive fallen in and out of love with many an oilthis is actually one of the better oils out there i use it in place of moisturizer and i find it leaves my skin soft and supple without feeling greasy or clogging my pores and causing break outsdespite being a bit pricey the bottle is quite small you really do get your moneys worth with this productive found by applying one drop to my forehead and a drop on each cheek is more than enough to completely absorb into my skin and cover my entire face i simply place 3 drops in the palm of my hand and using my finger tab it on my face before rubbing it in it absorbs very quickly so you need to move fastit does have an herbal scent but it disappeared fairly quickly it doesnt smell great but its not offensive eitherwhile im head over heels for this oil i cant imagine ill be using it during the summer months  but for fall winter and spring this provides the perfect amount of hydration without greasy shiny skini highly recommend this im on my 2nd bottle and im still loving itif you find your skin feels to greasy youve used too much  just wipe it off and use less next time it takes a few tries to find the right amount for your skin but once you do heaven

faux boar bristles and a vented core recommend this brush i used this and it dried my hair faster at the roots and gave me more volume than my current styling brush however i did use my usual volumizer because my hair is finewhile this brush is nice it is also just average the charm is in the design

get your moneys worth out of this creamwhen it gets to the endcut the tube in half and you will have at lease three weeks  more applications of this product  works great for the cold dry climate of southern california  it keeps your face from becoming chapped in our dry santa ana winds  to applyrub the cream in the palm of your hand to get the cream  warm it makes it easier to smooth on your face
summary: Great product to protect your face from the dry cold winters

reviewText: edit i have recently stopped using both ponds cold cream and dermalogica multiactive toner as i felt like i was spending too much money and too much time futzing with those products my skin actually looks even better now which has led me to love this cleanser and the cerave lotion even more my routine is so simple now  cleanse and moisturize with cerave each morning apply my mineral powder makeup and then cleanse and moisturize with cerave each night i love how easily my makeup comes off and i am even happier with my skin now than ever before love the cerave brand and highly recommendthis is my favorite cleanser i have been using it twice daily for about six months so far and i absolutely love it i have red hair and fair sensitive skin i never used to have problems with my face  it was never oily or dry just normal with maybe a pimple or two every now and then but then about 23 years ago i am currently 22 years old fyi i started getting clusters of breakouts these were typically inflamed red pimples not whiteheads or blackheads and they occurred mainly on my forehead and chinmouth as well as occasionally onaround my nose i tried everything proactiv cetaphil neutrogena clean and clear aveeno clearasil burts bees skin id etc  these have contained salicylic acid benzoyl peroxide sulfur retinol witch hazel and tea tree oil and nothing cleared my complexion it was so frustrating then based on positive reviews on acneorg i decided to try out the cerave line i am so glad i did because i love it i still get occasional pimples but overall i have a clearer complexion i believe that all of the chemicals designed to get rid of acne were just too harsh for my skin so this gentle cleanser is perfect i use the hydrating cleanser morning and night every day and then follow it with a spritz of dermalogica multiactive toner also a lovely product in my opinion and a light layer of cerave lotion i also apply maybelline mineral powder foundation or when in a rush aveeno tinted moisturizer each morning and remove it each night with ponds cold cream before cleansing i love the cerave cleanser because it is not drying at all and it has truly reduced my acne i recommend it highly and plan to continue using it my only complaint and really this is just my own problem is that i often use quite a lot of the cleanser 35 pumps each time which means that i go through a bottle every few months still i feel thats a small price to pay for nice skin i love cerave and i hope you will give it a try and love it as well

the seller contacted me from my over all experience of the product i was more then happy to accept their help on sending me a different version of the product to see if it would conceal anything and from my experience id say its better it is not made for dark circles but if you have a light blemish the best thing to do is conceal with this and then blend your face foundation on it works better that way
summary: still is light but the coverage is alot better then before.

i dont have highly textured or african american hair i have irishredtype hair that can be a bit lank at times but i often find myself using shampoos that are marketed toward these generally dryer hair types because other shampoos are just soooo drying recently i tried one marketed as a hair milk and i liked that one quite a lot but i was afraid this one a rather thick gloop might be a bit muchi tried this a number of times and it actually seemed to be fine i just massage it in the roots of my hair only and then rinse it through i even tried it after not washing my hair for four days and i thought it would never get my hair clean and it felt a bit weird after my shower but that could have been from the weird homemade conditioning mixture i put on afterwards that included such things as aloe coconut oil and honey and i thought my hair might be a fright when it dried but actually the roots especially where silky clean and yet full of body once my hair was dry and not weighed down at all i think the trick is not to panic if your hair feels weird not squeaky clean after you wash out the shampoo and so dont just grab another shampoo and shampoo over this one but give it a chance

reviewText: this is a great little sunscreen stick you can carry with you without fear of spilling or making your bag too heavy even though its for babies we used it for the whole family it doesnt have a strong scent and no one was allergic to it so thats a plusmy only issue is its pretty thick when just rolling it on and it takes a lot of effort to rub in my son tried to rub it in but ended up still looking as if he had on white clown makeup when i tried to rub it in it took more force than he was comfortable with he is a young child but i would assume a baby would have even more trouble enduring the rubinwhile it seems like a good brand and did block the sun ill be sticking to the spray sunscreen ease of use is essential when dealing with small children simple fact my son would rather be sprayed than rubbed in ill be checking for a babyganics spray next time because otherwise we like the brand

i am not quite sure what this does but i think it strengthens your hair  i have been using it for a few weeks and feel it is helping my split ends to heal along with a protein treatment that i do once a month  its light weight and does not weigh the hair down  dont spray to much you only needs a light misting

first day i tried it i took a spoon full the taste is ok but the side effect is not too shabby my stomach was growling for days afterwards am trying to ease myself into it a little more now starting at 100mg but still causing some additional bathroom breaks per day have not really seen an improvement in my sleep or stress level but as i am stubborn i will keep taking it for a little longer and see if it helps will update if the situation should improve

as someone who usually gets professionally spraytanned i am proud to say i am saving more money than i could imagine using st moritz products i have used one bottle four times already and still have solution left i like to have full coverage so i apply it all over my body and have not had issues with it streaking i think it lasts about 46 days depending on how much you shower exfoliate etcpeople usually knew when i would professionally get spray tanned due to the noticeably dark contrast the next day st moritz has a beautiful natural tan appearance the product has impressed me thoroughlyi know that some people have said it makes them itch i did have a little bit of that but my issue was dry skin  application is a little tricky other than that i have continued to order this product to stock up on

so i personally used liquid foundation all my life and had heard so many things about bare minerals years ago i decided to try it  i am so glad i did i do not use anything else and have been trying to give my daughter samples here and there to see how she liked it so when i saw this i decided to give her a shot to go liquid makeup free  she is a little reluctant but once i explained the routine she was willing to give it a shot and she loves it too  great makeup shipped fast that is good for your skin why are you waiting to buy this
summary: Perfect way to start your new beauty routine!

reviewText: ok so i usually hesitate to put powder near my eyes in case it starts to crease or define wrinkles instead of covering them up  but this stuff i can put all around my eyes and it just makes it looked airbrushed  i think the hydrators in the powder make it work better than most powders ive tried  i love that each time you use it you turn the interior clockwise and just the right amount comes out  i used to use bare minerals and i felt like i was always wiping powder of one kind or another off of my counter clothes floor etc  this feature gives you fresh newly fluffed powder each time you use it and the wide mouth allows you to use a standard kabuki brush to use it  i like the brush they give you but its a little small for me unless im traveling  i love this powder and notice that the fair works with my skin yearround even when ive gotten a little more color from the sun
summary: Perfect powder - don't change a thing!

reviewText: i must say that i am a huge product especially makeup junkie and i could not wait to get this i previoiusly used skindinavia dance and i loved it while it wasnt a hg of makeup finishesit was pretty closewith me having very very very oily i can actually push oil out of the pores of my nose and faceyuck acne prone skin dance held my makeup consistently for about a good 45 hours and after about 67 hours some sliding would occur but there were times where i would fall asleep in my makeup and when i awoke in the morning it was still in place for the most part and not on my pillow or sheets but alas this review is not about dance its about about the bridal makeup finish and with the description listed i was getting really excited because i thought it would be even better than dance but that is not beseriouslydo not waste your money with this onestick to either dance or cool which i havent tried cool but its description is very similar to dance  with all that said i am going to give it one more try when i go back to using my makeup forever mattifying foundation as it may be the foundation i was using this with classified era r9 and thats a whole nother reviewlolbut ironically i found that the classified era foundation makeup lasted longer when i didnt spray this onso i will provide an update

reviewText: this remington dryer is very powerful  does a great job at drying your hair quickly  it has 3 heat levels  cold shot  2 power settings it comes with a concentrator  you can send for a diffuser  i use neither because i find that the narrow opening on the dryer is sufficient to concentrate the blower  thus i cannot comment on the accessoriesconsidering the amount of air that is pumped through the dryer the dryer is pretty lightweight  my small hand is comfortable wrapped around the handle  my fingers are not long enough to overlap the handle so i do not accidentally trip any of the rockerstyle switches the cord is a pretty typical length  is sufficiently long to maneuver the blower around  under my headthe downside is that the dryer is loud very loud perhaps this is the tradeoff for a noncommercial dryer that pumps out lots of air  the volume hasnt stopped me from using the dryer on a daily basisi cannot buy into the keratin claim so cannot comment on this marketing claim  i do not notice that my hair is any shinier or any different than it was before i started using the dryeras an efficient blow dryer this remington is 5 stars  dinged 1 star because it is loud

i now use this soap on areas of my body that have gotten to much sun shouldersarms to even out my skin it works well for that at first i used it all over and it made my skin very dry and flaky that was the soap working if it is going to lighten the skin the skin must peel off the old dry skin it does just that i cant use this on my face because it dries it out too much but it works good for spot treatments
summary: Good for small areas of the body.

reviewText: i really love the combination of a gel and cream in one container it seems silly but it does make my bedtime routine just a bit quicker which i appreciate both the gel and the cream are lightly scented and not overpowering there was improvement in skin texture and brightness but not quite enough to take care of the deeper wrinkles on my upper inner lids ill continue to use this product and will likely repurchase
summary: Light scent, feels great....not quite as "lifty" as I'd like

reviewText: this razor has 5 blades and a built in shaving gel  the razor head is really too big now and didnt get into tight places  my son said he had to go back to using his smaller razor to get around his neck and ears because the head is so long it missed areas around mouth even with sticking his tongue in cheek he also didnt like the gel said it was goopy and left his skin feeling filmy  overall pass on this one and go with a 3 blade he likes thegillette mach3 sensitive disposable razor 6 countand i like thebic soleil twilight disposable razor triple blade  for women 4count

dove color care daily treatment conditioner promises to keep the users hair vibrant and to leave it soft smooth and radiant while it succeeds in producing some of these attributes it seemed to do no more than standard daily use conditioners for hair that has been colored  it is still a very good product for daily usethis product did not deliver either the promised shine or the conditioning benefits detailed in the product description while dove color care daily treatment conditioner did leave my hair soft and able to move freely it did nothing to control flyaway hair my hairstyle requires something that produces a sleek surface  dove color care daily treatment conditioner did not do so further my hair had no more shine that it usually hasa small amount of dove color care daily treatment conditioner was all that was needed i used about a tablespoon worth this product has a light sweet fragrance that is difficult to identify it seems to be a mixture of fruity and floral scents the fragrance used in dove color care daily treatment conditioner may cause problems for individuals who have or live with someone having allergiesunlike some other conditioners i have used dove color care daily treatment conditioner rinses cleanly from both hair and the floor surface of the showerbathtub overall dove color care daily treatment conditioner is a good conditioner for daily use
i bought this and i didint really believe it would work but it does after applying mascara i felt a real difference  will continue its use and i hope it will meet my expectation of a long term result

after using hs for many years i thought it was high time to try something else and see if i couldnt improve my current shampoo situation clear men scalp therapy sounded interesting so i figured what the heck  you get almost 11 ounces in this bottle which is a bit less than my current brandthe bottle is easy to grasp and manage in the shower without becoming slippery from the water and opening is a breeze thanks to the push down lid i found that while the consistency of this shampoo seemed a bit thin to me very little was actually needed to achieve a full head of suds and to clean my overly oily hair and scalpafter using clear men scalp therapy for 45 days i can happily report at least the same dandruff reducing results as i got my my mainstay head and shoulders but since the shampoo is apparently more concentrated i used less and it actually rinsed out fasteri wanted to try the clean  refresh variety and it feels both great to use and leaves a nice subtle scent as with all my other clear shampoo products this will leave your hair thoroughly cleaned but not oily feeling plenty of lather and an easy rinse off are what i have found to be the case with all the clear shampoos i have tried so far  i have tried and used 3 varieties they all smell good and not overpowering and they all get my hair very cleanbasically all the varieties of clear i have used employ a varying special formulation that includes tea tree among other ingredients some with conditioner some without now i am no expert but honestly my hair is much more manageable after a weeks use of clear brand shampoo as opposed to hs and the anti dandruff ingredients do the trick 100  give it a try i like it maybe you will too
summary: Clear Men Scalp Therapy does it again!

reviewText: i have used this product on both my son and daughter i like the fact that it does hair and body as trying to remind my son which bottle to use for were is a battle i dont want to both with it is also great when i am dealing with kids splashing and playing to just reach out and grab the bottle without worry about where it is for being a no tear product is great as then it can be splashed in water and as the water gets in the eyes it doesnt matter overall this is a great product and i would get it again i also like the sent it is a nice tangy scent and is neither girly or boy scent far to often i am tired of having my son bathed in berry fusion or something

this body wash is great  i have skin that dries out easily so during our michigan winters i usually splurge on a moisturizing body wash  this year instead i have been using neutrogena body oil after my shower  i use the oil right after i turn off the water before i get out of the shower  i stand for a minute to allow the oil to penetrate  with this method i do not need the extra moisture in a body wash  ive fallen in love with neutrogena products  ive seen rainbath at the pharmacy before but i finally bought some a few weeks ago and was instantly hooked  the scent is quite pleasant  people complain that it wears off too soon but i prefer a product with a scent that isnt so strong that you are stuck with it all day thats what perfume is for  i wish the body oil came in the same scent though  this body wash does not dry out my skin surprisingly and it leaves no residue  it is now my goto product for body wash

i love love love these eyeshadows they are perfect for creating nice nude smoky or day looks the eyeshadows are very pigmented so the color payoff is great and they are very easy to apply and blend i love the colors because they allow you to create nice daytime looks for work lunch etcand they also allow for great smoky night on the town looks to be created as well i would definitely buy this again for myself and for others as gifts
i like this but not enough to use it every day it doesnt really get hot enough to dry my medium length hair in a reasonable amount of time but its great to take on vacations
just love the smell of this soap its fantastic and didnt cost much at all i recommend it to all my frends
i bought a knock off blender sponge a while ago and it was falling apart  so i decided to splerge on this one  i dont know why i didnt buy this before  must purchase
if you need a cheap eye cream this one does a decent job of providing moisture i experienced no breakouts or irritation

i really like the double ended stamperit definitely picks up the images off of the stamping plates really well its also very easy to clean use  store the scraper is just sosoit scratches the stamping plates easily id actually recommend using an old plastic shoppers card such asa cvs or kroger plus card it would save your plates from the damaging effects of the metal scraper  its free ive got a plastic konad scraper but actually prefer to use my old kroger plus card the shipping was fast on the konad kit  the price was fair so id still recommend it

i think i have probably tried every motions product that amazon offers and thats been at least 15 i can say that only one a wash out conditioner left my hair caked with product and dry as ever i think its time to give up on motions and realize that it not for my hair and try to find something else that works

i try to set aside some time once a week for a facial mask  its usually considered 8220gross8221 by my kids which results in 15 minutes of quiet time for mommy  im thrilled if the mask provides additional benefits like smoother clearer skin  unfortunately origins clear improvement is not the mask for mei have combination skin oily in the tzone and normal on my cheeks  the mask is a very unappetizing color not that im eating the mask but in the fluffy frilly world of cosmetics the black color is somewhat unappealing  that said the color is exactly what i would expect from a charcoal maskorigins instructions are to use this once a week or as often as needed by opening your pores with warm moist towel and layering the mask on  this is what i did although instead of rinsing the mask i wiped it away with a wet washcloth after allowing it to dry for 15 minutesat which point my face has been shrinkwrapped by the product  my skin feels really tighti really cant comment on the removal of toxins but the deep dwelling porecloggers let me address that  my expectation was that blackheads would magically disappear and with any luck large pores might shrink note these are my words not origins and this was just part of my interpretation of the benefits of the mask  but here8217s what really happened8230after i used the mask once i found a rather large clogged pore on my cheek  this may not have been due to the mask but it was something id never experienced before but i wasnt ready to give up8212yet  the next week i gave my face an up close and thorough examination before and after using the mask  this time after the mask i noticed a very large blackhead on my cheek that wasnt there before the maskat this point any sane person would have said 8220this just isnt the mask for me8221  but im not sane i pressed on and havent had any more clogged pores but weeks later im still battling that first clogged pore  i do believe that some of the 8220deepdwelling porecloggers8221 are being drawn to the surface but in my case they arent being 8220drawn out8221  the mask has done nothing for the blackheads around my nose  my pores dont look any smaller  i do like smoother feel to my skin after the maski really want to love this product but i cant  i realize that the clogged pores and new blackheads may not have been due to the mask but i didnt have these rather large problems prior to using the mask its just not for me

i received 2 perfective ceuticals antiimperfection eye therapy cream from perfective ceuticals i loved this cream so much i used it as soon as i received it this was the perfect eye cream for me since i experience mild stress and insomnia i have been using this cream for about a month now and i definitely see a change in the skin around my eyes i apply a pea sized amount around my eye twice daily i give it a good five minutes to sink into my skin before putting on my normal face lotionsince beginning to use the antiimperfection eye therapy cream i have noticed how much my skin has gotten tighter and softer the little bit of lines that i had are completely gone my skin feels so soft and moisturized i really think this product works and i would recommend it to all my friends and family

my boys love axe products the spray in particular i think the spray is too strong and can smell it long after they have left the house i bought them this hoping it would keep them from using the spray it smells nice strong but it doesnt linger forever if they use this they dont layer with the spray thank heavens it has a clean manly aroma smells like a clean guy should but isnt overpowering i can tolerate it and it does not trigger a migraine in me it seems to lather well and rinse clean without leaving a film on the skin we will keep buying it

i absolutely love this oil  i use it after showering and the softness it leaves behind is astounding  ive used many other oils and lotions many of which i thought were excellent but this leaves them in the dust  the moisturizing it creates is not just on the surface and not greasyoily  once it absorbs the skin is remarkably soft and smooth  the scent is heavenly and you can still detect it even 24 hours later  one thing you should be aware of if you buy it is that the oil hardens at around 70  72 degrees fahrenheit  the bottle says 68 degrees but i think its a little higher than that  its easy and fast to melt it back to an oil though  just set it near a heat vent or take it in the hot shower with you  there is one thing i would change about this product  it needs a squeeze cap  its too easy to overpour into your hand with just the regular cap it has

out of the multiple brands of moisturizing facial sunscreen ive used this is one of my favoriteslikes light but not runny soaks in quickly packaging  great little flat squeeze bottle with a top that screws on securely  very compact and good for traveldislikes scent is nice but maybe a bit powerful to me  i asked a friend and they liked the scentother thoughts luminous  i tested the claim of illuminating minerals by putting this on half of my face waiting 30 minutes then asking someone which side they thought looked different and how  the side i put the lotion on was a bit glossier  not shiny or full gloss but just a very slight satin sheen small amount of lotion  this is only 17 oz 50 ml of lotion  i like the size for travel though and it does go a long way
summary: Nice light moisturizing sunscreen w/ excellent packaging

reviewText: from reading other reviews i knew this lamp didnt have a fan but a fan isnt needed for shellac uv polish and thats what i was using it for  i did my fist ever shellac manicure at home today and this lamp worked awesome  all the bulbs work the timer is super handy has an onoff switch for timing other than 2 minute increments and costs less than 30  i think this is a perfect shellac curing lamp for the perfect price  if you need a lamp with a fan or with a timer that does increments other than 2 minutes then youll have to buy a different lamp  but this one works perfect for what i need it for and id recommend it to anyone using it for diy shellac manicurespedicures

suave professionals moroccan infusion deep conditioning shine mask was a solution i tried after using the shampoo from suave professionals which i recently reveiwedi expected a very good result after applying this which was my solution to the continuing sage of my terribly damaged oldperson who started dyeing her hair for the heck of it way too young because she was foolish long yet questionable attempt at repairing what some call their crowning glory you want to know what i look like now dont you relax i look a 61 year old bleached scraggly haired regular person who will not give upso i applied a good amount of this i needed more product you know and waited the requisite time you are only supposed to need to use this mask two times a week i need it around every five minutes either that or it just does not work for me big disappointment as a more product needed solution to the shampooif i could recommend a product which works better for me than both this the suave professionals moroccan infusion deep conditioning shine mask  and the shampoo it would be this suave moroccan infusion moroccan argan styling oil i have a review over there of iti dont know what your hair problem is but mine is very dry hair using that suave argan oil not this helps mebest wishesjean

i purchased this flat iron to replace the chi that i had that broke after 3 years of use as far as straightening goes the hsi straightens as well as the chi the result is very silky straight hair with no frizz whatsoever with that being said there are some flaws that i cant seem to overlook one the straightener does not get hot even at the hottest setting i could overlook this since it seems to do the job somehow without getting too hot my chi got so hot that i couldnt even touch my hair a few seconds afterwards because it was so hot to the touch that may be a downside to some people but for me thats the job of a flat iron two the indicator light is virtually useless it should turn from orangered to green when the iron is at the desired heat setting but it constantly switches from red to green for no apparent reason even if it is laying flat on a surface it is constantly switching from red to green and i never know if the heat setting is right this makes me think this is either a defect or that it doesnt maintain the heat setting in addition it takes forever for it to get hot and add that to the problem of not knowing if its ready and the whole process becomes annoying what was the deal breaker for me is how this flat iron tugs at my hair my head is still hurting from using it if you can overlook these things then maybe its worth the purchase because its so much cheaper than the chi but i use my iron everyday day twice a day so i want the product to be near perfect my chi was near perfect until it broke on me of coursei honestly dont know how it got such high ratings because you really are paying for what you get yes it does the job but it sacrifices so many little things

i have very long naturally curly hair and last week got the second worst haircut of my life the only solution while waiting for the chunks yes chunks to grow out and blend with the ends was to flat iron itthe women at my local beauty supply suggested this redken product  oh my god  instead of just lying flat as it does when i just wash condition dry and flat iron it my hair got fat  and not in a good or funky wayalso the bottle does not spray evenly but drips and drizzles and the product no matter how little i use makes my hair sticky  its three oclock in the morning and fiftyeight degrees in my house but im about to wash it because i just cant stand the stickiness and the smell i didnt mention that this stuff smells like a beauty salon so i smell like chemicals rather than my perfumeive always respected redken  not anymore  im just going to wash condition use infusium 23 leavein and then when im done if i need something for the ends ill use either silk or soy renewal  im returning the redken this morning as soon as the shop opens

reviewText: this brush is excellent in terms of not tangling or tearing hair  the bristles are not too sharp  its comfortable to hold and its sturdy  but it does not work well with my hair  i have shoulderlength fine thick slightly wavy hair  each strand of hair is small in diameter but i have a lot of it  it needs to be blowdried if i dont want it to be a combination of flat and frizzy the bristles on this brush glide right through my hair as a comb does  they do not grip my hair firmly enough to create the tension necessary for styling or to hold my hair firmly enough to remove frizz  there might be too few bristles for my hair or perhaps the bristles are too short  a standard drugstore boarbristle round brush is much more effective for my hairin many ways its a nice brush and on my budget im disappointed when i buy a product that doesnt work for me but after several months of trying to use this i had to throw it out  it was that unhelpful  for coarser hair than mine which would be most hair or for hair that is naturally straight it might be perfect
summary: Does not work well with my fine hair

reviewText: these remover pads work well and get off the old mascara eyeliner shadow etc you have to use quite a few of them to remove all of your eye makeup if you use several products on your eyes i would love to have a product that would remove the eye makeup with just a couple of pads these pads are good but before my eyes are clean i have to use five or six of them thats my only complaint they dont irritate the eyes

my favorite lotion is simple  it is not greasy has no fragrance and absorbs quickly and easily  that hits all the right notes for me  simple protecting with spf 15 hits most of those notes as well  it does not feel greasy and absorbs quickly so i dont feel like im covered in slime  unfortunately the spf ingredient is harsher than that in products like cetaphil  it clashes with the simple philosophy bringing a strong chemical fragrance that lingersstill it is a lotion that i would consider for outdoor activities  i might use something else on my face but the quick absorption makes this an ideal hand andor body lotion

reviewText: the reasons i prefer it over others may be the exact reasons it is not everyones favorite it goes on cleanly  no clumps or bulkiness because its waterproof it doesnt uncurl otherwise straight lashes that you just curled with an eyelash curler it doesnt flake off into my eyes during the day the shorter brushes on the wand make the mascara a lot easier to apply to your lashes and avoid brushing onto your skin inexpensive enough that you dont mind replacing it every three months like you are supposed toi want my lashes to be visible but look natural  this mascara is not for tammy faye bakers of the worldaddendum 42013  just bought a tube at walmart today and paid almost 2 more for it than it is selling at amazon

reviewText: this is a pretty cool contraption  it has a nice quality feel and heft to it yet not too heavy  there is a smooth surface for the controls but the rest of it is coated in that nice silicone veneer like modern cellphones  ive never accidentally dropped this item1  the 3 included blades attach and detach very easily2  im not big on reading instructions but with this little high tech hair gizmo id highly recommend it  there are a a few electronic features that you just dont find on standard hair clippers3  the settings screen is very easy to read even outside in the middle of the day4  the power adjustment of the clipper length is super easy and very precise much more precise than i personally need it to be  it can flip back and forth between mm and barber   the switch lock keeps it in place so you dont accidentally change it while youre cuttingespecially due to my youngest kids aversion to getting his hair cut its takes a lot longer to cut his hair with all the pauses and theres a lot more of it  also since his hair was so long it frequently clogged the clippers and i had to remove his hair from between the attachment blades to keep going  i was able to comfortably get two full haircuts on my 2 kids spaced 2 weeks apart off one initial charge with a little left over  one has fine hair and the other coarse hairbonus  the charger is great its rated at 1 amp fast but has a little plastic tab so you can only use it for the clipper  however if you dont care about warranty itd be pretty easy to shave off the tab and use it as a charger that works on any minihdmi input device  also it comes with an additional standard usb to minihdmi cable so you could charge this clipper from your computer if you want to  maybe remington should have called this an iclipper o
summary: Uses mini-HDMI connection to charge up.  Comes with cable AND an additional charger.

reviewText: i love adovia products when i came across the mineral eye gel i jumped at the chance to try the product out at 23 my skin is not where i want it to be so i do like trying different products in hopes of finding the miracle 8216fixitall8217 type of product unfortunately i have recently come to the conclusion that there will never be a miracle 8216fixitall8217 product however i have discovered different products that work exactly like they say they are supposed to adovia mineral eye gel is definitely one of those productsthe adovia mineral eye gel has helped to significantly reduce puffiness and the dark circles underneath my eyes of course if i would just go to bed earlier i probably wouldn8217t have the dark circles issue however i8217m on a 8216stayuplatesleeplate8217 schedule and it can8217t be changed at the moment so using the adovia mineral eye gel has helped to make it look like i8217m not so exhausted all the time the mineral eye gel contains dead sea salt which has so many benefits it also contains vitamin c which will deliver powerful antioxidants deep into skin cells my skin is feeling very moisturized around my eyesthere really is no scent to the mineral eye gel so you don8217t need to worry about there being any irritating scents around your eyes the gel is smooth and easy to apply 8211 you only need a tiny dab so the container will last you for a really long time for me at least there is a 8216cooling8217 affect when i apply it i liked it because it kind of woke me up in a sensedo you want to erase the dark circles and reduce the puffiness underneath your eyes try adovia mineral eye gel you will not regret it if for some odd reason you are not happy with the product then adovia will give you your money back no questions askedi did receive advoia mineral eye gel in exchange for my honest opinion if i did not like the product i would tell you that but i did truly love the product
summary: Skin is feeling moisturized and puffiness is reducing!

i have been wanting a clarisonic for years but couldnt justify the price im an endurance swimmer and i have to put tons of sunblock on my face to keep myself from getting hyperpigmentationage spotswrinklescancer so when i get out of the pool i really like to have something that gets all the sunblock and chemicals off my skin and out of my pores im the kind of person that likes squeaky clean skin on my facewhen olay introduced their own version of the skin brush system i eagerly jumped on board i have been using the olay brush daily for a few years now and i definitely noticed an improvement in my skin but i always wondered if the clarisonic was better and this year i finally got one for christmas thanks mom  and the clarisonic is better much better the major difference is that the clarisonic doesnt spin it vibrates when i first turned on the clarisonic i was actually put off by this surely it couldnt do as good of a job cleaning my skin as a brush that spunbut after using the clarisonic i get it its a completely different clean its still very vigorous but instead of just sort of going over the skin like the olay brush i could feel it getting into my pores and it really feels wonderful its like a massage its just a whole different experience its relaxing and soothing as well as cleansing you can feel the blood rushing to your skin in response to the clarisonic the key is to let it dance over your face if you push it into your skin like i was tempted to do it wont clean as wellthe brush is also much larger which makes it easier to cover your entire face and neck in a smaller amount of timewhen i got out of the shower my skin was glowing i put my regular skin cream on and i could literally feel it going into my skin as opposed to just sliding it over my skinim not one to go on and on about skin care or products related to skin care but wow im totally a convert i went ahead and ordered a few different brushes mine came with the sensitive brush and i wanted to test out the deep pore cleaning brush as well i feel like this is more of a treatment or an experience than just another product you useas far as ease of use the clarisonic is a very simple setup it comes with a simple magnetic charger that will charge the brush for 1520 uses so if you are using the clarisonic once a day youll only have to charge the brush twice a month when you first get the clarisonic you charge it for 24 hours the charger is simple its a magnetic clip that attaches to the bottom of the brush the brush handle sort of pulls it into place  no bricks or weird cables or anything it literally just sticks magnetically to the bottom of the brush in the right spot after the first full charge you unclip the charger and bring the brush into the shower with you or wherever you do you your cleansing routine the brush is fully waterproof and is charged for about 1520 uses you dont have to keep charging this brush every time you use it when the battery starts to lose charge you bring it back out to the charger and clip it on and let it charge again no batteries to change like the olay just keep the charger out of moisture and youre setthe brushes are supposed to last for about three months if kept clean rinse well after using they are a much higher quality than the olay brushes just make sure you get them from clarisonic because there are a lot of knock offs on the market in clarisonic packaging and ive come to learn that they are not the sameim pretty excited about it if you cant tell it feels like such an indulgence im completely bummed that i didnt get one before now but im so happy that i finally have oneif you are considering an upgrade from a drugstore system or just considering purchasing a clarisonic as a starter system go for it if you know youll use the brush its a good investment it really does make a difference and it feels wonderful on your skin

i bought this cocoa butter from the coastal scents website the first time i purchased it jan 2013 it was a large 17oz slab of pure cocoa butter it smelled like nutty chocolate like you could taste it it was light brown and rock hardi used my first batch in my shea mixes with some oils you need to have a lot of shea and oils to soften coca butter otherwise your finished product will be rock hard and impossible to use asis this was frustrating for me and caused me to avoid using the rest of the cocoa butter until recently now i figured out a good cocoa to oil ratioi purchased my second slab during their 50 off sale last month i am highly disappointed the slab reads 16ounces but it is much smaller in size to my first order slab my first order was much thicker and larger also i noticed they raised the prices by almost 3 since my first order jan 2013 i only paid around 6 because of the half off sale but if the prices keep raising this way the cocoa butter would be in the 20 range in a matter of monthsi think thats rather ridiculous it seems to be good quality but not worth the price for me since i only use it for my shea mix which i make once a year in winter i dont really need it since i prefer shea anyway i would not repurchase
summary: Good quality but not worth the price raise and smaller sizing.

i didnt wear foundation for most of my adult life as i was blessed with great skin and usually only wore powder on my forehead for shine control now however at age 60 i need a bit more coverage due to sunage spots ive tried quite a few face powders and found some okay for shine control but not for coverage or okay for coverage and not for shine controli recently picked up this talcfree mineral face powder from physicians formula at the drug store i got it in sand beige the compact is deeper and heavier than the other compacts ive tried it has a small brush and a mirror under the powder if you flip the compact all the way open imho the brush is pretty much useless due to its small size but its nice that they included onei was immediately won over by the opening mechanism of the compact you push a button at the front of the compact and the compact opens quickly and cleanly every time considering how much time i have wasted wrestling with opening various brands of face powder this was wonderfulthe powder has a silky and very fine texture it contains a broad spectrum spf 16 sunscreen which is a nice feature i lightly twirl my brush in the powder it doesnt take muchand then sweep it over my face it provides great shine control and some coverage in evening my skin tone but not nearly as much as thephysicians formula mineral airbrushing loose powder spf 30 translucent light  035 ozwhereas the loose powder burned my eyes horribly i mistakenly used an eye makeup remover pad on part of my face where the powder was and then swept it across my eye to remove my eye makeup the pressed powder doesnt bother methis powder helps me feel polished protected and shine free recommended
summary: Great shine coverage mineral face powder with SPF 16.

there are three new vaseline total moisture lotions  cocoa radiant pure oat and aloe freshthis cocoa radiant lotion comes in a brown bottle  it is very creamy with petrolatum and has a tropical redolence of cocoa and shea butters very summery  this is the one to choose for massages or to soothe very dry damaged skin and prevent it from looking ashy or chalky  it also softens cuticles and problem areas like the heels and soles of the feetthealoe freshin the green bottle is the lightest and it absorbs quickly into the skin without any noticeable residue just leaving the skin feeling smooth and refreshed  it has a clean vegetal smell of aloe and cucumber with enough sweetness to hint at honeydew melon  this version is excellent for routine maintenance of normal skin and is so mild that it could even be used on the face after sun exposurethepure oatversion in the yellow bottle has oat straw extract  it has a light sweet scent vaguely reminiscent of oats or wet hay inoffensive but not particularly appealing to me  it takes a little longer to massage into the skin and leaves that i just applied lotion feeling not greasy but with a protective coating  this version is ideal for the hands after washing dishes or to apply to the knees and elbows after bathingall three of these vaseline lotions serve a purpose but the cocoa radiant is my favorite as it has a luxurious feel and smell
summary: Luxuriously creamy with a tropical cocoa butter scent

reviewText: my skin is normal to oily with dryness around my nose  i rarely breakout  my usual skin routine is to use something to even out the redness around my nose and to cut the shine on my forehead and nose  i actually do have a goto bb cream missha which can even out redness and stop shine  but i decided to test out this olay bb cream alone to see if it might live up to its own packaging hypebottom line no this did not work for mei have nc20nc25 skin tone  the olay bb cream fair to light seemed a good match  it iserrskin colored  sorry  i mean it is neither too pink too orange or too gray  it is a thin consistency that seems to get on everything you touch so i applied using a damp sponge  using this technique it actually gave ok coverage to even out the redness around my nose  at first it even seemed to mattify my forehead  it felt light but within hours before noon my face looked greasy and it even appeared i was a shade darker than usual  i cant stand moisturizers that feel heavythis bb cream is also heavily perfumed  my eyes were tearing as i applied it and i had to redo my mascarathis was no good for me  however in fairness this may be the right cream for someone else  id suggest trying to obtain a small sample first before you buy the entire product  but keep in mind there are much better choices out there

reviewText: this ad contains a completely untrue statement this sets full nail designs are the biggest available guaranteed they are long and wide enough unlike other brands to cover the full size of your nailwrong the designs are the same tiny size as konad mash and others they are not bigger plates or designs like the cheeky summer set although the box is the same size these wont fit the nail bed for my thumbs or even the very moderate length of some of my nails which just barely peek over the top of my fingers i didnt want yet another set of plates with designs that wont fit on all of my nails yes some people have very small nails beds but some have larger beds than mine but i imagine most people could forget about using these on a big toe some of us like a matching manicurethe individual nail designs are tiny also and many either dont have much detail or have so much detail crammed into a tiny space that no one will know what the design is supposed to be once on the nail a rose the size of a pin head is going to look like a blob made by a pin head if it transfers at allmy first set from cheeky was the summer set which also has the statement in the ad here on amazon about having big full nail designs and it does with an identical statement i was expecting at least similar sizes but that is not what i got if i can figure out the return process and shipping doesnt cost a fortune these are going back

my skin is combination sensitive and acne prone in other words a nightmare  my acne is typically cystic which also a challenge to deal with  ive found a few products that have worked for me but the cost was very high so i was on the search for a product that worked just as well but for less  i have always known about the body shop tbs but was always a bath and body works bbw girl so never really got into tbs  however i had watched a couple of youtube video reviews a few months ago where reviewes seem to rave about the tbss tea tree oil  at the time i was trying out a new serum from suki so didnt want to introduce an even newer product so i waited dont get me wrong i liked sukis serum but it was rather expensive 8000 so i began to search for something cheaper  then one day i saw a coupon for tbs so i tried it given the coupon plus the cost being so low 712 in comparison to what i had been spendingso ive been using this tea tree oil for the past few weeks and i really like it for a number of reasons to start it absorbs into my skin quickly and does not leave any sort of residue behind in fact my foundation covers it nicely ive used liquid mineral and cream foundations with it so i like the fact i can wear it under makeup with no trouble  like the suki serum i find it really does a good job preventing acne which is what i purchased it for  when hormonal acne forms this seems to keep inflamation down and i dont get nearly as much cystic acne i had in the past  it is true i had a similar result with sukis serum but the difference is that sukis serum could be a bit too drying for meive been using this tea tree oil for a couple of weeks and it appears i have used about 14 25 of the bottle at this rate it should last me for about 2 total months recently i received a 40 off coupon from tbs so i purchased more to take advantage of the coupon bringing the cost to 570  in terms of value i think purchasing with a coupon is the way to go of course but in comparision to the cost of other beauty products i think it is not a bad price at all for me  are there other tea trea oil products that will provide a similar result for even less money  im not sure as this is the first one ive tried  other reviews said you can purchase 100 pure tea tree oil for much less however im new to tea tree oil so i would rather purchase from tbs until i can learn more about formulations and suchalong with this product i purchased tbss tea tree skin clearing facial wash which i have been using along with the tea tree oil  i really like the facial wash a little goes a long way and i love the cool feeling it leaves on my skin after using it  since i have liked tbss tea tree line i recently ordered their tea tree skin clearing toner tea tree skin clearing lotion and their tea tree blemish fade night lotion  my intent with these products is hopefully be able to use these in place of some very expensive products i have been using from suki and dermaquest  the toner i will test against sukis concentrated balancing toner 30 which will be tough because i really love sukis toner  the tea tree lotion will be tested against dermaquests dermaclear tx 65 which is another product i really love hg worthy  so well see how that goes once they arriveupdate 101113i have been using tbss tea tree oil everyday through the summer  its been a good product which i always seem to reach for after cleansing my skin my breakouts are smaller using this product  i suffer from cystic acne and i find that using this product proactively keeps emerging acne from going cystic  is it better than dermalear tx  no i havent found anything that works better on my cystic acne than dermaclear tx however i dont find i reach for it very often when using tbss tea tree oil  when i do develop cystic acne i use the dermaclear but i dont need to slather it all over my face like before  i use it more as a spot treatment which is much more economical  so yes ill contine to purchase this product

reviewText: i wrote this almost same review on the shampoo since i bought both at the same time as a seti saw this conditioner and shampoo in the local cvs and its about 20 there but was able to purchase it through amazon for near half the price but not including shippingstill it was cheaper through amazon though i have to say if i couldnt find it for less than 20 id be sorely tempted to buy it anyway aw dang it all yes i would buy it anywayfirst the scent its strong at first but not in an unpleasant way but i become more acclimated to the scent and came to enjoy it more reminds me of a softer sweeter incense  exotic and somehow relaxingyou dont need a lot of the conditioner and my bottle is lasting me quite a while i always run out of shampoo before the conditioneri have fine hair thats sometimes prone to oiliness but the conditioner does not weight it down and works well with my hair type and when i blow it dry its soft and shiny and just the hint of scent lingers  gmr has commented more than once on how nice my hair smellsim almost out of the shampoo and running low on the conditioner im writing this months after i bought them both from amazon and will be certainly buying more and in fact it is one of my alltime favorite shampoos and conditioners i do sometimes use another project just to switch it up but am always happy when its the agadirs turn and i really can tell the difference between productsfriends have said my hair is shiny and healthy so perhaps this shampoo and conditioner is part of the reason why you wont be disappointed
summary: One of my all-time favorite conditioners (and shampoos)!
