i have copious experience with various conditioners across a broad range of lines from higher end salontype to the lowest cheapest stuff ive found that the conditioners at the lowest end tend to mainly improve the ability to comb out hair and those at the highest end do the best job with smoothing and enhancing shine in the middle you tend to get a little bit of both of these and if youre lucky good body retention and texturemy hair is very long thick and wavy im 49 years old so my hair tends to be dull this conditioner did a great job with my hairs texture  it was quite soft after using it it also helped with combing out to an adequate extent which given the copious amount of hair that i have that is good it didnt do much for shine but it did help with flyaway hair on the top of my head and did a bit of smoothing but left hair frizzier especially the underside of the longer strands than i might have expected the scent is mild and pleasant as a midlevel product i think it squarely occupies a good space given the price point 498 at the time of this review i think its a solid option for someone who wants something on the mild side which has the strongest point of texture enhancement

i generally love fekkai shampoos and haircare products and this one is no exception a really small amount goes a long way to giving my hair a less frizzy and coarse look imparting shine and well slickness the fragrance is pleasant but light and so long as you dont use much its not greasy or heavy definitely worth a try especially if you have thick dull hair

my hair is definitely getting longer for sure it really shows but as for it making my hair thicker i loose hair a lot its not as promising as some of the reviews on here i dont mind it cause i just want my hair to be longer and since im only 17 my hair will still grow thicker but if youre older and are looker for something to mainly make your hair thicker and get rid of balding i dont recommend itidk why people dont like the smell and said it smells horrible but i personally dont mind it it has a herbal minty smell i guess people who dont like it probably wanted the sexy shampoo smell but its really not that bad its very lightalthough i do have to say i dont like how it makes the hair look greasy

reviewText: we already had the dead sea shampoo by adovia  as soon as we tried it i knew we wanted to try the conditioner too so i ordered it right away  we waited  in no time the conditioner was here one of my teen daughters with thick curly hair has totally fallen in love with this conditioner her hair gets greasy easily so she tends to skin conditioner but she sas this conditioner goes on so lightweight  is not at all greasy that she loves it  the shampooi have very thin thin hair post chemo  it is hard for me to use any shampoo  conditioner without my hair looking weighed down  greasy  i am happy to say my hair has been soft  full of life after using this conditioneri have issues with scents  this conditioner has a slight light scent that does not bother me at allmy older teen daughters have long thick hair  they say to apply this conditioner as a pretreatment on wet hair  wrap with a towel  leave on 10 to 15 minutes then wash hair as normal they love itthank you

i keep reordering it because i like the consistency  easier to apply than jergens  and the smellit is a big size so it will last you long and the tan effect is nice and subtle

ive been using the adovia dead sea mud soap twice a day for more than a week now and the first time i used it i like the feeling after using it because my face felt squeaky clean i didnt get any breakouts and it didnt dry my face up i also have an oily skin type and i noticed that using the adovia dead sea mud soap helped in making my face less oily i have 2 acnes at the moment because my time of the month is almost up but i noticed that its not getting as big as my previous acnesim not sure if its relevant but i also noticed that even if ive been using it twice a day for more than a week now the soap bar havent become 34gooey34 or 34melted34 yet other bar soaps ive used becomes gooey and soft after several times of usage but the adovia dead sea mud soap still retains its original shape and guess what the adovia engraving on the soap is still there

reviewText: love the quick color love the almost entirely allnatural ingredients  the fig shade is super flattering and covers very nicely  however this is not a good choice for a long lasting lip balm  once this dries your lips definitely feel it  and as other reviewers have stated beware  the individual lip shimmers have a bar code sticker that effectively ruins the original label so if youre considering these for stocking stuffers this holiday definitely order the 4 pack as that is packaged differently  also the bottom twist mechanism does not reverse so the lip shimmer stick has to be manually pushed back down shaving part of the color stick each and every timeworth a try for just a few dollars as amazon is selling for way cheaper than big box stores  but could be way better and definitely needs a bit more revision

i have very long hair about to the top of my butt and im a fairly tall woman which is dyed black and this stuff is the most amazing conditioner i have ever experienced  its light and doesnt weigh down the hair but leaves it so silky soft i cant even describe it  it smells wonderful a delicate floral scent an the scent stays and stays  my boyfriend cant keep his nose or his hands out of it and hes a man who knows hair as his own is quite long too  even better it works wonders on my bleached white fringe  prior to this conditioner the hair looked and felt fried after its silky to the touch and the condition is almost like it was never bleached at allthis is stuff is a miracle in a jar for a supremely reasonable price  its even cheaper per ounce than my previous fave aussie three minute miracle and would be a steal at five times the priceis also works wonders for my boyfriends long bleach blonde hair  three cheers for sillicon mix bambu we love this stuff
it does job that is required smaller than expected and came with big black scrape on side serves its purpose

this simple device which you can use in the shower removes only the lightest amount of skin which you then replenish with moisturizing lotion or deep night cream this system is truely the only one to have among other things you need only the smallest amount of the exfoliating cream on the bristles of the brush a little goes a very long way

this is okay considering the price nothing you get like in the salon as far as strength but still accomplishes it is definitely loud the clip part that makes the hood stay in the standing position is very fragile mine hasnt broken yet but ive been very careful overall i rate this a 40 because this is what i expected for the price

this is the best cleanser i have used in years  i have 30 year old skin that is starting to look a tiny bit tired after two kids and lack of sleep  in addition i have break outs still on a regular basis or should i say i did until using this product  since using this product my skin is looking refreshed and i have zero breakouts even around that time of the month  i ran out and was using some sample products i had on hand and what a mistake my blemishes came back almost instantly  as soon as i returned to using this product my skin was clear and feeling great  i use it once a day in combination with the neutrogena lavender face wipes at night  this product is not a scrub but a creamy sort of cleanser  i would recommend this product for sure no hesitation
batiste is hands down the best dry shampoo but this tropical smell is the bees knees smaller than the cans youd get from ulta but larger than the purse size this just might be my new favorite scent

i was told by my dermatologist that she could only strongly stand behind two products for moisturizing eucerin and cetaphil since my skin is so dry especially in winter and having to be on medications that dried up my skin even more i have tried both i think they do an equally outstanding job at ridding cracked dry red skin the thing about cetaphil specifically the cream in the jar  not the pump lotion is that it is not even a tad bit greasy compared to the former it eliminates dry skin within a few hours my friend who has to wash your hands eight times a day or so was struggling so much due this winter both of her children also have hands that look so chapped you would think that they were sunburned i bought this to give her a sample of as well she keeps it right on the counter and is one of the best testimonials of how well this product works besides its effectiveness the odorless nongreasy tasteless very thick and potent moisturizer to me is the gold standard for any topical cream that i have ever come across i use it on scratches that i get very easily during the winter i use it after shaving even to calm down the sunburn over aloe  vera at this price for two jars its a steal and depending on how liberal you use it but jar will last at least a couple of months for one person just such a great product at a reasonable cost rather than paying an enormous prices for names like avon or oil of ole
summary: Dermatologists Suggested, Many, Many Happy Friends

reviewText: ive had these brushes for a few weeks now using them about everyday if not every other day and let me begin by saying that i bought these brushes to replace the inexpensive walmart brushes i have been using for close to a year now and honestly im not impressedi bought this particular set bc i thought it had a big variety but it didnt provide the two brushes i was in serious need of i wanted a new foundation brush and a new blending brush in this brush kit a blending brush does come in the kit but in my opinion its way too stiffnot fluffy enough to do what its suppose to a lot of reviewers said that they wish this kit came wa list of what each brush is and it does at this point im not even bothering using the brushes for their intended use im using them however i fancy by this i mean using lip brushes as eyeshadow brushes eyebrow brushes as eyeliner brushes eyeliner brushes as lip brushes and so on if ur an individual looking for a variety of eyelinerlip and powder brushes this is for u but if ur looking for eyeshadow brushes specifically this is not it as for me like iv said i only these for the eyeliner brushes and lip brushes anything for eyeshadow i stick to my walmart brushes since they are better but i will admit the face brushes are good i only use the angled brush though for contouring the other brushes arent bigfluffy enough for my liking but they do get the job done hope i helped

reviewText: to be honest i was a little nervous about using a shampoo with shea on the label since i could only think of shea butter as a heavyduty moisturizer but i decided to give this product a shot  and then when i saw that the shampoo looked creamy like a conditioner instead of a shampoo i feared flat oily hair  my worries were needless  this is an excellent product that does not leave that feared residue on my hairbecause i read several years ago that your hair depends mostly on the last product used on it i tried this shampoo both with and without conditioner clear scalp  hair beauty volumizing root boost nourishing conditioner to gauge its results  after using the shampoo my hair feel clean and tight  i expected that blowdrying would result in unmanageable hair that would catch on my styling brush  nope  my hair looked healthier and shinier than it does with my regular shampoo  it had a clean look without the flyaways  the scent is light and pleasantto give some context to my experience  i have fine hair although i have a lot of hair which makes it look thick  i find it difficult to find a balance that calms the static andor frizz in the fine hair without weighing everything down  this shampoo is one of the few ive tried that accomplishes that  note my hair is not colortreated or damaged  with the conditioner the results were even better mostly because my hair took better to styling debbie lee wesselmann

i loved is product when i got it i love how it just glides on to your eyeas a crease shadow or eye shadow primer it is amazing either waythe only thing that i hated happened the lid  would crack very easily and the product would hit the top of the lidcapwhich was very irritatingbut other then that i love itall of my friends love when i wear it

adovia purifying mud mask is a mask and skin care treatment for men women and teens  its for all skin types but also works for acne psoriasis and eczema  it can be used as a deep facial cleanser and exfoliator  it is full of natural ingredientspure dead sea black mud aloe vera vitamins a and c beeswax jojoba oil evening primrose oil olive oil and moremy adovia purifying mud mask arrived quickly from the company and was packaged well  the 51 oz tube came in a sturdy box that has the same design on it as the tube  the colors and design on the tube are attractive and on the back of the tube all of the ingredients and directions are clearly written  the tube has a cap you screw off that is easy to openthe mask itself is a thick brownish green and doesnt have much of a scent  the mask went on easily and i waited the suggested 1020 minutes  after rinsing it off and drying my face i immediately was struck by how soft my skin felt  i have combination skin and often masks can dry out areas of my face  not this timenext i let my young adult son and daughter try the adovia purifying mud mask  they both suffer from occasional adult acne  both of them were impressed with their results especially the tightness in their poresa session at a spa using a dead sea mask generally runs 70120  one bottle of adovia purifying mud mask containing 30 sessions is only 33  based on our results this is a product we will be continuing to use
summary: My Entire Family is Hooked on This Mask!

i ordered this mask one evening after taking advil in the morning two alleve in the afternoon and still getting no relief from a headache concentrated in my forehead  i get migraines but the headache i had wasnt a migraine so i didnt want to waste a prescription migraine pill on this headache  the weather has been cold and rainy so i wanted an eye mask i could heat and put over my eyes and forehead as opposed to the kind of cold mask that seems to help some people having migrainesi read a review of a lot of different eye masks on amazon before picking this one  i particularly liked that it was sewn in such a way as to avoid putting a lot of pressure on the eyeswhat i didnt notice was that none of the reviews of this one said anything about microwaving it  a number of the eye masks i read about did allow for freezing or microwavingwhen this mask arrived the next day i put it in the microwave as soon as i got home found the amazon box on my doorstep and opened the packagemistake  though neither the product description on amazon nor the packaging state so this should not be microwaved to be fair there is nothing saying that it can be microwaved but given what happened when i microwaved it and the fact that many of these products can be chilled or heated i think the packaging should have a warning about this and the product description should alsowhen i removed it from the microwave the beads inside the fabric nearly burned my fingers and there was a bad chemical odor in the microwave  i am letting it sit out on the counter for a few days and then will put it in a freezer bag then into the freezer as instructed on the package i have now ordered two other masks from amazon to try  and both of them explicitly state in the descriptions that they can be heatedim giving it 3 stars due to the failure of the seller to make clear that it cannot be microwaved  other than that i like it  the size shape and weight  please note that though this mask can be washed the cover is not removable  if you want one with a removable washable fabric cover this is not one of those
summary: WARNING - DO NOT MICROWAVE THIS MASK!

reviewText: this dove men care shampoo promises thicker and fuller hair  lets give it a trylikespleasant unobtrusive scent thats not overpoweringeasy to lather up and rinse offafter using this shampoo for seven days i do notice slight thickening more denser hair  however my hair normally grows fast anywaytheres less hair that had fallen off onto my bathrooms bamboo floor mat than beforeslight dislikesim very sensitive to caffeine induced insomnia so im using this shampoo primarily in the morning and not after evening workoutscalcium is supposed to fortify hair follicles but it feels like calcium just stiffens up the hair provides some texture and body to limp hair but stiffer hair means slightly harder to manageoverallgood effective shampoo in cleaning hair but the thickening and fortifying benefits of caffeine and calcium on live test subjects hair in vivo have not been scientifically proven  ill most likely buy this shampoo the next time
summary: Hair thickening shampoo is worth a try but results may vary.

i wish you can give half star ratings but i cant my real true rating would be 35 oppose to the whole 4 stars ill begin by saying i got the rose to purple hair extensions and they are indeed beautiful and they stood true to their saying it did only take 1 week to arrive from china to california so that is absolutely splended so heres the problem i encountered with these extensions but before i continue i wanted to state that i am a light skinned hispanic with natural black thick hair so i ordered two of these extensions bc many other reviewers suggested to get 2 of them if u have thick hairheres the thing these extensions are both thick and thin ur probably wondering how could that be ok so heres the problem i thought these extensions would have been one piece of continual hair that is just dyed or fabricated to have the ombre effect it isnt like that its actually two pieces of hair of two different colors stacked on top of each other with that being said the extensions are very very thick at the top bc its layered wthe 2 pieces of hair and then very thin at the bottom bc its only one piece of hair when i wear both extensions my head is massively heavy and i have massive drag queen volume so for me personally the 2nd extension is unnecessary ill probably never wear both at the same time unless im going to west hollywood to party wmy drag queens lol which is highly unlikelynext problem straightened or curledlet me tell u about this epic fail im not into curling my hair bc my hair is naturally curly and i actually usually rock a straight hair look everyday unless i feel like having my curly hair now this is how i encountered my next problem wthese extensins my hair is around my mid back where my bra strap is and with these extensions curled the way they arrived u cant even see them they are the same length as my hair this defeated the purpose of these extensions if they arent even going to show lt wahso i read u can straightened these things so since i have 2 extensions i figure why not i have a chi hair straightener and i was scared to fry the extensions so i had it on 180 lowest setting and did quick passes on it until its straight and idk if any other ppl have this problem wthe chi it might just be me and the way i hold it or something but before i knew it i changed the dial and had been straightening my extension on heat 410 highest so its safe to say u cant melt these things bc mine didnt lmao not that i was trying to but it all just happened by accident in any given case once i straighted the extension and straightened my own hair bc it was in its wavycurly form i put the extension in only to find that now my extension is ridiculously long  it was barely gracing my waist line and while i loved the long hair effect theres no way i would blend my hair to make it look like it was my hair bc of the massive length difference between my hair and the extension there is a simple solution to this problem cut the straightened extension but i dont want to do that bc they are so pretty and majesticso for now im just stumped at what on earth i should do the only thing i havent tried yet is actually curling my hair wsemi tight curls to see if then at that point my hair would be short enough to let the pinkpurple hair show threw ill be posting photos soon bc photos are always helpful and they wouldve probably helped me steer clear of this purchase not that these were horrible they just didnt work out for me ill stick to full on wigs hope this lengthy review helped
summary: i'll tell you how it really is

oilfree dyefree and wont clog poresits promises are lofty1 provides all night moisture2 reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles3 gives you younger and healthierlooking skin in four weekspersonally i think it overpromises a bit granted it does a nice job of moisturizing since ive been using it i dont wake up in the morning feeling an urgent need to slather my face with lotion as i often do but neither do i awake with dewy moist skin im 60 and i have very dry skinthe stuff doesnt do miracles but it does hydrate better than some other night creams ive usedas to reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkleswell dont get me wrongi love olay products i use an olay moisturizer every morning an olay soap in the shower an olay eye product etc but lets be realmost anything that hydrates my skin is going to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles there is no miracle to this product in that regardi like the satiny feel of the cream on my fingers as i am about to apply it and like the feel of it on my face its texture isnt anything special but nice it is not greasyit feels nicely hydrating without feeling like a mask on my facea previous night cream i used another brand did not give me a skin reaction when used alone but broke me out when followed by my daytime moisturizer currently olay complete which i put on as soon as im out of bed in the morning before going out to walk the dog this cream has not given me any kind of skin reaction either alone or in combination with my daytime lotion however i have had burning around my eyes when i wake up in the morning after using the product the night before the product says to avoid the eyesand i didnt it is just habit to put face cream over my entire face as noted in a previous review most of a womans signs of aging are around her eyesand in my opinion a face cream should be able to be used around the eyes if it promises to reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles you may disagreei definitely plan to continue using this night cream until the jar is empty at that point ill reassess whether it its benefits warrant purchasing moreupdated 12613 ive noted that quite a few of the lowerrated reviews mention this lotion feeling gummy or leaving clumps on the skin this has not been my experiencenot even once every time i have used the cream it absorbs fully and my face feels smooth i have very dry skin and i wonder if the cream is fully absorbing into my skin whereas perhaps for those with less dry skin the cream does not fully absorbhence the gumminess or clumps just a theory

this baby wash doesnt include any of the chemicals that are found in so many products  i love that it is fragrancefree as well  even without any of the chemicals this baby wash still suds up well and feels like its really cleaning  it doesnt leave my babys hair greasy like some other 34natural34 washes

like many of you i was using the original qod formula qod gold for 2 years before i found out it was no longer available i was devastated trusting the qod name i purchased the qod max organiq solution and was highly highly disappointed after a few emails back and forth with the owner of keratin4u wonderful lady she educated me and informed me that qod was re branding the qod max into a new formula called kerapremium i was skeptical but desperate because if youre like me this qod stuff has changed my life i took a chance forked out more money and ordered the new kerapremium formula it has the smell of cocoa and a light pink color but the consistency of the original qod gold that i was accustomed to i usually only do my roots every 2 months but i decided to do my whole head to see how this stuff worked after the 3 hour process and 3 days of no washing i finally washed my hair anddrumroll please the results were amazing just like the original qod gold if not better im definitely glad i took a chance with this stuff i really hope this product stays on the market forever

im not yet able to say for sure how effective this is specifically for southeastern allergens because spring has only just begun but i can at least say that it has a great combination of homeopathic elements to it i dont know that its so specifically formulated for the regions pollen explosion which hasnt happened yet but it basically is trying to cover the whole spectrum of allergic reactions to allergens my strongest allergy is dust which isnt the most regional thing so im going to have a family member who has a worse reaction to the spring pollen try this when it hits and will update this soonone note as with many homeopathic treatments this is going to work differently with different peopleit may be more effective for one person over the other and allergies are a pretty idiosyncratic thing so id say its pretty much worth a try for anyone who cant find anything else effectiveand as those of us with allergies know usually a single medication or shot only helps alleviate symptoms rather than cure us completely so whatever can potentially help is worth a shot in my book

our sephora sells lots of products by perricone and i was lured by a sales rep to buy this new miracle a week ago no longer that the evening of the same day i had so called buyers remorse already what did they put in it fish guts i hope not but thats how it smells i still bravely applied it on my skin a few days in a row to see maybe it would be all worth it and i will see the younger me something that would be worth it even if i had to put up with the scent of it my skin was a bit softer and tad smoother but nothing miraculous that other creams for 25 dont do the final decision not to use this product i made when my boyfriend told me  i didnt want to tell you but you smell funny the last few days are you ok he thought that i was sick that was the end of it i am not much of a returner so i gave the miracle to a willing single friend i am giving it 3 stars instead of one because i still accept that it might be a miracle in a 80 jar if you use it for prolonged time but the scent of it prevented me doing so
how are sunblock every day whether its cloud cover for sunshine and it is just good coverage not to mention a good moorshire riser for the skin a little bit goes a long way

i love this stuff  i switched to this product because my hair had so much static and i was looking for something that did not contain alcohol or other drying factors for that alone it was a miraclei must admit i was expecting to have to compromise on performance and i did not have high hopes for this product at all  but i was wrong  i actually love it  it is really great for styling with a round brush and blow dryer and it kind of sets my hair as i dry it  the set lasts several days much longer than with any other product i have tried in the pastbut do be aware that this is a very thick gel thicker than most  i rub a dab around in my hands before applying so that i can evenly distribute a thin coating to my hair without getting a concentrated glob of it somewhere  the consistency is different than most gels but if you can get past needing it to be what you are accustomed to and judge it strictly on performance alone its a winner

my skin is pretty resilient and not easily irritated with that being said i started with one a day but quickly moved up to two i use this between my cerave foaming cleanser and my cerave moisturizer and theyve been working very well so far they are pretty cheap and this order came with three boxes but if you want the most bang for your buck you can cut these pads in half i generally dont use the entire pad so half is perfect and now you have 540 uses for 11

before i purchased this i was looking for a decently priced primer from a quality brand  when this was revealed i didnt hesitate to buy i love revlons cosmetics  this primer is easy to apply and goes onto my face smoothly  i didnt really notice any reduction in my pore size but the redness faded significantly after letting the product sink into my skin  i also felt that my foundation went on more smoothly over this primer  this also mattifies my face which is great because i have oily skin especially in the tzone area  wearing this primer keeps my face matte all day no oil shines through and makes my makeup lastive been using this primer for months maybe half a year and have not noticed any of the problems the lowraters have mentioned blotchiness crumbled balledup texture breakouts etc and i have sensitive acneprone skinim very pleased with this primer and would reccommend it to anyone looking for an affordable quality primer

it consists of a neutralbrownish layer and two darkbright colored one having more shimmer and the other matte  i like that they did it this way  i can reach for whatever im in the mood for with each palette  they all stack into one container  saves space  the texture of a lot of palettes like this one can be a little chalky or powdery  these have a much smoothersofter fell to me  which brings me to the shipping part  it did have one crack in one of the browns  nothing serious  i just blew it out  really though there are so many colors that even if one or two was messed up a little it wouldnt be a big deal to me  for this price its an amazing deal  i was hesitant to buy from the seller because i dont know much about them but im glad i did

this concealer is hard to spread to get a good even coverage and i definitely would not recommend it for undereye circles  i havent used it on acne too many times but also havent noticed any significant improvement when i have  i do like the cleaner ingredients list as im trying to move away from chemicals

i have actually never purchased the clean and clear product itself but i have tried both the walmart brand and the target brand of this moisturizer the target generic brand is amazing i honestly would give it a 55 i have combination skin so my face is oily in spots and dry in others i use the product everyday at night after i wash my face before bed i would like to think that the acne medication has the best time to absorb into my skin while im sleeping as opposed to wearing it outside in the sunlight where it would make my face even dryer than normal in the morning i use a daytime moisturizer but that is another reviewi ended up buying the walmart brand because i left my original bottle at my moms house the walmart brand costs less than both the actual product and the target brand but is definitely of a lower quality its a lot more watered down than the target version and takes several more applications to finally work i still use it at night howeverim sure the real version of this product works amazingly well since i love the target version so much but dont buy the walmart version of this product
awesome product i use it more as a regular conditioner as my hair is very dry i highly recommend this product for great results reasonably priced

i have been dying my hair for years and lately it was catching up to me  my hair felt and looked like straw even using moisturizing shampoos and conditioners  i found this product and ordered it  i have yet to leave it on a full 10 minutes people have time for that however the time i leave it on in the shower helps tremendously anywhere from 1 to 5 minutes  ive been using it for several weeks and my hair looks great again its super soft and shiny  still slightly frizzy but since i live in texas i cant expect total miracles  i also broke down and ordered the 10 minute miracle leave in conditioner w keratin and it bumps up the smoothness and shine even more  so far the 10 minute miracle company has found a loyal customer in me  im very happy with the results

im 40 years old with dry patches sun damage and some adult acne and i used to this product for two days before i went to bed i woke up today and my skin looks amazing soft and the pimple i had are gone and the sun spots diminished i usually dont buy avon products but i heard from a friend that this product was good so i tried it and it was well worth the 15 dollars i spent it did tingle a bit for around 10 minutes but it wasnt painful i have sensitive skin so i was worried about that and the main reason i havent gotten a professional face peel yet  i will buy this product again and again and cant wait to see what my face looks like in a month ill update for sure

i have been using foaming wrap lotion for years but i have never tried the motions brand until now the motions at home foaming wrap lotion is just as good as other brands that i have used and i used it to wrap my hair before i sit under the dryer or even when i wrap my hair and allow it to airdry motions foaming wrap helps stretch my hair and once my hair is dry the foam wrap lotion is dissolved into my hair and my hair is so much easier to managei am an african american woman and i wear extensions at times and the motions foam wrap lotion works perfect on both my extensions and natural hair the dispenser is a handy pump that lets you easily apply the product to your hair without the hassle of holding a bottle in your hand and that is perfect you will notice the difference when you apply because with the motions foam wrap lotion your hair has less frizzies and seems shiny and healthy

i prefer these over traditional bun sponges which seem fussy and fake to me and always seem to show through these are really comfortable but after using them a few times they get somewhat misshapen and dont clamp tightly so they are good but not very sturdy i think all of them are about the same so id recommend finding them as cheap as you can and buying some extras

i used a product like this years ago but like every favorite hair product ive come to rely upon it was sadly discontinued what i like about the fekkai prx oil is the same as my old hair serum its lightweight enough to not be greasy yet substantial enough to actually make a difference in the smoothness and moisture content of my hair i find when using this product my hair looks shinier smoother and less frizzy ive ended up needing half of my current styling product and some days can skip it completely because the smoothing effect is so noticeable im not sure if this is a placebo effect but my hair actually seems stronger as wellmy hair is fine but i have a large quantity of the stuff so i use somewhere between half to a full pump your quantity needs may vary i apply it mostly to the ends of my hair that tend to be drier despite conditioning treatments and regular haircuts then whatever is still left on my hands gets smoothed over the rest of the hair shaftdid i mention the vanilla scent is fantastic did any of the other reviewers mention the vanilla it smells so good the vanilla mmmmm vanillai did not get paid to write this review but i was provided a single free bottle as part of the vine program this is one of those cases where ill definitely order my next bottle when this one is finished i like it that much that doesnt often happen
summary: Works perfectly; smells great! What more can one ask for?

reviewText: i use this as body cream after a shower  it builds up a bit of color and i dont look so pasty  i use a separate self tanner for just my face and neck  i put it on every 2 days because it really builds up  the good thing about a gradual self tanner is that you dont streak or flake  its naturallooking  i dont get any sun and i take 2000 iu vitamin d3  i cannot go out in the sun because i am photosensitive due to medication  also the obvious benefit of that is avoiding skin cancer  highly recommended

receiving facial products such as these luminous clean wet cleansing towelettes made by ponds is what makes being an amazon vine member such a treat i probably wouldnt have used these items in a million years but after trying them several times i can see how people would like them theyre designed to remove makeup and my wife said they do a good job of that and are thankfully nongreasy apparently the white kaolin clay within the towelettes is a natural mineral that cleans deeply and its hard to argue with that after rubbing the towelettes on your face the towelettes themselves are plenty moist and firm without being overly rough on your skin somewhat similar to the feel of clorox wipes moisturizing ingredients are also included which is probably where the fresh subtle smell of the towelettes comes from the peelback top on the small package makes it easy to reach right in and grab a towelettein my opinion these towelettes are versatile and can be used to clean your hands ears the back of your neck wherever in addition  and this is probably just my own weird desire for getting the most out of the things i own shining through  ive used these towelettes to wipe down the bathroom counter and remove dust from a laptop computer and the top of a speaker like i said theyre versatile

having thin weak pealing nails my whole life  and im no spring chicky this is the only thing that works on my nails it is lovely and i have tried several colors this one being one of the first the iced cappuccino has a lovely full blended look and is a very attractive neutral shade in my opinion i have tried the pinks light and dark ones and the reds which are currently my faves and this is a tried and true when in doubt color for sure it is most appropriate for those who need subtle color on their nails for work or simply prefer a neutral shade i used to be that womantry this and it will make you a believer my nails are harder and stronger i am not kind to my nails and computer work and paper dry them out not to mention the arid area of my state doesnt help  yes texas has some arid parts i have moved furniture done yard work cleaned washed and so forth with not a care in the world on the nailsbe sure you use a professional and get one who has bottle shaker it will help keep your polish looking great for two weeks at least

one christmas i received a mini set of 6 of this product and although i had never heard of this brand was very skeptical of it  i had purchased several brands of crackle nail polish that really didnt crackle or it crackled in such a way it looked like i  had fallen asleep with my nails still sticky and my polish had wrinkled it was that bad  in the mean time i began getting into nail art and collecting polishes metallics shimmers cremes glitters etc and ended up with a lotvirtually any color one can envision and separated them by season and colors  i had put the mini set give to me that christmas in their respective bags with like colors intending to use them when i got to them figuring they would mediocre rather than trying them out  well i came across one and decided to try it halfheartedly and to my amazement the color i tried crackled beautifully it was amazing i then wished i could find a crackle polish in more colors than the six i had but wasnt sure i would be able to find them anymore after all nearly a year had passed since that christmas  i was told the set was bought on amazon so on a whim searched out this brand to see if it was still sold  i found the singles and was going to buy some that is until i found this set i work part time and after bills dont have a lot of money to spend but after adding together how much it would cost to buy most of these colors separately decided to purchase this set  and i am glad i did the order was put in which arrived much sooner than i expected  all bottles were intact useable and packed well in these 4  little plastic containers which separated into six bottles per container  none were dried out and most were of perfect consistency and the one or two that were a bit thick for my liking were easily thinned with polish thinner  i have used a few and just as the mini set  i received all crackled perfectly unlike many more expensive brand named polishes with less than perfect results  again i am pleased both with the seller as well as the product itself thank you very much

im 52 and ive been highlighting andor coloring m hair since i was 18  ive done it at high end shops at haircuttery and at home  im fairly experienced with color is what im saying  my natural color is a dark blonde with about 50 gray  i color my hair every 5 weeks to cover the gray and highlight every 34 months  i really struggle with brassiness so i was excited to try this cool blonde glossercovering gray  i tried this at 4 weeks post most recent color  the grays are just starting to show  there was no difference at all after using thisrefreshing highlights  again i noticed no difference at all in the 34blondeness34 of my highlightstoning down brassiness  no differencegeneral vibrancy and shine  i actually did feel that my hair was bright and shiny and extravibrant though just for 2 daysease of use  its a liquid not a foam  about as hard to manage as any athome hair color  which is to say moderately hard if youre new to itbottom line  disappointing  little to no difference at all in my admittedly overprocessed hair

i ordered this product with the hope that it could help with a few white stretch marks on my hips note that i have had these marks since i was 13 years old and i am now 29 so the thought of finally minimizing them was worth the try i did alot of research before i started and followed it religiously giving my skin enough time to heal and benefit from the rollsi followed the rolling with a natural mixture of shea butter and coconut oil though the whole process is a little painful its bearable and women go through much worse with waxing etcunlike others i did not roll to the point of bleeding also ensure that you sanitize and store the product properly between usesits not a miracle product but after a few weeks i noticed that the stretch marked skin was smooth and you could no longer feel the indents from the mark itself  they were still visiblethis to me was the most improvement i have ever had in them having tried several creams and scrubs before my problem with this product is that the needles go dull too quickly i have ordered two times and both had to be discarded after a few uses i really wish it was more durablei will try this type of product again but maybe from a different brand

i have oily scalp and dry hair  i have tried everything store brands salon brands wen salon deep conditioning treatments home remedies argan oil keratin treatments blah blah blahmy friend recommended terax conditioner i had just bought more expensive salon conditioner and waited until i had used it  when i finally gave terax a try i was sorry i had waited  it is amazing  i usually have to put all sorts of oils and waxes on it to tame the frizzes ever since i started using terax i dont have to put anything else on my hair unless i flat iron  i only need three products for my hair now  shampoo for every other day terax for everyday every other day i rinse and massage my scalp without shampoo and then use a little terax and a little pomade for when i flat iron  my hair has never been soft and shinyuntil now and a little goes a long way  i have been passing the recommendation along and have gotten the same positive feedback from all my friends  i finally have the pretty shiny hair i have always longed for

for years i used olay total effects 7in1 antiaging daily moisturizer in the 17 ounce pump and loved it i even did a video review about it in 2009 unfortunately in the past year amazon stopped carrying it or at least stopped offering it on subscribe and save and i found it almost equally difficult to find on a consistent basis in my local drugstore as a result i sadly went looking for a replacement producti tried several different olay products in the process but the one that won out was olay complete all day uv moisturizer with spf 15 for sensitive skin those of you who have read my other lotion reviews know that i have a pretty significant fragrance sensitivity and i love this lotion because it has almost no fragrance the olay age defying antiwrinkle daily spf 15 lotion one of the lotions i tried during my search for a replacement lotion has a scent that i found cloying though i like the lotion otherwiseso that one didnt make the cutolay complete is 100 oil free and paba free and is noncomedogenic wont clog pores i find it light and smooth hydrating without being greasy since i have extremely dry skin it perhaps is not quite as hydrating as the olay total effects i had been using but i suspect it would be more than adequate hydration for most people i have had no skin sensitivity to this lotioni actually like olay completes simple squeeze container more than the fancy total effects pump which was beautiful but wasted lotion at the bottom of the container and was difficult to tell when it was about to run out you hold olay completes container up to the light and it is easy to see how much is leftnote while there may still be olay total effects products still being sold the particular variety i was using fragrance free with spf became hard to find
summary: My choice to replace the Olay lotion I can no longer find.

i received this lotion to review and was really excited to try it out i previously have been using the acure day cream to moisturize my dry skin i live in a cold weather region and had recently been experiencing drierthannormal skin i began using this moisturizing lotion as the season began warming up and felt that my skin was becoming a little oily for my liking this lotion smells really nice just like lemons which i dont usually like but this is a very pleasant lemon smell it soaks into my skin very nicely it does not leave a greasy film on my skin but instead leaves me feeling moisturized and glowing it is absorbed into my skin pretty quickly after i apply it so i do not have to wait a very long time to put my makeup on i anticipate i will use this product in the warmer summer months as it is fairly light and the day cream in the cooler winter months when my skin becomes more dry dull and flaky if you are looking for a great lightweight moisturizer that is both healthy for your skin and the environment this should be your goto product and the price is extremely reasonable for such an effective safe product i am excited to try other products put out by acure i have loved everything that ive tried so far

this is moroccan argan oil for the hair skin and nails moroccan argan oil is produced from plant kernels of the argan tree found in moroccoi have natural african american hair and i absolutely love how this product makes my hair shine  it only takes a few drops so the bottle will go a long way in fact when i raise up the dropper i do not squeeze oil into my hand i just put my hand near the base of the dropper and that is enough oil for me  i did not care for having this oil on my skin as i live in texas and it is too hot to have anything extra on my skinthe advertising image on amazon shows a caucasian woman smiling next to the bottle of argan oil  if you are caucasian then you will probably only need a tiny drop for your entire head  otherwise you will have greasy hair  i am not sure of how this oil will work on the skin when trying to get a sun tanafrican american women especially those going natural this oil is really nice  you will not need much of it yet probably more than a caucasian womanthis product can also be used on men  i found the oil to be orderless  of course if you place your nose at the tip of the bottle then sniff in  well i guess then you can smell an orderthe bonus item is lip balm mine taste like peppermint  if you have bad breath then the lip balm is strong enough to cover up the halitosis  i kept the lip balm on for about 5 hours and had no problems with it irritating my lips  most lips balms i cannot use because of the irritation they causesample provided

clearasil daily face wash 65ounce tube seemed like a safe bet to purchase after all clearasil products have been around for some time proving to do what they claim having a teen preteen and one that will be a preteen soon i imagine well have acne products in our house for a number more years clearasil being one of themaside from being a great product i was a little more then concerned and surprised by anothers review in regards to the ingredient salicylic acid i did a little research myself confirming my apprehension i dont know if ill ever understand why the government allows for consumers health to be in jeopardy allowing such things to be marketed when they are clearly not safe and or come with unfavorable side effectsproduct descriptionclearasil daily face wash tube this rich pearly cream gently cleanses skin without over drying use everyday twice a day to help you maintain visibly clearer skinbefore using topical salicylic acid tell your doctor and pharmacist if you are allergic to salicylic acid or any other medications do not apply any of the following products to the skin that you are treating with topical salicylic acid unless your doctor tells you that you should abrasive soaps or cleansers skin care products that contain alcohol other medications that are applied to the skin such as benzoyl peroxide benzaclin benzamycin others resorcinol ra lotion sulfur cuticura finac others and tretinoin retina renova others or medicated cosmetics your skin may become very irritated if you apply any of these products to the skin that you are treating with topical salicylic acid tell your doctor and pharmacist what prescription and nonprescription medications vitamins nutritional supplements and herbal products you are taking or plan to take be sure to mention any of the following aspirin diuretics water pills and methyl salicylate in some muscle rubs such as bengay your doctor may need to change the doses of your medications or monitor you carefully for side effects tell your doctor if you have or have ever had diabetesor blood vessel kidney or liver disease you should know that children and teenagers who have chicken pox or the flu should not use topical salicylic acid unless they have been told to do so by a doctor because there is a risk that they may develop reyes syndrome a serious condition in which fat builds up on the brain liver and other body organs tell your doctor if you are pregnant plan to become pregnant or are breastfeeding if you become pregnant while using topical salicylic acid call your doctor
summary: WOULD GIVE IT A FIVE, EXCEPT ...

i was a little hesitant buying this as there had been some pretty poor reviews in the past  but i found a great gold glittery opi color for my toes and wanted a neutral nail so went for it and purchasedi am so glad i did this is such a pretty bronze color and easy to apply i achieved an opaque look with just one coat but to get the effect i was looking for applies two coats which was a great metallic bronze color then applied one coat of gelish vegas nights which has a pretty glitter shimmer the effect is a subtle golden shimmer than is just perfect for summer and neutral enough for work but pretty enough with the shimmer for going ongot just the effect i wanted and would buy this color again   i see this being a go to when i do not want in your face color also great if you are going away for a few weeks and know you might get a chip or two and do not want bright  obvious color to let this show

ive used this product every day over the course of two weeks and i have to conclude that it doesnt work for me every night on average i would gain one or two new pimpleswhiteheads on my face or if i was lucky i wouldnt get any pimples at all until the next night i cant find any reason to explain this other than the fact that i must be sensitive to one of the ingredients i dont consider my skin too sensitive i have combination skin that tends to be more oily than dry i get perhaps a handful of pimples every year which is more due to high stressbad eating periods than to naturally high oil production i only use lotions and creams on my face no makeup and im 20 years old with no medical skin condition i was hoping for this product to be the most effective night cream at its price point and it may very well be the case for the majority but not for metaking a look at the ingredients list ive noticed that its better than most night creams which is primarily why i bought it with nianicimide being the fourth ingredient panthenol being the 9th and tocopherol acetate being the 10th the rest of the list is composed of stabilizers thickening agents moisturizers etc nothing that sticks out except those controversial parabens and you have to decide for yourself if theyre harmful i have to point out that this cream still retains a slight floral cosmetic scent despite advertising itself as fragrancefree but its not that noticeable and the smell seems to dissipate sooner than my other cream which has fragrance at the very bottom of its ingredient liston the application itself it seems to be a light night cream i was better off using a small amount and rubbing it in than dolloping a lot on and smearing it about when i used more it seemed to dry on my face as if it was a paste leaving white streaks the skin absorbs it very quickly within 510 minutes and youre set for the nightim giving this product two stars because everyones skin is different and i must be one of those unlucky few that are sensitive to certain key ingredients and because i can still use this for my hands the glass jar is also pretty sturdy and i plan to use it to store odds and ends when i run out of cream

my daily facial treatment routine includes first washing then toning then applying a moisturizer and finishing off with a sunscreen  since discovering the simple product line by alberto culver i can keep a few more dollars in my pocket and not suffer from my skin sensitivities acting up  thesimple hydrating light moisturizer 42 ounceis indeed light and it has no fragrance or ingredient that my personal body finds reactive  when my skin is extremely dry its not emollient enough but on an average day its perfect  the bottle arrives in a lightweight cardboard box and the simple packaging is very attractive  the entire product line is geared to sensitive skin and everything ive seen so far directs their market to be younger beautiful women  i can attest that one needs to be neither to benefit from this skincare line and i encourage every user of this product to remember to apply a good sunscreen in order to keep your skin and self protected from the environment  this is a good product

first i have to laugh at the reviews of heavy perfumed and i had breakouts  lets be real  you are very sensitive to smells obviously because this is no way perfumey  and anyone can have a breakout from trying a new product  so if this made you break out then yes this is not a product for your sensitive skin  i think people wsensitive skin should be buying sensitive skin products only  makes sense yes  for us normal skin people  this cream is awesome  it does what it says  regenerates  i noticed a difference in two weeks  glowing smooth moist skin  i use a little in the am with my spf and of course at bedtime  bedtime is the best for using your face creams as it gets to set all night  you dont need a lot so it lasts a long time  hint for women to decrease wrinkles  use satin pillow cases only  also the satin does not absorb all your face creams like cotton cases  i worked for a plastic surgeon and know all the prescription creams and treatments out there and you dont have to drop hundreds of dollars  perfect price for a great cream
summary: GREAT moisturizer that makes a difference!

the simple soothing facial toner produces a wonderful clean cooling sensation on your face but does not induce much toning actioni have moderately sensitive skin and have tried several simple products  none of them disappoint  the toner is a clear watery liquid that you drip onto some cotton and apply to your face after washing with cleanser and warm water  i didnt like using cotton balls so i got some cheap cotton pads and recommend them instead  anyway the simple toner has witch hazel in it which produces a cool clean feeling immediately after application  while the product claims to not have any added fragrances it still does have the mild but detectable scent of witch hazel the toner liquid is absorbeddries very quickly so your face is only wet for a few seconds and the scent doesnt last long  ive never really used skin toners before but the ones that ive tried had a bit of an alcohol zing to them  using the simple toner is not uncomfortable at all  however i thought that toners are supposed to induce a tightening feeling on your face  this toner doesnt really create that type of sensation  ive been using it for a couple weeks now and im not really sure how much it truly tones my skin  still i do like the refreshingly cool feeling and plan to continue to use it especially since does not aggravate my skin  if you have sensitive skin and want to try a relatively inexpensive toner i would have no hesitation recommending this product

i have dry skin dry hair i live in a dry climate and due to my mature age of well over 50 these issues have accelerated  just lately within the last several months i have started experimenting with different oils as part of my beauty regime  my latest acquisition has been with avocado oil and i am very satisfied with all the resultsi had bought de la cruz olive oil first and i had received positive results as a facial moisturizer for my dry skin as a body moisturizer and as a hair treatment conditioner for my dry scalp and hair  one of the reasons why i chose de la cruz is because the two oils that i have ordered from them are 100 pure oil no additives parabens chemicals or anything else added to their productthis avocado oil has a very light scent but nothing that is distinguishable  yes it is oily but that is what the product isavocado oilas a facial product i have used the avocado oil in conjunction with my moisturizer oil first and followed by a moisturizer  for my skin the addition of avocado oil before applying the facial conditioner locks in the moisture  i only use about 3 or 4 drops to cover both my face and neck and within a couple of minutes my thirty skin absorbs the oil leaving skin both soft and supple  i have also used just 2 drops as a slight lubricant before my nightly derma rolling session  by minimally lubricating my face first with oil there is less irritation as the derma roller strips my face of the natural oils and i have better results less stinging less redness and i do not end the session as a dried out prune  after my derma session i apply my serums followed by the avocado oil i let it absorb for a moment or two and finish off by applying my moisturizer lastas body oil i apply it right after my shower before i towel dry  i receive the same results my skin is softer suppler and the avocado oil seems to retain the moisture better when i apply another body moisturizer on top  in other words my skin does not dry out as fastthere are many different ways to use avocado oil for a scalp and hair treatment i like to mix about 18 tsp in a handful of shampoo when i wash my thick course textured and dry color treated hair  the delivered results are a soft and manageable mane without any greasy or oily residue  instead of the usual dryness my hair retains the moisture until the next wash  for an intense hair and scalp treatment avocado oil is usually used in conjunction with other oils for these treatments  i have tried blending avocado with olive oil and received remarkably positive resultshair and scalp treatment1  blend tsp olive oil tsp avocado oil2  heat up slightlyi used a small glass covered jar for the blended oils and placed the jar in a bowl of very hotwater for about 1520 seconds3  then massage the heated oils in small circular motions directly into scalp and hair for 15 minutes  i have anissue regarding my fingers lockingup during these repetitive motions so i used a gentle shampoo  massagebrush the kent shampoo brush from amazon and this worked very well4  soak a soft towel in warm water and wring out  i used one of my soft toweling hair turbans for this part andwrap around hair for about 15 minutes letting the oils soak into the scalp and hair5  then wash thoroughly followed by usual hair conditioner6  blow dry or style as usualmy results  my hair rinsed out very well no greasy or oily residue and my normally dry hair was very soft and manageable  with the addition of a few spritzes of my argan oil my hair had both body and a little much needed volumeso far all the oils that i have used have provided my skin body and hair with very positive results as a moisturizer for all and as a detangle product and conditioner for my hair  however although i have received positive results each different oil has slightly different benefits so i will continue to use them all for a healthy varietythis concludes my review on avocado oil however if you wish to continue reading i have put together some facts regarding the benefits of avocado oilavocado oil skin benefitsavocados are an excellent source of omega3 fatty acids and vitamins a d and e and can provide skin with deep moisture  the oil of an avocado is able to penetrate the skin with its thin consistency and is still thick enough to serve as a protective barrier on the skin much like a lotionin addition to providing the skin with moisture the antioxidants found in avocado oil  particularly vitamins a and e  can help soothe sunburned skin  avocado oil also contains sterolins which are natural steroids  they may be effective in boosting collagen production and in treating age spots  with its high level of vitamin e avocado oil may reduce itching and inflammation of the skin and is beneficial in softening rough and cracked skinavocado oil hair and scalp benefitsavocado oil is full of hair vitamins that promote and maintain silky healthy and strong hair  it also contains amino acids that bind split ends nourish hair follicles and promote faster hair growth  the various nutrients in avocado oil protect hair from environmental pollution  apart from strengthening the hair strands avocado oil adds a dash of shine and makes hair super soft  in addition massaging the scalp with avocado oil regularly will immediately result in positive changes in hair quality  chemical treatments such as dyes and perms can also make the hair extremely dry and for this situation an application of avocado oil will deliver vitality to damaged hairthank you for reading my review and i hope it has been helpful in describing some of the uses and benefits for using avocado oil
summary: Avocado Oil - Nourishing Sustenance for Skin, Hair, and Scalp

avocado and vitamin e conditioning plates that prevent moisture loss  welllll im not too sure about that  but what i do know is that this thin lightweight straightener does a fine job at straightening hair and smoothing frizz  for years i used a large heavy solano sapphire straightener  until i gave this remington a try after seeing it on sale for half price i didnt know how much easier straightening could be  the straightening effects of the remington are equal to the solano but the remington is significantly easier to use due to its lighter weight and smaller width  its easier to get a firm grip on my hair and it doesnt snag  it heats up quickly and i like the digital temperature displayi would ignore all the marketing hocus pocus and focus on the fact that this is an effective straightener
summary: A little device that makes a lot of promises

reviewText: my 8 year old granddaughter had a field day celebration at her school a few days ago there were lots of outdoor games and the school recommended sunscreen unfortunately she also had a bad case of poison ivy on her arms and face and we worried that the sunscreen would irritate it further we decided to try the cozt pediatric sunscreen and it was just what she needed she was protected against the sun with the spf 40 cream since the cream is gentle and fragrance free it did not irritate her poison ivy a nurse friend said it should be ok as long as we avoided open sores  which we covered with a bandage for the outing we were very relieved and she was happy and sunburn free
summary: Gentle on skin, yet very effective

reviewText: i tried this in the sweet almond and for the first few weeks considered myself a convert aka 34wen girl34 alas the love affair was short lived i have naturally wavycurly thick hair that is fine i just happen to have a ton of it my scalp tends to be oily and my ends dry at first this seemed to make it all better my hair was never softer but after about week 34 my hair just seemeddirty the softness was still there albeit with a sheen that was more oily than healthy shine my root area actually started smelling welldirty i started craving a good old fashioned sudsing it took a good 23 washes before my hair started feeling clean again i still occasionally use the wen i still have some left when i know i am going to be in a humid environment because it really does cut down on frizz but for long term use i just cant do it maybe we are too conditioned to want that squeaky clean fresh smelling hair we all love and not accepting enough of our own natural oils but i have to say sorry wen  it was good while it lasted but old habits are too hard to break
summary: Nice once in a while, but using every day left me greasy

after using this product on its own several times with lackluster and quite frankly piss poor results i think ive at last gotten the hang of using the raw shea butter deep treatment masque the first several times i used this product i was very dissapointed i ended up with strawlike hair and i think that has a lot to do with the shea butter as a main ingredient i cant use shea butter on its own in my hairit dries it out something awful i have to use it in combination with a lighter oil like jojoba grapeseed or olive since the base for this product is shea it would likely leave my hair feeling dry and stripped after i used it this was exactly what happened whenever i used this product on its owni have 3b3c hair so i believe i do not use coconut oil outside of deep conditioning for my hair because i find that it is much too heavy and on me leaves an oily residue that is impossible to remove outside of washing i have fine hair so this may be why coconut oil and i do not get along the only reason why i decided to use this masque was because i was pressed for time lacked several of the main ingredients to make my own diy dry hair treatment masque lacked the money to buy said main ingredients and didnt want to leave my house because i was too comfortable and it was cold outside at the time my hair was very dry due to winter weather and prolonged heat use i had been sitting under a bonnet dryer and doing wet sets for probably 2 months wet sets with perm rods and an hour or so under a dryer were not making my hair happy i needed moisture and it was the one thing i lackedi decided to mix this masque with some unrefined organic coconut oil i had lying around i divided my hair into sections and ran coconut oil through each section and followed it with a good cupped fingerful of the shea moisture organic raw shea butter masque the oil gave the masque more slip than it had previously and the oil seemed to allow the masque to actually sink into the hair and penetrate the shaft instead of just sitting on top of the hair and coating it which is all that i feel that this masque does when used by itself i twisted each section into a chunky bantu knot and covered my hair with a plastic shower cap i left the masque on for probably 2 12 hours maybe closer to 3 then i rinsed out rinsing out my hair felt moisturized and i seemed to shed a lot less hair than i normally doafterwards when i styled my hair it seemed to help my curls define themselves they have trouble with this normally and my hair felt much more moisturized than it had been for monthsthree days out after a no heat styling regimen im pleased to say that my hair seems to be doing a good job of retaining the moisture that the masque seemed to put into it im just now seeing the effects of dryness but its by no means as bad as it was before i started spritzing my hair nightly with some water and teatree oil mixed in and rubbing jojoba oil through my hair before bed seems to help too for dryness the raw shea butter deep treatment masque plus added coconut oil seemed to really do the trick if im out of everything ill use this mixture again but i wont buy another tub of this masque when i run out of iti plan on making my own masque for dry hair when i run out of the shea moisture one less expensive than spending 1000 dont buy this for 23 on amazon in my opinion its only worth about 7 and you can find it at target for 1000 but imho not worth it unless you have nothing else you can find soeasyitspainful recipies for diy dry hair treatments on youtube or on any other curly girl website or blog that will cost less than this to make and will last longer the fact that for me it only works with the coconut oil added is also another mehanother dissapointing shea moisture purchase ill see if i still like the curl enhancing smoothie after winters over and then do a review on that one
summary: Use WITH Coconut Oil Or Not At All

all genuine dermalogica products have the following1 original grey box with barcode sticker sealing the lid of the box2 silver stayfresh seal on the opening of the tube same as most seals on a new jar of peanut butter or medicinevitamin bottle3 if you are buying a larger size bottle with a pump top there will be a half barcode half dermalogica brand name sticker that connects the top of the bottle with the bottom of the lid proving it has never been openthese barcode stickers and seals are only put on by the dermalogica company if your product does not have them you are getting a tampered with expired or knockoff productplease list the seller who sold the inferior product so we can avoid them i love a good deal but these products are expensive and i dont want anyone to loose their money on a scami was going to buy these on amazon and ended up chickening out and paid the extra from a legitimate salon company because i didnt want to get screwed over now im glad i did as i hope this info will help any ladies who are buying on amazon find the honest sellers and avoid the scammersproduct reviewfabulous this cleanser is amazing

reviewText: i dont like to use chemicals and have been going pretty much chem free for over a year now  i have been using henna on my hair as well for over a year after it became so damaged from bleaching that it was breaking off like crazy so true henna will build up and darken on your hair with repeated use and it is a bch to get off because it fusesbonds itself with the hair  most people will just give up and cut it out  i loved henna and my red hair  my husband however despises red hair with a gutteral passionbad ex maybe who knows  he has harped and complained about how much he hates my hair on a daily basis and after a year it starts to wear on your nerves a bit  anyway my hair was getting darker and darker and i did want to lighten it up for summer  so i really didnt want to use bleach but i have tried all the natural remedies with no results whatsoever honey lemonade and olive oil treatments harsh shampooing  i found this in sallys beauty supply for about half the price it is here and got two packages  my hair is in good condition mid back thin to medium  two hours before using the bleach i saturated my hair with pure coconut oil and plastic wrapped it so the heat would help it penetrate  its a tip i learned on the internet that the girls said would help prevent my hair from breaking in the case i needed to bleach it more than once  it works i bleached my hair using a full beyond the zone bleach pack each time two days in a row and aside from being a bit frizzy and of course dry it didnt melt or damage it too much at all  it also does not inhibit the work of the bleach so just go for it after you have had the coconut on your hair for at least two hours more is fine then mix up your bleach and just put it right on top of your coconut oiled hair starting from the tips and working your way up  in case you are wondering if any oil will work they say the coconut works the best so stick with it anyway i left the bleach on my hair for 30 minutes the first day then rinsed and conditioned it air dry  day two 60 minutes  apply your bleach and put a plastic cap over it the heat helps it develop  be sure and do your coconut oil soak before each bleach just saturate it doesnt have to be dripping off  the first bleaching i did didnt lighten it a whole lot but day two lightened it up a lot  its not a banana yellow shade its more a greenishgold blond with a few red streaks here and there  after you rinse and lightly shampoo out the bleach i read that too much shampoovigorous will break the hair then apply a toner while its still wet  i used wella color charm mixed with a 20 vol developer and it will really tone out those crazy spots you get all over from different levels of bleach yellow roots white bangs red above the ears and brown hair below yikes  anyway hope this helps  my hair is not a gorgeous shade of blond i didnt expect it to be  but it is lighter most of the red is gone it didnt fall out and the husband is quietfinally no more ear beatings pupdate i tried putting another toner on it wella t14 which i think used to be silver lady and is now ash blond  now i know that putting ash blond would make the green worse but i did use it especially on the upper above the ears part of my hair that was still so red thisdid not work  i mixed it with a 20 developer for above the ears and a 10 developer for below the ears  it took out about 65 of the red so that my entire head had a more uniform shade of swampy yellow green now as appealing as that sounds i was almost in tears  my hair is too damaged to do much of anything more to it so as a last resort i found an old tube of henna king wild streaks in go go brown that i had from an old henna order  in desperation hoping that it would deposit some brown or something on my hair i mixed it in a bowl with enough conditioner to cover my whole head  i put enough of the wild streaks stuff in to make the color a dark brown almost coffee ground color  it was a thick muddy consistency but i smeared it in  after all how much worse can it get so i sat around looking like a muddy swamp monster for about 45 minutes hair uncovered i washed it out and hallelujah i can leave my house again without fear of being captured and sold to the circus anyway the color of my hair is unexpected  it did not turn it brown at all only softened the red and completely got rid of the green  my hair is a uniform color i would call it a ronald mcdonald orange or maybe vibrant psycho demented clown orange  i read somewhere that red color is a sort of filler for hair that has been damaged from bleach and i can honestly say that it works great on green so i used argan one and only in light chocolate brown with a level 10 developer problem solved or so i thought it came out a nice color washed out in only two shampoos with cool water and organic very gentle shampoo and gave me the worst headache ever i ended up using a demi permanent color ion warm red with a 10 developer  it worked well enough but still had a slight green hue especially after a wash  its still an improvement from before  lesson learned if you intend to henna realize that its very permanent  very permanent

first of all this candy limited edition is nice lookingthis is not a big factor for me personally but it is a nice extra  some of the positive factors include that is heats up very quickly  it does a nice job straighteningbetter than my 50 drug store iron and about the same as my other professional one with a few less passes needed  so these say a lot for the product  the cord is a nice length and allows for some movementthe things i really do not like are the fact that it does not lie securely on a sink top without tipping to the side and this concerns me as i do not want to burn the sink nor do i want to start a fire  the other big issue is that the control is on the inside and this creates the potential to burn yourself when turning the iron off  also there are no heat controlsit is just the one setting there are no heat controls so you cannot adjust temperatureso overall it needs improvements if they want 200 for the iron but it does a nice job  anyone in the market for a new iron should weigh the issues  if the negatives mentioned dont matter to you then this is a good choice for you

reviewText: i tried this our the other day and loved it  for experienced peelers this is an awesome in betweenmaintenance peel  this would be one of those peels i would use before my monthly breakout  clears up the skin nicely leaving it more evenly toned and smooth  this would have been my beginners choice when i first started peels  i dont know how i missed it here on amazon  i love all of the ingredients in this stuff  so now i will use it as a my maintenance peel and let my teenager use some for clearer skin  though i do warn it does have lactic acid so a neutralizer is necessary hell neutralize with any peel i mean cmon what does baking soda cost now a days  60 cents a box anyway 30 seconds or one minute at the most for the first time on new skin  youll be red for the first day or so so moisturize and wait  youll love the results  dont be inpatient with peels some of them you wont see the results for two days depending on your skin type  i was inpatient and learned the hard way  have fun with this one

reviewText: our home has a lot of wood in it  hardwood floors custom paneled rooms custom woodwork kitchen cabinets bathroom cabinets and about 38 six panel hardwood doors  that is a lot of cleaning if you want things to look nice  murphys oil soap is a first class cleaner that beautifully cleans wood and leaves behind a nice fragrance and no film residueyou can also use it on tables chairs bookcases and all of the other surfaces i listed above  it is also good for nonwood surfaces like no wax floors ceramic tile vinyl cars and painted surfaces  the nice thing about this product is that it is gentle on your home but it cleans well and smells good and fresh  our parents used it because it is inexpensive and works and we still use it for the same reasonsmake sure that you do mix it according to the directions  it only takes  cup per gallon of warm water for most cleaning jobs  heavy duty cleaning use  cup  on floors make sure that you mop with a slightly damp mop and dont leave too much water  people tend to use too much of anything so measure carefullydo not use this product on any unfinished unsealed or waxed woods as they may be water sensitive and could cause damage  when in doubt test a small inconspicuous area with plain water first  make sure that you wipe wood surfaces of excess water to prevent water damage right off the label
