i received mine today just tried it on and i am so disappointed as another seller described the part is really bad not natural looking at all the unit i received has hair completely missing right at for fun they say blondes have more fun right differences in as pictured the hair is very poofy on the top portion with really strange looking long bangs right in the front that fall directly into your face and they are not as curly as the rest of the unit so unfortunately the bangs dont blend at allthe bottom is quite thin in comparison to the top poofy hair so the unit looks very unbalanced and unnatural it is not evenly layered and curly all the way down its separated into a poofy top and a thin bottom maybe its just the one i received but i would definitely not recommend it and will be returning it asap note  the cap is quite large so if you have a medium to smaller size head the sides of the cap are far too long and theres no way to change the fact that to wear the piece fitted to your head if its smaller than this cap it literally would have to be worn over your ears on my head the sides of the capunit are approximately 1 14 too long so its literally impossible to wear unless i want to wear it really loose on my head with the back of the unit all loose and puffing out this also leaves the sides sitting very uncomfortably and very itchy on and behind your ears also if youve worn a true lace wig you would mostly likely not like this uniti will give it one compliment though the hair is soft and not too shiny it also has a nice amount of dark grown out root some just have too much this one has just the right amounti have another unit from freetress enya which is a true lace front and has a much better invisible part and fits very well on my head however i did cut the enya unit a bit as the hair is quite long and tangles at its initial length however after washing the unit cutting it and  using a really good conditioner  bobos remi leavein conditioner  the enya unit its a winner for a fun change it doesnt cost much more than the bently and its totally worth the extra cost the enya is nice and thick and has great curls one length all the way downokay ladies ive probably written too much but just wanting to give you a heads up and some other good advice

so my hair has been dyed professionally before and ive always been left with a burning scalp and lots of hair fall afterwards  i have very thick coarse hair so i knew i wasnt going to go bald but it was bad enough for me to worry about what effect the dye was having on my body  i recently decided i wanted to change back to a blonder color but being a grad student i am on a shoestring budget and didnt want to pay to go to a hairdresser and have highlights done that just grow out within a month anyway  so i came across this stuff here on amazon and selected the wheat germ blonde  the first time i used it my hair came out goldenred but only at the roots  so weird  then i went out and bought a box on the light ash blonde color to try and tone it down  it did work a bit but there was still a bit of orange gold color to my roots  this past time i went to the store and bought a box each of the light ash and the light dawn blonde  i was very scared my hair was going to turn either full blown orange or go platinum  i mixed half of the light dawn blonde and half of the light ash blonde into the squeeze bottle i just eyeballed it and crossed my fingers  my hair came out a couple shades blonder no hint of red or orange and it has highlights  so im going to keep mixing half light ash into any of the colors i use and continue to gradually lighten my hair up i want it to eventually be a medium colored ash blonde  also i noticed the scent of this stuff as being kind of like licorice but with a chemical undertone  not nearly as yucky as the stuff the salons use but i found it noticeable when i was applying it  also my scalp did burn slightly when using the dye but i didnt have the hair fall like i did with the other salon stuff  i strongly recommend finding a really gentle shampoo and conditioner if your scalp is sensitive  i use the giovanni 2chic avocado and olive oil ultramoist shampoo and conditioner and they save my hair and scalp from utter destruction  i also use keratin masks once a week to keep my hair from drying out  heres my advice to other first time users of this product and first time athome hair dyersif your hair turns out orange or red mix half of one of the ash colors with the shade you want to achieve the next time you dye  using the light ash blonde by itself didnt have much of a dramatic effect on taking away the orange in my hair but mixing it with the other blonde shade light dawn blonde and then applying that mixture did have a big effectmake sure you really mix the color before you put it on your hair  the box recommends shaking the bottle for two minutes before applying i set a timer to make sure i do a full two minutes  dont let it sit and settle after you have mixed it either as this seems to mess with how the color turns outuse the shampoo and cream conditioning treatment provided  remember to leave the conditioning treatment on for at least the recommended two minutes this seems to help how the color comes out  then i followed with my regular giovanni shampoo and conditioner and left that conditioner on for another couple minutes to really soothe my hair and scalpvisit the naturtint website and figure out the closest shade to your natural hair color  these dyes are only supposed to lighten your hair a couple of shades lighter at a time  mine is somewhere between the 4n natural chestnut and the 8a ash blonde but the 8n wheat germ blonde shade still turned my hair golden red at the roots when i didnt mix it with the 10a light ash blondedont be scared to use a lighter blonde color than what you want to achieve if you are using it to mix with one of the ash colors  i certainly dont want to be platinum blonde but the 10n light dawn blonde mixed with the 10a light ash blonde lightened my hair a couple of shades without turning it red or orange and instead left me with lovely natural looking highlights  my hair is still a light browndark blonde color after using this mix of colorsi wouldnt recommend buying hair dye off of the internet sight unseen  its best to go to the nearest retailer that sells naturtint and pick out the shade or shades that you like and try them  once you figure out what shades work best for your hair then you can buy them from amazoni think this hair dye really is made for mixing  with the light dawn blonde and the light ash blonde colors mixed my hair has natural looking highlights and avoids that telltale dyed hair look of monotone coloroverall i recommend this hair dye  just dont give up on it if you dont get it right the first time and remember to be gentle to your hair and scalp
summary: It Took A Few Attempts to Get On the Right Track...

i am very sensitive to chemicals fragrances many soaps etc i was worried i would be allergic to this but was desperate to find something to help my gritty oily eyelids my soap and water would burn my eyes and make them red because in order to get the oils and grit off near my eyelashes i would inevitably get the soap into my eyes i tried one of these pads first on one eye in case i was allergic i was not allergic and in fact the skin around my eye felt so silky soft after using this product so the next day i used it on both sides my eyes have not felt so well in years this gets rid of the oily grit but does not burn or sting i dont think it is getting into my eyes at all and still it is cleansing the lash area people who wear eyeglasses are more likely to get oily gritty eyelid problems it has something to do with the glasses not allowing proper air flow around the eyesthese pads are expensive for daily use and as some have said you might try cutting the little pads into and making them last longer there is a foamy liquid made by ocusoft but i have not tried it some people say it is not as good as these pads maybe because the pad not only contains the mild soapy product but also the pad is textured to allow a gentle scrubbing effect they are easy to use just open the packet remove the pad clean eyelids rinse with lukewarm water pat dry and gritty oils are goneif you have eyelid problems i recommend giving these a try i am glad to have them

reviewText: i have never had microdermabrasion so i wasnt quite sure what to expect microdermabrasion is for aging or damaged skin it isnt for acne it helps get rid of those fine lines and facial scarringthis machine basically vibrates a small metal plate reminds me of a metal nail file against your skin as it suctions the vibration is caused by the suction you rub it over the problem areas and it renews your facei did not notice much difference in my fine lines admittedly i dont have many it did make my face feel fresh and awake after it seems to increase the circulation to my face and give me a more youthful appearance in that waythe tips for this machine have to be replaced every 10 usesnubrilliance precision diamond tip 11 countyou can order replacements through amazon it comes with 3 tips for various uses each tip needs to be replaced after 10 sessions each filter needs to be replaced every 23 sessions so know that there will be a small upkeep cost in this machineit works really well i have not had problems with it loosing its suction or had any difficulties with the machine itself it also comes in a very pretty box if you were thinking about purchasing this as a gift

reviewText: i was contacted by aria to test this product and i received a complimentary sample of the product all opinions included in this review are my honest opinions on the productim really specific about facial moisturizers and skincare treatments many facial moisturizers that ive used have no helpful anti aging ingredients and this one is loaded with them namely hyaluronic acid 5 different types of peptides silk amino acids aloe and vitamin c just to name a fewso far my experience with this moisturizer has been great i dont have a lot of wrinkles but i do have expression lines around my mouth which bother me a lot my skin isnt as lustrous as i want it to be since i tend to be a little bit dryused in conjunction with their  collagen tripeptide firming serum my skin has gotten a lot better i dont have dryness anywhere and my skin is definitely smoother as a result i think the restorative age defying results come from skin that is well moisturized and better able to receive and absorb the nutrients and antiaging ingredients in this moisturizerin addition to my skin getting a little more soft and smooth it is also more supple and firm in the areas around my eyes my mouth nasolabial folds the outer smile line that connects with the nostrils when you smile and on my chin and neck it took about 3 weeks for me to notice this but ill definitely continue using this product to see how much better it will getim not that easy to please when it comes to skincare but this moisturizer has given me great quality results for my thirsty and sometimes difficult skin

i watched a few youtube reviews by women with hair as close to mine as i could find before i decided to try this product  the ladies in the videos made it look so easy that i decided to give it a try and here are my resultsfirst off my hair is half way down my back very thick and wavy  the texture of my hair is coarse and tends to be frizzy before styledpersonally i am very pleased with the spin brush using it on fully wet hair  however when i followed the directions and air dried my hair 80  90 as recommended i got frizz and poofy hair that required a straightener to smooth down into a style that i felt was presentablenormally it takes me an hour to style my hair after it air dries using my chi flat iron and tons of product  this was a one step process that took my hair from completely wet to styled in around 20  25 minutes which i found very impressive  i used a few sprays of hair strengthener a thermal protector and a drop of smoothing serum to assure that i got the best results on both the wet and mostly dry hair methodsmy concern is with the completely wet styling method  hair is at its weakest when wet and the styler could snap the hair off during styling and to be honest with you i did notice a few strands of hair in the spin brush after stylingi have only had my spin brush a short time and i love the time saving that the wet method allows me but would love to hear from someone who has used the styler long term about hair breakage and damage
summary: Very pleased using spin brush on wet hair but not so much on mostly dry hair

reviewText: no frizz  my fine thick wavy hair really likes this dryer  the diffuser sets the wave and the dryer is hot enough to dry quickly  although i wish i knew why theres a plastic shield on the diffuser  it makes no sense  my former dry was a ceramic conair and it was great until the diffuser no longer would stay snapped in place  with this dryer the diffuser and concentrator nozzle lock into place and have a release button so that solves that problem  all in all a great product

reviewText: the phrase strong and full is a big deceiving because the odor of this shampoo is quite mild which i prefer a little bit lathers into many suds so this bottle should last a long time so many washings from this bottle means an economic deal it really cleans your hair well and even 24 hours later after sleeping my hair still feels quite clean and not greasy at all for me and this is a personal gripe this shampoo does indeed give you full hair since i dont need my hair to stand up taller than it already does i probably wont be using this shampoo much if you have thinner hair and want your hair to appear bigger and fuller this shampoo should do the trick

reviewText: i have fine long hair so most deep moisturizers leave my locks limp and lifeless however after applying an ample amount of this deep treatment mask and leaving it in for 3 minutes before rinsing it out my hair was still full of body  what suprised me about this mask is that it did not moisturize any better than a daily conditioneri really like the fresh scent and am glad my dry hair had body after using this product nevertheless i would have liked if this deep conditioning mask moisturized a little more than it did  had it done that i would have rated this 4 or 5 stars  for me its just like any daily hair moisturizer that smells nice

idk why but this oil makes my hair super soft versus the other oils i usei havent noticed growth as much yet when i leave this on over night  wash out the next morning my hair is silky soft  so shinymy aunt who had cancer underwent chemo  lost all her hair i gave her a bottle of this right when she stopped chemo  after about a year using this every night her hair grew back thicker  fuller than beforeshe is very happy with this producti on the other hand do not use this every night so i havent had such great success i do however love this product and will continue to use it

im almost 30 and still have acne like im 13 i also have generally oily skin that is sensitive ive been trying various washes over the past fews years and so far this is the best ive come across its not that harsh on my skin doesnt leave it overly red and doesnt effect its sensitivity afterwards it does a great job at getting rid of acne building thats already there and actually preventing it i can occasionally go a day or so without a shower and no longer worry about the previously inevitable breakout as a result after 6 months im still very impressed with this product and will continue to use im sure people will react differently to different products so if youre looking for a good daily wash for acne id definitely give this one a shot

i had tried the companion conditioner and liked it very much so i tried this shampoo i have thick coarse hair so something that is lightweight sounded like a good idea i find that too many shampoos make my hair feel like straw during the rinse and i end up using more conditioner to compensate this shampoo is borderline in that regard my hair feels a little dry during the rinse but it doesnt quite step over the line into straw territory it is lightweight and thats nice  when you have hair thats already quite heavy for me i think the conditioner is the stronger component of this line im not sure ill buy this shampoo again just because it doesnt appear to be remarkable to be worth nexxus  however its pretty good and im willing to bet that women with normal hair will find it to be just right

reviewText: this review is from beenigma bee venom cream miscmy wife has been using this facial cream we see results and saw them in about 3 days we dont know how longlasting this will be the result is a slight puffing or fullness of the facial skin along with her reported feelings of rejuvenationthis has been a fun experience bee venom causes a sensation thats pretty interesting i couldnt help but research why this makes sensebee venom is used in various medicinal products including some that deliver therapy for joint disease the venom is obtained by delivering a mild electric shock though glass causing bees to sting the glass and the venom to run off into collectionon contact with the skin the venom causes local inflammation and also prevents clotting of the blood since it is an anticoagulant this then stimulates the skin to produce collagen collagen is the most abundant protein in our bodiesthe other ingredients include manuka honey shea butter and vitamin e manuka honey is an expensive dark monofloral honey produced from the nectar of the manuka tree and has a long history of use as a topical healing agent for wounds and burns manuka honey is antibacterial shea butter is a complex fat from the nuts of the west african shea and is widely used in skin care productsbased on our experience this product works at least in the short term the experience using it is stimulatingi received a sample in the expectation that i would provide an honest review which i have done

reviewText: i see that there are a lot of vitamin c serums on the market now this is the first time i have ever used this type of product for my face and am happy with the results the bottle i received from azure naturals came with an eye dropper or a squirt top i have been using the squirt top and then spraying the serum into my hand i then rub the liquid between my hands and onto my face it has an unique smell that i think is quite pleasant it instantly absorbs into my skin so there is no mess and leaves my face feeling soft and smooththis product ive tried is professional strength so i know it is of the highest quality and can give the best results i am also happy to report that the azure naturals vitamin c serum is made in the usa which is always a plus in my booki definitely think this is a product worth trying out to see what it can do for you because of the sun elements and aging our skin needs all the help it can get azure naturals vitamin c may be just the thing to fill in those gaps with the nutrients our skin lacks and needsi received one or more of the products mentioned above for free regardless i only recommend products or services i use personally and believe will be good for my readers

reviewText: when i got this i was fighting a very nasty rash from itching which the doctors still dont know what it was i think its psoriasis this lotion was gone in 2 days but boy did it make me not itchy for a good solid few hours and i havent had that in so long this rash has be itching all day long and its horrible this lotion came out in a pump like bottle and pretty good size even though it was gone in two days it made my skin soft smooth and nourished this is probably the best lotion i have had in a long time it worked so well and soaked into the skin right away and there was not very much smell to it

i love this product for years i was frustrated with lotions and hand creams because most on the market are either greasy like shea butter or contain alcohol alcohol products disinfect your skin but they also dry it outhence you are constantly having to reapply the product to keep hands soft not so with udderly smoothoriginally designed as an udder cream for dairy farmers this stuff is smooth creamy and contains no alcohol it takes a few moments to rub into your hands legs arms heels or wherever to make skin silky smooth i live in the high desert so especially in the wintertime its a challenge to keep my skin moisturized this does the tricksince it comes in a jar ladies with long fingernails may find it a little tricky to access the cream without getting it under your nails if you get the handy pump that fits the jar its even more convenientjust make sure you stir the lotion before trying to use itfor you crafty or green types the jar is reusable just peel the plastic labels off the lid and sides and then wash you wind up with a pristine white container just the right size for storing paperclips rubber bands qtips etc

reviewText: i bought the neutrogena ultra sheer spf70 sun protection prior to a recent trip to peru and ecuador during which i expected to be out in the midday sun at high elevation which amplifies the damaging effect of the suns rays i carried it with me every day and applied it liberally to my face neck ears and arms  anything that was exposed since it was quite hot and humid and i was perspiring a lot i applied it again later in the day i managed to avoid any sunburn at all and since it is nearly unscented it did not attract mosquitoes or other insectsim so impressed with the sheer nongreasy unscented formula that ive started using it as my daily sun protection and will continue to do so throughout the summer previously i would only use a high spf lotion when i knew i was going to be outdoors for hours  mainly because i do not like the greasy texture and strong scent i use the spf lotion along with my other moisture cream and foundation and have had no problems with reddening rashes etc other reviewers have reported skin sensitivities as with any other new product that you use you should indeed test it on a small area prior to slathering it all your face

reviewText: this concealer works well to mask the discolorations that i have on my face i dont like to use a heavy cakey foundation especially not in summer when it is too hot to wear a face full of makeup instead i just dab a bit of this concealer on my discolorations and it blends in nicely to hide them it is also long lasting and i dont need to reapply it all day the cream color works well for me and i am sort of pale it also blends well with my skin and is not orangey like some other brands of concealer that i have triedthe product goes on in a liquid state and i let it sit for about two seconds then i quickly blend it by dabbing my finger on it and spreading the product around the discolorationfor blemishes i apply the concealer differently if they have any redness around them you know how a blemish can have the zit part and then in a circle around the zit is sort of red and slightly inflamed sometimes well in that case i put tiny dots of the concealer circling around the redness and let it sit for two seconds and then blend it in upward into the zit by lightly dabbing the concealer inward with my finger i read this tip in a beauty article once and it has really helped me to better cover red blemishesanother reviewer mentioned using a qtip to get out extra product before throwing it away and i think that is a great tip so because of its great coverage and lasting power i would recommend maybellines super stay 24 hour concealer
summary: Great coverage, long lasting, and blends well

reviewText: i like it a lotive tried several neutrogena facial cleansers over the years as i have somewhat sensitive skin during certain parts of the year and my skin seems to agree with the various cleansers neutrogena has some ive liked more than others however after using it for a few days this one pretty much tops the listthe scent struck me first as something i really like about it its very cleansmelling and mild and even a little floral perhaps men wont like it as much the consistency is something between liquid and gel not foam like the label may lead you to believe which i like  it doesnt just wash away on my hand when i wet it with water but it still rinses off my face smoothly and easily it leaves my skin feeling clean without feeling totally dried outi also love that there doesnt seem to be extra stuff in it that need not be there the last cleanser i bought looked aesthetically pleasing with little shimmery sparkles and grapefruit pink gel and i couldnt help but feel that this extra stuff in it to make it look nice doesnt actually do anything for my skin  so why pay for it this neutrogena cleanser is just clear and cleanlooking  perfectif youre a fan of theneutrogena oilfree acne wash 91 ounce pack of 3but dont have acne or want something thats even more gentle this is the one for youedit in hindsight i shouldve added that i do the whole shebang morning and night i clean my face using cleanser then follow up with toner and a moisturizer skin is looking clearer than ever

great product that does exactly as it says i have sensitive skin but with your normal oily t zone i also wear tubing mascara and allday shadow which can be hard to remove one pump of this and some warm water after massaging it in and nothing is on face is clean but not tight with zero residue this is nonfoaming but your skin feels very fresh this size bottle will last you a few months if you use it once to twice a day

i purchased both this and the instyler and found both to be helpful in styling my coarse fine 12 relaxed 12 natural 34ab hair  i started with the pantene keratin shampoo and conditioner and tressemee conditioner keratin smooth then washed it all out and put the pantene leave in keratin as well as the tressemme keratin serum and tressemme keratin heat protect keratin spray  then dried my hair with a blowdrier and comb attachment  when dry i then sprayed on the renpure originals brazilian 4 day straight leave in spray and then followed with the prostyler and the instyler i used a lot of the renpure spray particularly on the new growth portion  since i just took my braids out and knew that i would have more resistant hair i slept i  the shea butter curl smoothie and wore my hair in a bun with that in there for a whole day before attempting this experimentmy hair looks like i have a keratin treatment  did not revert even in yesterdays snow storm i also sprayed it with 2 types of hair spray after  all i can say is that for styling different parts of your head particularly if you have different lengths and different hair textures you willl really prefer the prostyler  i actually used both on different settings and with all the keratin protective products did not lose any hair  so i recommend using some good protective products and go for it  by the way i bought the 34 inch prostyler and the regular instyler  i liked using less heat than a flat iron and not burning the hell out of my hair as this seemed much gentlerthe hair was dry at the end of the day but i just put some castor oil on ends the hair and roller set it with magnetic rollers in pink and took it out in the morning  my hair was not soft but not dehydrated but really straight  i also had some nice volume because i am terrible at using hot appliances with my hairi am all thumbs with hair styling and dread going to the hairdresser  i have such a sense of accomplishment using both tools and getting a great result  hope this helpsjust remember i have some repetitive stress issues in my arms and hands and found that both together relieved any tension from another appliance and enabled me to complete the job  i no longer fear getting my hair braids out knowing i can walk out of the house without fear

the reason i tried this product is that i received it in error when ordering something else  it is not something i would have ordered for myselfin order to reduce the spread of germs many things are automatic these days  doors toilets faucets etc  it is definitely nice to have some of these things when out in public  however i dont feel if it is necessary for home use  as far as this  automatic soap dispenser goes it is an interesting idea and works well  i have read that refillable liquid soap dispensers can become bacterialladen  i believe this happens during the refilling process plus the fact that the soap at the bottom of the dispenser never gets emptied out  obviously between the dispenser batteries and individual refills this system is more costly than just buying liquid soap refill  in fact refill bottles alone are more expensive than a similar size liquid hand soap pump  in my opinion for regular home use this product is probably not necessary as long as you use care when refilling the soap and completely emptyclean out your dispenser from time to time or just replace the liquid hand soap pump occasionally instead of refilling  i like the product but for the extra cost i think ill stick with my refillable dispenser
summary: Kind of expensive for home use

i found this brand while looking for a large domed shaped eyeshadow brush like the sonia kashuk one from target i couldnt find one at sephora or ulta and only found one that matched what i wanted in an eyeshadow set by real techniques  i didnt want to buy the set since i already had other eyeshadow brushes and didnt need them but them anyway because the price of the set was cheaper than some of the individual brushes i owned but i figured id give them away i ended up loving the brushes and giving away some of my more expensive brushesi went to their website and they offer some great instructional videos and that is how i found this brush i ordered it and am really satisfied  its soft minimal shedding easy to clean great application  i love the colored handles because they make them easy to find the one you are looking for which speeds things up and lessens frustration a bit when you are in a hurryi have a sephora pro airbrush 55 foundation brush and i tried applying my foundation on one side of the face with that one and the other side with the real techniques brush and couldnt really tell a difference  i think the real techniques brush is easier to blend because the brushes are shorter and firmer so you can make the application sheerer and but its smaller than the sephora airbrush and takes longer to apply so i end up using the airbrush more the smaller size does allow for me detailed application as welli am rather impressed that it gives the same results as the more expensive sephora brush and overall happy with it i have kept both one for when i am taking my time and want either sheerer or more detailed application and the other for speedy application

reviewText: i absolutely love final seal matte makeup sealer i was leary at first because it was a little pricier than i would have liked but now that i have had it for several months and use it every day it is worth every penny i had an unfortunate issue with very bad acne that has since cleared up but left me with only half of my eyebrows on both sides i have nice full eyebrows until about midway through where it should continue but the hair is so sparse that you can barely see it because of this i need to draw in my eyebrows on the 34missing34 areas its very frustrating because no matter what i try they rub off soooo easily all it takes is me accidently brushing my eyebrow against something and it smudges and leaves me completely embarrassed and needing to run away and reapply my brow pencil i bought the final seal makeup sealer in hopes that it would alleviate this atleast slightly while it does not completely correct the issue of my smudged eyebrows it does keep the pencil on much much better and keeps it from becoming oily and smuding for the most part it also seems to keep all of my makeup in place also it seems to keep eyeshadow from creasing if you make sure to apply it right at your eyelids you only need a very small amount every day so although the bottle is somewhat small it last a really really long time it has a nice minty scent to it when you first spray it on but the smell doesnt linger so you dont smell like mint all day long i would recommend this to anyone who is trying to keep their makeup from smudging or just to keep it in place it is a great product
summary: Amazing Product! Can't go a day without it!

i will start by saying that ive used ambiances dry shampoo before and i would rate that 5 however i have recently started to get brazilian blowouts regularly and because of that i have switched all my products to lines that advertise being sulfatefree and keratinenriched i came across this product by searching for keratin shampoo and i thought id give it a tryi have very dark brown hair so i ordered the brunettes version upon first use i was cautious as the color is lighter tan my hair i tried my best to not douse my routes with the powder and tried to carefully work around the area it was still very obvious and visible however when i really worked it in and flipped my head upside down and let the excess powder fall off wow it really gave my roots a very nice lifti have now learned how to control the pour it comes out pretty generously if you are not careful and ive been using it between washes it works really well my hair does not feel oily at all and if i work it in well it does not look powdery either a good dry shampoo should be impossible to detect and i think this one does a good job it also smells great which is a bonus
summary: A little pricey and tricky to use, but it really eliminates the oily feel and lifts your roots.

new cream for me but it seems already to work nicely i gave it four stars rather than five because of the lemony smell yuck it smells like a household cleaner already though it doesnt clog my pores like the reviva organic antioxidant and texturizing day creami did read plenty of rave reviews for this before i made the purchase so far so goodjust really dont like the smell for a face cream thankfully it doesnt linger

reviewText: i have been using this  i dont see any different another wast of money i even use it with the tummy belt and nothing

im not impressed with dove deep moisture nourishing body wash i squeeze out an amount equal to about the size of a ping pong ball on my washcloth while in the shower and try to lather up with it but theres very little lather one bottle wouldnt last very long using this amount each time you shower this is more akin to rubbing yourself down with a water soluble body lotion and then rinsing it off lots of lather doesnt necessarily mean youre clean but at least it makes you feel clean this product is also extremely thick and hard to squeeze out of the bottle but it does rinse off clean it leaves you soft so it might be okay for someone with sensitive skin issues this was my first and will be the last purchase for meplease rate this review if you found it helpful

reviewerName: Desert Gypsy "A Brooklyn Girl Out West"
reviewText: as a former makeup artist as far as cosmetics go i try a lot buy some and rave about very few the orgasm shade of this illuminator does what makeup should do  enhance your own beauty it is one of those rare products that just makes you look dewyer prettier betterwhen used with a very sparing hand it brings out an inner golden peachy glow that looks diffused and natural i use this on my cheeks mostly for night time looks you could also place a little wherever light hits first  brow bone collarbone etc takes just the tiniest bit this little tube would literally last me for years very impressed with this product and highly recommended

im always tempted by other skin cleaners but no matter what i always work my way back to purity made simple its simply the best skin cleanser ive ever used it dissolves makeup and leaves my skin fresh and clean it also works great with the clairsonici love amazon but sometimes the prices are just crazy im on philosophys mailing list and got a 40 percent off coupon with free shipping 15 percent coupons on the real price for this side  52  are all over the internet check out their website before you buy
summary: My favorite cleanser (and way cheaper at Philosophy)

reviewText: i bought a book on amazon calle 34how to look  expensive34 which should tell you all youll ever need to know about me  anyway the author suggested wearing a coat of essie pop art pink and a coat of rock candy which i dutifully ordered and brought to my manicurist the evidence keeps piling up doesnt it she normally uses opi which ive been fine with but she noted how much better essie was smoother and shinier  these colors leaves nails a soft natural shiny pale pink  very elegant  if they were to chip i doubt anyone would notice  mine dont chip because my manicurist is that good  to me they look a little plain and i  ussually cover them with a coat of blue or purple a few days before going back for another manicur just to relieve the boredom but i seriously recommend essie and these two colors are great
you will not be disappointed in this great skin care producti has so many great vitamins in it for your skini have very dry sensitive skin and this left my skin feeling moisturized and looking great
i love this i have two palettes  but the only negative comment i have is the picture looks creamy right not the case when applied its more cake like my only complaint

i color my naturally mediumdark brunette hair red at the moment and red hair is notorious for fading fast so im always looking for conditioners to help preserve my color  this one was just okay it worked pretty well to keep my red vibrant for a few weeks but frankly the state it left my hair in postshower wasnt very impressivethe product itself is very thick and pasty and it reminds me of the conditioner that comes with my hair color feria which i actually hate  it feels like youre trying to work toothpaste through your hair  the smell is pleasant enough but it does take some work to rinse it out well enough that you dont end up with greasy hairpostconditioning my hair felt okay  it was reasonably soft but this conditioner did nothing to help with frizz and like i said if you dont rinse it well enough it leaves your hair gunky and grossill probably use it once a week for the color preservation benefits but ill stick with other conditioners the rest of the time
summary: Pretty good at color preservation but didn't wow me

i have used this befor it is great for soft nailsthe hole line is great my nails are healing nowafter one use great product

this is a cut and paste from the review i wrote for the 6oz tube of the same product note this is for the shea and vitamin e versionevery winter i go through the same thing  it starts on my calves  they get so dry that i itch them even in my sleep and they inevitably get bloody and scabbed up i know it is gross  then it would spread to my other dry zones which is pretty much my whole body at this pointevery year i try several different moisturizers with little success  in particular i find that the average lotion quits working after just a few hours and my skin begins to get dry againthis year on a whim i picked up the berts bees chapstick at a local pharmacy  i really liked it so i thought let me try their moisturizer  then i saw this one which says it lasts 24 hours  i thought to myself that this was something worth trying  frankly i dont know how they do it but this lotion truly does last up to 24 hourseven on very very dry skinafter just a few days of use the red blotchyness on my skin my hands and arms in particular has receded  the scabs from the scratching are all healing and i dont have that tight feeling to my skin anymore  after so many years of using moisturizers that either didnt work or made the dryness worse this is amazing  not only has the itchiness stopped but my skin looks smooth and has a pleasing sheen to it  i never ever thought the back of my hands would look like anything other than a troll monster from under a bridge but they actually look pretty good now  and only after a few daysto say im impressed would be an understatementnow as with all things it isnt all good  the smell of the lotion is not great  it is by no means bad but at least to me it smells a little odd  also it is expensive  even this discounted 3 pack is around 1 dollar an ounce and lets face it 6oz goes pretty fast when you are using it from head to toe  lastly it takes a lot of work to spread it out on my skin and i have to work quickly because it absorbs fast  if you leave it in one place too long it will absorb too much there and leave that part of your skin feeling greasyhaving said all that i dont think this lotion is for everyone  if you have really bad dry skin i cannot recommend it highly enough  if you have normal skin you may find the smell a little offputting the cost too high and difficult to spread it evenly  that is fine not every moisturizer is for every skin type  but seriously if you have really bad dry skin and have tried everything not so fasttry this product  youll be glad you did click add to cart and get it done  my skin feels better than i can remember and in the dead of wintervery pleased
iam not sure yet i have had it 1 week i love the murad products but just cannot say at this time

ive used nailtiques for years and i believe that it keeps my nails strong helps prevent splitting and lengthens the time my manicures last i do use three coats with each manicure two as a base coat two coats of polish and then a third coat of nailtiques then a third coat of polish then a topcoat of seche vita my manicures last 1   2 weeks with only occasional minor repairs usually the reason i do another manicure is because my nails have grown out this is a great product

i like shower gels that make my skin feel hydrated after i get out of the shower this one didnt deliver its a 3in1 combo shampoobath gelbubble bath which i usually stay away from but it was priced right and philosophy is a pretty good brand also i know its pink so i didnt expect it to smell masculine but it smells really girly

i just left the same sort of review on the shampoo of this seti adore the its a 10 miracle leave in product plus keratin so i changed from my usual keratin shampoo and conditioner to try this its a 10 miracle deep conditioner plus keratin and its goodbut not the best ill be switching back to my original favorite suave professionals keratin infusion smoothing conditioner but im never getting rid of the its a 10 miracle leave in cause that stuff seriously changes your lifethis conditioner was good but not quite as good as the shampoo of the same set but it does make hair smoother and a bit shinier more manageable i should explain that ive got a whitegirl fro happening whenever i wash my hair with 34normal34 products and ive learned over time to manage it this shampoo is definitely a vast improvement to washing my hair with normal formulations but its not quite as great as it could be the hair is less weighed down which can be good but the ends tend to be a bit flyaway though not truly static frizzy with this conditioner overall its very good but not good enough to dethrone the suave keratin shampoo and conditionerby the way if you havent heard already if you have frizzy dry unmanageable hair its best to 34cowash34 as they call it put conditioner in your hair first on dry hair even if you can manage it and leave it in for at least a few minutes i put conditioner on finish the rest of my shower routine and as the very last step i use shampoo on my hair just the rootscrown area not the ponytailends area and it makes a huge difference i think thats one reason this set doesnt work as well for me because it really wants the conditioner second like normal and the results are good but it just doesnt sink in and seal the cuticle with 34good34 moisture the way 34cowashing34 canbut i would still say give this a try

motions pink oil moisturizer is great for all types of hair especially for those with difficult types the new pink lotion formula now includes  shea butter and a five vitamin blend to keep your hair feeling soft and healthy all you do is shake well and apply to your hair wet or dry leave it in and style as you normally wouldi use it on my hair which is multiracial thick and curlywave and it works wonders i also use it on my daughters hair instead of hair detangler spray as it does the same thing and last days if you dont wash it out inbetween  its a 10 out of 10 for me or ok 5 out of 5
summary: Motions Lotion is back and still great!

yes whether you spell it kleen cleen klene or clean your skin is thoroughly cleansed and gently exfoliated  lets face it pun intended all of us need a bit of facial exfoliation unless of course were still in junior high  get refreshed does it effectively without any harshness or reddening of skin  simply leaves your face softer smoother and an extra plus is a tightening of poresthe results are what you might expect from a highpriced spa treatment  not only is skin glowingly clean but it feels supple elastic  not any trace of a tightening taut after effectanother benefit for all of us living  breathing and shopping  in the usa today is the reasonable price for a 446 fluid ounce bottle  the recommended use is 23 times a week  2 does it for me so were talking pennies for a treatmentthanks vitaedisclosure this product was sent for review consideration

category called worst hair in the world  in the guinness book of world records if i can get this category verified i figure i owe it to myself and the many others out there you maybe who have struggled over and over with your hairfurthermore now as of yesterdayi have the drivers licence photo to prove how awful my hair truly is and i get to carry it around with memy hair suffers from a bob cut  i impetuously performed this cut upon myself around 4 days ago in the middle of the night after watching 3 diy youtube videos on how to cut an asymmetrical bob by yourselfi watched these diys without sound as my husband was asleep and did not want to listen to me and my laptop as i taught myself silently how to systematically pursue with a vengeance my continual obsession with destroying my crowning glory  eg my hair by giving it no chance at all to look good because i went and cut a bob haircut to end all bob haircuts while the family was fast asleep at one am in the morningwhat does this have to do with christophe professional glossing shampoofor one thing i used it a day after i cut my hairi had wanted to wait and dye my hair but i never got around to that when i couldnt wait any longer i washed my hair with this shampoodespite the fact that my haircut is terrible and my new bangs fringe are bent all sideways as i seem to have a cowlick in them now that they are freakishly shortdespite the fact that our water pump to the house has run out of salt and therefore our water is not properly conditioned and is full of terrible rustdespite the fact that my hair is over processed to the point where i look like barbara streisand in that movie where she has a white persons afro the one with ryan oneal as the boxerdespite all these factschristophe professional glossing shampoo worked with my hair to make it the softest glossiest and un frizzy worlds most terrible hair it can benothing and no one can take my self awarded worlds worst hair record holding title from mehowever this shampoo which is very gentle and very high quality is hanging in there for meit is a good bubbly easy to rinse un drying un greasy very excellent shampoo so much so that i have hidden it from the three men who are members of my family who might want to try it toostay tuned for the further adventures of this reviewer who never ever learnsi shall keep trying to get perfect hair in all the wrong waysthanks to this christophe shampoo i have a part of the battle won fairly cheaplybest wishesjean

reviewText: i have naturally curly color treated midback length hair and i really like the way my hair is left feeling after using this conditioner  it squeezes out of the tube as thick as a paste and requires some working through my hands before applying  left on for about 34 minutes it seems to rinse clean but my hair is still left soft untangled and moisturized although it says its a daily conditioner i have been using it every other day and the results have still been great  the price is competitive with similar brands and i expect that i will be purchasing this as soon as my bottle runs out
summary: A thick, creamy, heavy duty conditioner

reviewText: i have been using this moisturizer for a few years now having previously used the neutrogena oil free moisturizer sensitive skin the ultra gentle soothing part is what got me as i tend to be really sensitive with facial care the moisturizer is very very light and unobtrusive and has a faint scent that is pleasant its a nice addition that it has an spf protection although i wish there was a higher one i havent had any problems with it and i use it daily under my makeupoverall a nice light moisturizer that you can use daily although i wish the spf count was higher

this is an excellent plumping serum as well as helping to reduce and fade sunspots and wrinkles i love the texture of this and it hydrates my skin so well this has helped me reduce the appearance of sun and age spots and i am so grateful i try very hard to care for my skin well and this product has been a major help i would definitely suggest this amazing product to use in your daily beauty routine to help soothe moisturize and repair your skin

reviewText: i use sally hansen diamond flash fast dry top coat after i have applied  creative nail  design stickey base coat  salon science instant artificials this is a nail strengthener  another coat of  creative nail design stickey base coat and fingernail polish color  diamond flash dries my polish quickly so i can apply a thick coat of my very favorite top coat  sally hansen mega shine nail treatment top coat  after applying the dffd top coat  i place my hands in my nail dryer for a while so i wont have any smudges  i put them back under the dry after applying the second top coat  mega shine nail treatment  this top coat is supposed to dry in 60 seconds to touch but seems to take longer  the following day i apply another thick coat of sally hansen mega shine nail treatment  this makes my nails shine and extends manicure to 6  8 days  i like the sally hansen diamond flash fast dry top coat and always use it in conjunction with sally hansen mega shine nail treatment top coat that prevents chipping and has a long lasting shine
summary: Very Good Top Coat -- Use With Another

i was every excited to try this item i have been experimenting with a variety of oils  products in the last year largely due to dry hair that was the result of silicone products i have 23 inches of healthy hair then 12 inches of siliconedamaged hair in a sense i am a good test caseunfortunately i dont have good news to reportfirst off i was expecting an argan oil product this is not an argan oil product instead its a silicone product which i immediately recognized by the slick feel and subsequently confirmed by ingredients the first 2 ingredients are silicone the third ingredient is argan oilsecond the scent of the product seems artificial  quite frankly cheap the scent reminds me of bonnie bells skin musk which women of a certain age can identify with it certainly is not a scent fitting for this price point admittedly i am a fragrance snob but that also means that i know what many niche  luxe fragrances smell like scents at this price point dont smell like this scents in the mass market smell like thislastly my results are mixed remember that healthy  damaged hair that i talked about well this product is great on the healthy hair it transforms it into shiny manageable hair however my siliconedamaged hair didnt respond very well to this silicone product and i tried this product a number of timespersonally i get much better results with other products oleorelax is a product which is half the price and always gives me a perfect hair day pure argan oil is about a quarter of the price and gives me better results finally the cheapest product of all  food grade coconut oil used before shampooing  consistently gives me glossy frizzfree hairthere are many products to experiment with i wouldnt put this product at the top of any list there are far too many good products out there at a fraction of the cost
summary: Silicone Product with some Argan Oil in it

reviewText: im not a self tanner kind of gal but i decided to try this  i have tried them in the past and hated them  i always had issues with it not looking natural on me  i tan very easily in the sun and my normal skin tone is on the darker side for a girl with blue eyes and blond hair  i really never burn in the sun so to find a self tanner that would match my shade of skin was always difficult  ive been using this a week now and i see a nice glow  it does not look orange or streaky or fake  it just gives you a nice tan glow  you still have to wash your hands after like the other products you probably have tried  there is a pleasant scent and it does not rub off  i workout and it doesnt streak or drip or anything  in a week of use i do look like i am sun kissed but not overdone where people would look at me and think i was nuts or fake  if youre looking for a nice subtle tanning product this may be the choice for you  it also makes my skin feel wonderfully soft

this product smells great and has a nice citrus scent  it doesnt lather great but if you use a wash cloth it will get the job done and wash away clean  i would buy it again for the right price and the price on amazon is much better than what it costs at whole foods or target

i found this serum to be rejuvenating and refreshing  as you can tell from the description it is loaded with vitamins and minerals and all that is good for your skin  i dont have sunspots or damaged skin but i do have a lot of dry skin on my face and i must say this serum worked really well to help moisturize my skin  i did have some bags under my eyes and this did definitely help to reduce those   i can imagine that this product would work wonders for those who are in the sun or use a tanning bed on a daily basis and it definitely helps with wrinkles  the serum is not sticky or greasy it only takes a few drops and it does not leave any residue which is awesome for me because i am not a fan of greasy products  and not only does this product work on your face but it works on the rest of your body as well  have stretch marks  this will help reduce them   the collagen in the product does a great job of making your cheeks look full and perfecti love that this product is allnatural and it doesnt have parabens or alcohol in it  no fillers just the good stuff  that is what we need to be using it may cost a bit more but it is worth it in the long run  plus they offer a one year money back guarantee  you cant beat that give it a try   i was not disappointed and i am sure you will not be either  i have never been a person that takes really good care of their skin  i dont use creams or moisturizers like i should but now that i am pushing 40 it is almost necessary  and i had heard a lot in the recent years about the discovery of hyaluronic acid being wonderful for your skin so i wanted to try it  hopefully this will help me stay younglooking and refreshed  so honestly what do you have to lose  maybe just a few wrinkles or sunspotsi received a complimentary product in exchange for an open and honest review  all opinions are my own

is it right for youi was shy at first thinking this wont look right on me  i immediately discovered in the first application that it looks natural if the color is somewhat close  it makes hair appear full or more full thats it fine dustthis is as fine as the kind of chalk dust that gets carried by a draft  if there is the slightest draft the dust will be carried by it instead of falling vertically environment to applyitll stick to hair best in an environment of low humidity  try not to apply in a steamed up bathroom after showering  but do it where theres no breeze or draft  if the humidity is averagetolow you wont see the dust on your hands or fingers afterwards how to apply on haircontrary to expectations you do not need to target only certain areas of the hair  i shake it over my crown and then run fingers through hair once or twice how many applications is in one containerive used only very small amounts and the container still looks as full as when i first opened it  it seems to me as if one container will last for 60 large applications and 100 modest applications

reviewText: i got this hoping it would have the same awesome fragrance as the suave professionals moroccan infusion shampoo conditioner and hair styling oil  however this 34dry34 body oil spray smells different and milder  not as goodas for the bottle the spray isnt like a mist or a wide pattern spray it comes out like a stream  which is okay since i prefer to dispense into my hand and then apply to my legs and arms if you spray directly onto legs youre likely to end up with some on the floor which makes it slippery  the bottle unfortunately looks exactly like the suave moroccan infusion hair styling oils bottle and theyre even the same size bottle  only the pump is slightly different  if you have both products on your bathroom counter and youre rushing to get ready at 5am i suggest you take an extra moment to make sure youve got the right bottle in your handthe oil itself doesnt have a 34dry34 feeling at all  its oily and heavy  some absorbs quickly but hours later i can touch my arm and i feel that oiliness  if youre looking for heavy duty moisture like this then thats a good thing  i prefer a 34dry touch34 which i was hoping for since 34dry34 is in the name of the product  this is not a dry body oil at all  first ingredient in the list is mineral oil and theres more fragrance than argan oil in this oil sprayits just okay  it is a fair price if you like the scent of it and need the heavy oily moisture that this provides

philosophy keeps winning me over one product at a time  their eyemakeup remover is a great product  gently removes waterproof makeup with little to no effortthere is also no regulated dripper on the bottle that most eyemakeup remover bottles have  the benefits to this are i can get the amount that i need onto a cotton pad quicker and i can easily transfer their product into travel bottles for airplane carry on i guess the negative to this would be using more product than you need but i have not found this to be the casethere is some oil in this eyemakeup remover  anything that removes waterproof makeup effectively has some amount of oil in the product  i have skin that can be acne prone and i have had no problems with this product  i always remove my eyemakeup first and then wash my face tone etcif you have sensitive eyes and find scrubbing makeup off at the end of the day irritates them then i highly recommend this productthanks for taking the time to read my review and i hope you found it helpful in making a purchase decision

taken from the review i wrote on the first batch i boughti have stopped going to a spa for facial probably in the last 2 years since the service of the one i went to had gone downhill coming across this full face mask at a price that is very reasonable what the heck why not try it even if its not good not too much damage in terms of money however one thing that you may be concerned is whether you would have allergic reaction to it i was concerned also as i have sensitive skin and toward the dry sidethe very first time i used it i did a home facial first  steam exfoliate and clean then i put on the mask but i leave it on my face while working on my computer by the time i realized its been on for an hour the instructions say to leave it on for 20 min the mask was sort of dry by that tme and my face felt tight after i lifted off the mask my face felt baby soft very nice and happy ive used 8 masks so far and no allergic reactions after all this timethe first week i used it 3 times then i slowed down to 2 times a week then 1 time a week ive learned some tricks now to get every drop of the essence and get my moneys worth i use it before i go to sleep at night now1 when i pull out the face mask folded in quarters its very wet so i wipe the excess on the edge of the mask over my face and neck first yes neck too2 then i unfold the mask and line it up to my face note itll be a little off because our faces all have different sizes just work with it3 i then lay in my bed either read or close my eyes4 after 45 min  1 hr my face feels tight signal for me the mask is dryingi take the mask off5 i cut open the pouch and scoop every drop out with my fingers and put it on my face and neck yes my neck againthe verdictnot only does my face feel soft the most dramatic difference i see is in the line crease across the front of my neck  used to be deep and obvious even when i stretched my neck straight up now of course its still there but its light and smooth versus all the little crosses along the crease due to dryness and slightly loose skin oh no im not a senior citizen yet recommendationhere ive put myself as guinea pig ive also gotten my sister and sisterinlaw trying it and buying it since you are reading this im recommending to you  yes you also be pampered and feel beautiful
summary: So good and I bought this second batch

i not only have sensitive skin but i also have oily skin thats prone to breakout easily  so i took a chance and decided on this makeup removing wipe as i needed something that worked all angles for my face  i have tried different name brand products but ive found a few broke me out and others didnt get all the makeup off  as a side note i am a lover of liquid eyeliner that does not like to leave my skin when im removing my makeup when i first opened the package i dont honestly know if it was just a faulty first wipe but the very first cleansing wipe was actually very dry  i tried my best to use it to get my makeup off but it was stubborn and my face was red and streaked with faint black lines when i finished so it still needed additional cleaningthe second time i tried using the product the wipe had more liquid in it and i found it a bit easier to get my makeup off  i still had to rub quite hard but it does work  my skin wasnt left feeling all that great as i felt the need to lather and rinse the residue off but i refrained just to see what the cetaphil wipe would do to my skin and luckily i found it left my face feeling soft and nice  no breakouts happened which is great  i will say this is the best for sensitive skin but if you are looking for a makeup remover wipe you might want to try something else unless you wear light makeup  i normally still use this and use a gentle face cleanser as well that also removes makeup  cetaphil gentle skin cleansing cloths are great also for an after workout wipe  i love to workout and found that its nice and cool on my skin as well as really cleans the sweat off my face before it has a chance to sink in and cause breakouts  its a very good product just not that awesome for makeup
summary: Nice and Gentle on my Sensitive Skin

i received this product in a box and bubble wrap unharmed i waited to write this review until i had used the product long enough that i seen results i like azurenaturals serums my friends have noticed the lines on my forehead have greatly diminished and have been asking what my secret was i told them i started using azurenaturals ultimate c it isnt irritating at all does not feel drying and i would feel a tightening of my skin within a few seconds after application i use the product on my face and neck and even under my eyes i let it dry which only take a few seconds then put my moisturizer on and sometimes makeup over it depending if i have things to do that day the lines around my lips and the lines on my forehead have diminished greatly and my face looks brighter my pores are even smaller which is great since my pores have been really big lately i think i look a lot younger than i am and im only 23  i have tried different vitamin c serums to see what one i liked the most and which one you get more out of for your buck i did some research on the ingredients in each of the serums i have tried i really like the consistency in azure naturals vitamin c the way it makes your skin feel and theres no smell plus the results you have after using it a couple of the serums i have tried i swear they are just water with maybe if even 2 vitamin c in it i also like that it can be a dropper or a pump i really love the pump it makes life so much easier when your in a rush just pump and go highly recommend for people women or men

i only just started using this but have noticed immediate results my skin looks vibrant and has a nice healthy glow i needed to purchase this to get rid of red blotches i got from using the neutrogena pore refining cleanser and it has already cleared them up in no time the red blotches on my face were so bad i was ready to make an appointment with a dermatologistnormally i use the neutrogena oilfree moisture as a facial lotion but it was a little too thick and greasy to use underneath makeup it made my face look too shiny i could only apply it at nighttime before bed this was the one product that worked perfectly for clearing up red blotchy skin and eveningout skin tone it goes on smooth and light and can easily be used underneath makeup without causing any oiliness it has extra moisturizing agents more so than the regular nuetrogena oilfree mousturizer and i have to use so much less of it for that reason i use in the morning for an instant glow when applied with my usual makeup providing the healthy looking glow that my skin was lacking

reviewText: i have a new skincare product that i think you are going to love called bonapiel beauty  youth serum that has hyaluronic acid vitamin c and msm as the top three ingredients in this super awesome serumi dont know about most of you but as i have gotten older it has been harder and harder for me to keep my face from losing the firmness that i used to have i really miss that so i am loving this new serum because it tones and firms the cheeks and the sides of my face where it looks like it has gotten the worse i love how the serum itself glides on very smoothly and absorbs well without leaving my skin looking like i have grease on it which is something i hatei have very dry skin so the moisture that it gives me along with plumping up of the fine lines and wrinkles has been an added bonus to helping me look somewhat better i am realistic and am not trying to look like my 30s but just want to be the best that i can be with what i have left i am sure my health situation hasnt made things easy on me either i probably lost a lot of what i had gained all of my life because it seems like it sure did happen awfully fast and i used to be religious about my nighttime and morning routines so it wasnt that i wasnt tryingyou will also get guaranteed results along with the satisfaction of knowing that its made right here in the united states has no parabens and wont leave your skin feeling greasy they have a 100 money back guarantee if you dont like the results so if you dont see any then get your money back cant beat that oh and this product usually lasts for about 18 months before it expires but you should be done with it by then

ive been using this cream for about a year now im 44 and due to an immune disorder i have vitiligo a very mild version of it meaning im still fairly pale but my skin is uneven and my face is darker than it used to be  i used to have peaches and cream skin irish german  italian heritage but when i moved to texas it seemed like my skin disorder was activated  anyway even tho growing up i wanted darker skin and tanned i grew up in long island as i got older i really realized the natural beauty of your true skin color well too late  about 12 years after running around lady bird lake here in austin i came home and my skin was a yellowish tint  it was almost as if id gotten a sunburn but it didnt really go away i immediately started to exfoliate as much as i could and did my best to stay out of the sun but long story short my skin was permanently darkened because my immune system was compromised  so back to this cream loreal has always been a good product and reasonably priced but i particularly like this cream because1 it feels very cooling and soft when it goes on2 no filmy feel to it on your skin3 i actually like that its a little heavy in the sense it can make my skin a little oily looking but i prefer that to dry and cakey looking4 its cheap5 it seems to help with my slight discoloration and does not add to my yellowish tone that i have acquireddo not get this product if you like your skin very matte or a bit dry  or if you get this  youll need foundationpowder  i dont use foundation powder  as much as i struggle with my skin color mostly i notice it  not too many others i dont like foundation  i like feeling natural and free with my skinoverall this is my favorite day cream
summary: Luxurious feel for a good price

reviewText: i got this to review through the amazon vine program  this is basically a medium to small sized duffle bag than can be stuffed into the side pocket to make it small and compact  the material is fairly thin so i am not sure how well this will wear over time  the bag is also pretty darn ugly the strips are a very bright orange redwhile i wont use this for traveling with just not big enough or durable enough it could come in handy to keep in the car for carrying miscellaneous stuff  it might also be useful to stuff in your suitcase so that you have an extra bag in case of emergency or in case you need something to carry sunscreen and a towel out to the beach inpros folds up compactly when folded up has a nice strap and clip to carry it withcons bright and loud colors it is pretty ugly looking in my opinion  you definitely wont be looking stylish with this on your arm small in size thin material doesnt fold up back into the pocket easily you have to kind of wrestle with iti wouldnt recommend this i think there probably nicer products out there

banana boat hawaiian tropic neutrogena and most sunscreens tested by consumer report are called chemical sunscreens not physical sunscreens consumer report does their tests on chemical formulas not physical formulas since those are inexpensive products i refer to consumer report when i am purchasing a table saw or a battery but never for anything related to my health since for that i refer to ewg zinc formula sunscreens will cost four times more are not sold in big box stores but it is the same concept as consuming processed food with chemicals since those chemicals are absorbed by the skin where physical sunscreen formula stays outside the skin read ingredients of anything that you apply to your skin just like you would be consuming inside the skinzinc oxide is a physical sunscreen rather than a chemical blocks both uva 320400 nm and uvb 280320 nm rays of ultraviolet light chemical sunscreens are less effective and carry unnecessary health risks zo is insoluble in water used in many industries in ointments creams and lotions nonirritating nonallergenic and noncomedogenic used by athletes as a bandage to prevent soft tissue damage during workouts zo must be non nano  uncoated ups 2 zo which has a mean particle size greater than 30nm when applied to the skin do not get absorbed into the body do not enter the bloodstream and are not a threat to human healthspf is a measure of how much longer someone will be protected from uvb rays than someone wearing no cream if the sun reddens unprotected skin in ten minutes for example a person wearing spf15 can be exposed to the sun without reddening for 15 times longer  150 minutes while uvb rays are behind the redness of sunburn uva rays damage the skins dna at a deeper layer both radiation types can cause skin cancer the eu recommendation is for sunscreens to offer a uva protection factor that is a third of their spfi make my own sunscreen as well as i purchase sunscreen for times when i do not have time to make any since i need to surf for that reason when i purchase a sunscreen mix i need the same formula as i use when i make my own organic sunscreen mix since it only requires few ingredients but for more protection like my nose i bump the zinc zinc is what you see surfers put on their nose for protection the more zinc the more protection but it means a mix that is more like a mud since zinc is a powder that i purchase and add to evco sunscreens are worse than processed foods which i never consume since there is no nutritional guide for sunscreens for a small investment sunscreens may offer me the possibility of avoiding sun burn pain cancer medical bills pain killers etc that come with exposure to the sun for that reason choosing a formula with the least amount of ingredients but high zinc oxide is the best solution a good sunscreen formula should not have more than a handful ingredients certified organic at least 95 and free of fragrances biologically harmful chemicals like avobenzone oxybenzone or uv chemical absorbers paraben phthalates paba and 14 dioxane

sneaky because it didnt work overnight or perform miracles but stop using it and seeusual routine olay wash olay 7 bare minerals powder foundation not anymore maybelline instant age rewind eraser concealer spot treatmaybe i didnt see much improvement bc i was focused on what it is supposed to do  the dark spots  which werent budging but i used the whole bottle because it was a fine moisturizer and didnt stink wasnt greasy i didnt break out and it didnt burn my eyes huge plus bc some always gets in my eyes i noticed my frown line was less well noticeable and my face seemed to be having a good phase i ran out and i returned to my usual olay 7 you can use both but for me that was begging for a breakout after a month my skin was going through a rougher phase suddenly i was spot treating parts id forgotten having had to daily actually needing foundationpowder all over the face again the overall look was less luminous the tone was unevener and generally my face didnt look so hot not horrible but needed way more work id forgotten about having to deal with this because the change had been gradual i guess figured well guess that youth code was doing something and it certainly was i returned to it and within a week the skin was luminous againso dark spots meh overall look yeah again no miracle but its nice to not yell gah in the mirror in the morning and needing only spot treatments  not foundation moisturizes very nicely spreads well and dries not greasy no breakouts safe eyes id say try it and finish the bottle before judging not much to lose if youve purchased it anyway and id say only you will notice bc you wont need as much covering up but i actually got a couple of comments on my skin looking healthier lately upon using it so it just might sneak up on you

reviewText: used to be a hair product junkie  have tried the high end salon brands to the lowest of low and have found that doves products consistently are very high quality for the price  my only real issue with dove has been some of their older products were over scented  love fragrance but theres a point where it becomes annoying  that said this leave on conditioner has a mild fragrance and smells like coconutmy recommendation is to apply this to your hair while its still fairly wet  its easier to detangle that way especially if you havent already used a conditioner while you were in the shower  applied say a nickel sized amount  my hair is fine but thick and below the shoulders  this product pleasantly surprised me  stuff is totally lightweight and definitely changed the texture of my hair making it smoother and manageable  as for the ingredients there is silicone and mineral oil which some may object to  also coconut oil which is fantastic for your hairmy hair while dry gets poop out on the day after shampooingconditioning can look dirty and limp  it didnt  but the real test was in the following days  here i am on day two after shampooing and my hair looks still clean and not weighed down at alldoes your hair get the droops  heres a very cheap and quick tip to remedy hair droop  sprinkle a little baking soda into your hand  fling your head over and drag said hand through your scalp and give it a little rub to distribute  flip head back and comb out  voila
