ive been flat ironing my hair for over 12 years and in that time ive tried quite the assortment of hair straighteners from high to low end and from a variety of different brands cheaper hair straighteners have never quite compared as their life span never seems as long my hair seems more prone to drying out with use and often ergonomically they just arent as comfortable to use currently im using thets2 millennium professional flat iron though i also have theremington s7210 wet 2 straight flat iron with soy hydra complex 1 inchthat i keep in my gym locker for straightening on the go i was excited to try this out because i flat iron frequently about 6x a week so i am always looking for something that will get my hair even straighter and with less damage this straightener appealed to me because i had never heard about nano technology before and was hopeful it might lead to sleeker silkier healthier hairto be frank i just dont think this is the straightener for me using it has made me realize how much i enjoy my existing straightener the ts2 millennium professional flat iron so much more  the first thing i noticed about the panasonic is how big it is compared to my existing iron for some reason the picture makes it look much slimmer and sleeker than it is in real life  it feels very bulky compared to my existing straightener and it made it much less comfortable to use i have a lot of thick hair that falls just below my shoulders so it can take me a good 30 minutes to an hour to flat iron my whole head and i found that it felt uncomfortable to use it for that long and my hand was a little sore after a problem ive never experienced with my existing iron  the bulky shape also made it a little harder to maneuver and i definitely felt i couldnt be as nimble with this design wise i also like that on my ts2 iron the tip is designed such that it is easier to flat iron all the way to the roots  it is more rounded on the end and there is less of a gap between the end of the heated plate and the plastic iron  i really missed that feature on the panasonicawkward design aside the aspect i enjoyed least about this iron is the range of temperatures  i do like that you are able to control the temperature and i think the temperature read out looks very slick compared to other flat irons ive used  however the highest temperature 395 degrees f apparently isnt hot enough to flat iron my hair  when i was using this for the first time i couldnt figure out why this iron couldnt seem to get my hair as straight as the ts2 and why i seemed to need to go over each strand more times  then in comparing the irons i realized that the ts2 goes all the way up to 450 degrees f  apparently that extra 55 degrees makes a big difference for my hair if my hair wasnt so thick or long i wouldnt mind having to go over each section of hair more times but for me it makes my morning routine substantially longer  also i am trying to grow my hair out and my stylist has told me that my frequent flat ironing has slowed my hair growth and that i should really only be going over each section once and that is definitely not possible with this ironas far as the benefits from the nanoe i do feel like my hair is slightly softer when i use this product vs the ts2 but it is not a huge difference and it is hard for me to tell if that is really the result of nano or ironing my hair at a lower temperature this exercise made me realize im willing to sacrifice a little bit of softness in my hair in order to get it straighter and spend less time flat ironing ive also found that using a flat iron with good hair products helps a lot to combat the drynessthe other thing im curious to observe about this iron is its longevity  in my years of straightening my hair that has been one of the biggest differences between more expensive and less expensive irons  cheaper ones seem to die more quickly making them actually a more expensive proposition in the long runoverall i just havent been a fan of this iron  for my needs the ts2 has been a much better fit  however i think someone who typically flat irons their hair on a lower temperature and likes the feel of a larger iron would likely enjoy this more than i did however even for someone whose needs are different than my own im struggling to understand why this should command a price so much higher than reputable irons like chi which i have also owned in the past  the purchase price is more than ive ever spent on a flat iron in my 12 years of flat ironing my hair and while i am willing to spend more on hair styling tools that truly make a difference like my t3 hair dyer with this iron im failing to see a difference that commands a higher purchase price  its possible this is the kind of product where you will notice the effects more over time however because it just doesnt work for my needs i dont see myself using it regularly enough to realize thesei dont recommend this for long thick hair but it might be better for another hair type
summary: Less than ideal for my hair needs

i used up this tube of bb body cream in 5 days of use although i am very pale i chose the 34darker skin tone34 variety because i have numerous old bug bites and scratches that have left permanent dark marks on my legs i was curious to see if this cream would make a difference while my skin feels great i see no difference in skin tone variations at allthe result of 5 days of use was skin that feels silky not greasy with a very mild pleasant fragrance there is no shimmer or glow to my eye while this cream is slightly tinted in the tube it goes on transparent i cant tell if the varieties for skin tone are a marketing ploy or actually intended to function differently i cant speak for anyone else but this would seem to have no benefit based on skin color alonei liked the product but would not buy it based upon price it is a superior feeling body lotion that does not impart any significant improvement upon skin tone variations as it would appear to claim

reviewText: this was the first dandruff shampoo i ever tried one bottle lasted me over a year because i only shampoo with this once or twice every week when i finally used it all up i decided to try head and shoulders because i didnt want my hair smelling like sulfur anymore after 2 weeks of using head and shoulders my scalp started itching like crazy i was afraid i had lice but that wasnt the case my head started itching again because head and shoulders did nothing to control my dandruff after that i bought selsun blue but that didnt help i then bought coal tar shampoo but that didnt help either i finally bought this nasty smelling jason shampoo again and after a week the itching had finally went away after trying literally almost every dandruff shampoo on the market this jason dandruff shampoo is the only one that works for methe active ingredients in this shampoo include sulfur and salicylic acid both of which are known for controlling dandruff the downside to putting sulfur in your hair is that it smells really bad i suggest using a conditioner with fragrance after applying the shampoo to minimize the smell also if you have never used this shampoo before i suggest using it every other day for the first 2 weeks after that you can start using it once every week like me and it does a perfect job of preventing the dandruff itch from coming back it is important to remember to leave the shampoo in your hair for about 2 minutes before rinsing it out to let it do its job
i use this product in combination of other products to make a hair grease that keeps my hair soft and moisturized i would recommend this product to everyone

reviewText: honestly i8217ve been more suspicious of marketing buzzwords after seeing george carlin8217s bit on advertising 8220old fashioned  it8217s supposed to take you back to the good ole days when grandma used to cook 8230 back when botulism was still considered a sauce8221  8220professional8221 and 8220infusion8221 are two of those marketing words in my opinion that make things seem way more serious and advanced than they really are  suave professionals moroccan infusion body lotion is one of those products that sounds groundbreaking but doesn8217t deliver any real magic 8230 at least no more than any other suave body lotionmoroccan infusion does a good job of temporarily smoothing and softening skin  i found the lotion to be thinner and less greasy than i had expected  the scent more subtle than anticipated was not particularly unique  this product works fine as a postshowerprebed skin treatment but may not be powerful enough for those with severely dry skin especially on their hands while professionals may use the product and i am assuming 8220argania spinosa kernal oil8221 is the 8220moroccan8221 elixir being 8220infused8221 along with other greasy softeners like sweet almond oil coconut oil and shea butter this product is a decent standard body lotion with an overlysophisticated name  plus i8217m always a little skeptical of the rush to add ingredients with 8220healing8221 qualities to every product on the market 8230 rip mr carlin

this is my best kept secret to soft supple skin i use it in combination with a gycolic acid peel i double up on application of hualuronic acid for about 4 to 5 days after a peel and then coat with pure vitamin a oil instead of a petroleumbased product that causes clogged pores and breakouts which estheticians and dermatologists recommend after certain procedures  tsk tsk naughty professionals i also use this as my daily mositurizer i have oilyacne prone skin and this is the only i repeat only product that mositurizes my skin without leaving it greasy or a film thus it doesnt contribute to my breakouts and since ive been using this product ive ditched my oil of olay eye cream which does work btw but so does the hualuronic acid so why have both loloh also i put this on immediately after i clean my face with cetaphil gentle skin cleanser while its still moist doing this seems to lock in additional moisture and controls my face from overproducing oil i wash my face with this cleanser and moisture about three times a day 8am 3pm and bedtime if im out in the sun a lot i wash my face midday because after reapplying spf 85 my face feels a little heavydirty but days of limited sun exposure its just in the morning and then at bedtimebottom line those with oily skin are constantly battling their oil which a lot of products and regimens either leave it too greasy or extremely strip of all moisture have you ever had a dry oily face lol yup then it starts to crack and wrinkle in the dry areas while the oily areas are still an oilslick i think this product works really well with oily skin and the areas that were starting to crackwrinkle are now supple and lines gone and the greasy areas are evento put things in perspective here are my stats32 yo black female with caramel complexion so darken marks from acne is easily visible on my skin extremely oily skin battled acne since teens but became worse in my 20s and required 6 months of accutane among other things ive tried just about every otc and rx on the market for acne and about a third of treatments for acne scar revision mainly because most dermatologist arent experienced with cosmetic procedures and treatment for ethnic skin news flash we dont all keloid currently live in cal which is dry used to live on east coast where it was much more humid and my skin hated it workout 3 to 4 days a week and drink about 65 onces of water a day more on days i workout i also take lots of vitamin b a e and etc for my skin
summary: A must have in any skincare regimen!

reviewText: i have waist length very straight hair and my daughter has midback length wavy hair both of us tried this on our hairit gets very hot in fact there is an attached tag that says it can burn eyes im not sure how youd burn your eyes with it but it does get hot quicklyits a styling wand so there is no clip to deform curls you wrap your hair starting at the widest point on the wand down the wand to the narrow end and hold the end of your hair on the nonheated end of the wand for a count of 510 to curl your hair the size and shape of the curl is dependent on how much hair you usesince my hair is so long i used small sections and the curls came out spiraled and tighter at the bottom than at the top like a natural curl my daughter used larger sections and wound up with lots of bounce wave and volumei like the swivel base both of us are lefties and had few issues with the cord getting in our way similarly the controls werent a problem eitheri found it easier to use without the glove just holding the hair to the nonheated tip after wrapping my daughter prefers using it with the gloverecommended but there is a learning curve if youre more used to clamp style curling irons

absolutely love these i have bought several in order to swatch my ever expanding nail polish collection and found that they work fine with both regular polish and gel polish alikethe fact that these swatch sticks are clear is awesome  i have used one entire set just to swatch various topcoats by doing this i can easily stack swatches one on top of the other in order to see exactly what a certain top coat will look like over a certain nail polishone of the best bits of advice that i can offer is to paint the underside of the swatch sticks as opposed to the top by doing so you will avoid the polish chipping off after time and also painting the underside makes it easy to tell what matte polishes will look like when topcoated simply by looking either at the bottom or the top of the swatchi did end up taking the bolt out and replacing it with a large binder ring in order to make it a bit easier for me to arrange them to my liking and add new swatch sticks in when necessary this worked perfectly and i am very happy with my newly swatched collection
summary: Perfect for swatching your nail polish collection!

reviewText: i needed a new dryer and bought this based on reviews and the price  i am africanamerican with natural 4abtyped hair and my hair is long about 2 and 12 inches from my elbows  my hair is also very thick and coarse  i usually do not blow out my hair but every once in a while i like to see how long my hair has gotten  i used this on damp hair in small sections about 14  it was weird to use at first but once you finish a section you get the hang of it  i used it on tension setting 4 i used it on setting 1 the first time and it did rip some of my hair out but that was my fault  i passed through a section twice on the low setting then once on the high setting slowly  three passes on each section and my hair was nice and straight  not bone straight only a flatiron will do that for my thick hair  once finsihed i passed the dryer through my hair on the cool setting  it took about an hour remember this was my first time and i went slow  i liked my results  there wasnt a burnt smell to my hair and my hair really was smooth  my hair was also relatively shiny compared to other methodsappliances i have used  my hair had body and wasnt limplooking  read the instructions and tipswatch the video  i would recommend this product  i only gave it 4 stars because it is a little awkward at first
summary: Good dryer for African-American, natural hair

i have read with amusement some of the reviews of this soap  how complicated they seem to feel washing ones hair to be34oh it will dry my hair oh it will dry my scalp you have to mix it with something else34  maybe im just too dense to understand or because im a man i dont get it  ive used this soap  thats this soap nothing added no magic blending with something else  and i cannot in all my 81 years and yes ive been blessed to still have a full head of hair remember my hair looking or feeling as soft silky and shiny as this soap leaves it  perhaps im doing something wrong  i first hook my spray head to the hose on my sink  next i wet my hair with pleasantly warm water  then in my left hand i take the bar of soap and rub it over my hair  it makes a great lather  i rub the soap into my hair and using my finger tips really get it down onto my scalp  i use my spray to rinse off my hair  if my hair doesnt squeak when i rub my hands over it i soap it up a second time rub rinse and towel it off  i comb it and let it dry as i go about my daily duties  i do this about every 4 days or more often if i do something that gets it dirty like plastering or tossing hay  my scalp doesnt itch anymore either i neglected to say i had been having trouble with itchingill continue to buy this stuff as long as i need it  oh yeah i do use it to wash my face and the rest of me as well  the smell btw is very light but pleasant

ive edited this review several times i just didnt know how to use it at first now that i do its one of my favorite things ive ever bought on amazon i use it every 2 or 3 days for 20 to 30 seconds thats less than a minute per week less than an hour in an entire year and all for one low price i was gone for thanksgiving for 5 days and forgot to bring it but when i got home and used it again there had been very little hair growth its just the usual little mustache that we women grow especially after menopause yes it hurt a little the first time but now that its just tiny hairs its nothingnow that ive learned how to use this correctly i absolutely love it it does hurt a little the first time so i used an ice cube briefly to numb the area dried my skin well then proceeded someone mentioned it will rust so ive been very careful to keep it dry now i use it for a minute or so every 23 days before the hair has a chance to grow in it does get every single little hair so theres no problem getting the tiny new growth and it doesnt hurt at all at this point its extremely easy to use now that ive learned how just bend it as in the picture turn  the ends inward together and it will move up your skin grabbing every hair on the way i dont even need a mirror i have sensitive skin but have no irritation at allwaxing is messy and you have to let the hair get long enough to work it never got it all either depilatories burn my skin before theyve removed any hair i wish id found this years ago but from now on this is the only kind of hair remover i will use i dont know why it says it lasts 6 months to a year maybe because it will fill up with hair but it seems you could stretch it a bit briefly and blow it out one last reason to love myspring it its cheapthis is the 3rd time ive edited this review i gave it 3 stars at first because i wasnt using it right as there are no instructions included thats still my only con but its a big one i had missed the part about the video
summary: my last review, more than 5 stars, I LOVE IT!!

when i was offered to sample this product the timing could not be more perfect i had been fighting a sinus infection for two weeks and was at my wits end i was taking medicine which helped relieve some of the pain but the pressure was intensewhen i received mine i removed the band which is elastic and washed it by hand with dish soap i then put it in the freezer i know you are supposed to wait two hours but i was impatient and tried it before it was cold enough i placed it on my eyes and it felt so good the pressure finally was getting some relief it is wonderful to sit on the sofa and cover your eyes you can even pull it over your forehead and it feels good therethis thing has been used several times a day in my household it serves so many purposes though when i was sick growing up my mother would get me a cold washcloth to place on my forehead it felt like heaven i in turn do the same with my daughter however this will be replacing that tradition still ill a few days ago i decided to place this on my forehead as i lay in bed with a fever this was a lifesaver to me it felt so good on my forehead and my eyesif you have puffy eyes this is also a great thing to use just place it over your eyes and the swelling will go downi have not tried the heat part of it yet for the cool part it has served so many purposes where i live it has been in the mid 908217s the last few days i have found myself coming in the house and putting this mask on my head and it instantly cools me down i used to turn the air conditioning up but use this mask insteadso many uses and very easy to clean if you do not have one of these in your household i recommend getting one good luck not fighting over it though

i use these caps after applying conditioners to my hair to seal in the product and heat from my body i also apply this cap after applying a pre poo treatment to my hair these are quality caps and quite a bargain for the price i will definitely repurchase again

i live in vegas where the sun can be brutal  i had just gotten a haircut and was doing yard work and the back of my neck was exposed and i got a nice burn  i put on the the lotion and instantly felt some relief  i typically use aloe that i cut from the plant and this was much better  i felt that it really took my neck from fire engine red to a more pleasant pink  will continue to keep a tube in the medicine cabinet

ive only tried the spy who loved me and goldeneye but the colors so far are good enough for their price instead of blindbuying the spy who loved me i decided to buy the mini set to see what i liked the spy who loved me is a glittery classic red and goldeneye is a shimmery transparent gold before buying a mini set i watched a few youtube videos on sample swatches and looked up some swatch images goldeneye is a pretty cute color with nicely sized golden glitters but its definitely not all its hyped up to be in my opinionthis would be five stars if it werent for the fact that this nail polish chips very easily out of my entire box of nail polish these chip the worst i did not apply a protective nail polish so two coats of the spy who loved me and goldneye have already chipped badly in two days my forever 21 nail polish which cost me 2 which is less than half the price of an opi bottle does not chip half as quick as these nail polishesmaybe its just this particular set but either way i probably will not be buying the full sized bottles the colors are cute and im a james bond fan but the nail polishes are lackluster from what ive seen the nice colors dont really make up for the huge tendency of the polishes to chip
summary: Very nice colors but chips easily

reviewText: i am giving two stars because the color is good and doesnt have the tacky shimmer like some other bronzers that look a little 34stripperish34 but the product itself does not go on well and doesnt blend it almost smears and gunks up i have found that too faced chocolate soleil matte bronzer is much better the color is just right especially for my pale irish skin and the texture is very light and blends easily if you are using this to contour like i am you definitely need to be able to blend so you dont look like a paint by number i also wasnt a fan of the packagingcheap cardboard and doesnt stay closed

while i really wanted to love this product  im afraid i couldnt tell any difference in my skin after using it  after about a month or so the liquid turned a very deep yellowbrown color with a slight rancid smell so i stopped using it  i was using it twice daily with my highend skin care regimenthe product claimed to have a highly concentrated serum that packs a punch against aging this ultimate formula contains the highest quality ingredients that are clinically proven to tighten plump and diminish lines and wrinkles  i saw none of thisim a skincareproduct snob and i had very high expectations after reading the raving reviews  apparently my skin is not damaged enough to see the effects this product claims to offer  it didnt harm my skin so im at least happy about thati would not recommend this product to my friends or family  however im glad others have received good results from it  i just happened to be one of those who didnt

first a caveat  those on amazon vine are required to submit their review within 30 days  an appropriate and understandable request  however in the case of rexaline hydradose their claim is that the most dramatic such as a significant reduction in lines and wrinkles and significant improvement in firmness and elasticity occur after 8 weeks  so quite obviously i cant address those issues i can say that after a bit over 3 weeks im well pleased with the hydration achieved by am and pm usefurther the product applies easily and is a perfect palette for makeup  it absorbs quickly into the skin with no signs of greasiness  in addition i like the slim pump container that has a clear strip on the side so you can see how much of the product youve used  as very little is needed for complete coverage and from the appearance of the clear strip id guess the 169 oz  container would last about six monthsthe directions recommend that the hydradose be used in tandem with the rexaline hydraforce  please note that according to the description enclosed with the product the excellent results claimed after 8 weeks are dependent upon the use of both products  another caveat while i know zip about manufacturing any skin care treatment i am always leery of a product that does not produce the desired results on its own but recommends using an additional oneie buying something else  thats simply my personal reaction  not based on any trial or evidencebottom line is i would recommend rexaline hydradose for use as an excellent moisturizer

im a male 35 male with normal hair that has thinned a bit as ive aged but i not balding or anything my hair isnt real thick anymore though i got a sample of this conditioner the older product moisture scentsation i liked it so much i had to buy this 33 ounce big bottle of conditioner and shampoo the conditioner is slightly less potent than the previous product it replaced moisture scentsation but with all the  extra amount you get for the cheaper price you can still get the same effect by using a bit more conditionerit smells super minty and makes your head tingle love it the best part is when you dry your hair it falls perfectly with no residue on it other conditioners made my hair feel and look weighed down like it was coated too heavily but not this stuff it is awesome and worth every pennyi would have given this a 5 star review if it were just as good as potent as the conditioner it replaced the abba moisture scentsation but it is still greatbiolage used to be my favorite shampoo and conditioner until i got the abba moisture shampoo and conditioner especially for normal or fine hair if you use the shampoo and conditioner your hair will come out like silk and lay perfect with no weighed down residue feeling after a blow dryone note i will make is that this is a new replacement product for the smaller more potent and expensive abba moisture scentsation shampoo it is only a little less potent you may have to use a bit more to get the same effect but its worth the cost savings if youre not rich if you are rich get the older slightly better products here before they are gone they got discontinued from what i understand due to this product replacing ithttpwwwamazoncomabbamoisturescentsationshampooconditionerdpb001daukg0refsr1fkmr01sbeautyieutf8qid1361383065sr11fkmr0keywordsabbamintscentsationshampoo
summary: Super Minty scent, Scalp Tingling, and turns hair to Silk!

reviewText: i love sonia kashuk brushes sold at target but i needed smaller brushes for my eyebrows i saw the write ups on amazon so i decided to buy these bambu series these brushes are awesome my make up goes on great it is easy to contour my eyebrows with these brushes i would definitely buy this buy this brand again it was a great price for a great set of sturdy and useful makeup brushes

i am always reading how important it is to exfoliate your skin so i was trying to find a product long enough for me to reach down my backi have had regular back scrubbers but was told by my dermatologist that they carry a lot of bacteria  the answer  disposable scrub pads so you can start new when you need to  very smart idea although it is not inexpensivethere is a long plastic stick with 2 sharp prongs on it that gets installed inside the pad  when you are done using it you just pull it off dispose of it and put a clean pad onthese pads work very well on your back but you can also use them on your legs and arms  it does a fantastic job of exfoliating and removing the dead skin  the pads really hold up very well  the only downside i have seen is i think the brush could have been a but more sturdy and a couple inches longer  none the less i still recommend this product

my skin glows after i use this mask i noticed it right away and after the very first use i absolutely love how my skin looks and feels afterwards after using my other mask though my skin is soft and clean i dont notice any obvious changes in my skin tone this mask brightens your skin and evens out your complexion immediately its very good i highly recommend this

reviewText: no complaints whatsoever with this product spray can works like a charm goes on easily rubs in quickly and is watersweatproof just as advertised the scent isnt very strong but i prefer unscented stuff whenever i can get it but compared to other sunscreens ive tried the smell isnt too bad i would definitely recommend this product

reviewText: smells sooo good lasts me a long time leaves my hair soft and the ingredients are amazing i will for sure repurchase again and again  love the price as well and the fact that i can travel with this

ok so i tried this a few years ago and gave it a thumbs down well im now 50 and in need of some light coverage instead of the more heavy coverage i needed before a little background on me im half japanese olive toned oily t zone area and slight chin acne off and on ive been using everyday minerals but its making my skin appear rough and too 34made up34 for my liking i did try bb cream skin79 hot pink but the color was too light and i am having to mix with another foundation to get a good color while i looking around i came across this stuff in my old make up bin thought id try it again well it really does a great job of evening my skin out and keeping my natural skin color this a big plus it is really hard to find a good olive color and i tan quite well in the summer and pale out in the winter its really a pain for me to find the right color going back and forth mixing colors this works no matter how dark or light i am i also struggle with some large pores on my t zone area this stuff really helps in that dept a lot though my pores are still there they are no longer noticeable and i no longer have to use a pore primer the only thing i use is a light under eye concealer underneath and spot treatment on my chin and then brush it on another great thing is that this has great staying powerreally keeps the oiliness at bay  i really need that living in texas its cheap but not that easy to find but its big tub so i would imagine it will last a good long time the smell if not offensive to me at all its nice girly smell not like sulfur or something like that so im changing my mind for now this is what works for me

updated review may 15 2014after 3 months of use the flatiron stopped working i would turn it on but it would not heat up i contacted the company by email and three days later they replied instructing me to return the iron and they would send me a new one as soon as they received iti mailed the iron on march 21 five weeks later may 1st i had not received a replacement so i again emailed the company no reply sent another email on may 8th no reply on may 14th i received as a replacement a different model flatiron thets2 hybrid professional styling iron it is a very basic flat iron with none of the features digital auto shutoff dual voltage of the 3monthold millennium that i returned i checked the company website and the millennium no longer appears on their product page  perhaps it has been discontinued i dont know because there was no explanation for the substitution and my emails went unansweredi understand that a product can be defective i liked the millennium flat iron and originally rated it 4 stars if the company had stood behind their warranty and replaced the defective iron my review would have remained at 4 stars however i no longer have a millennium flat iron mine lasted 3 months and then died i appreciate that a replacement flat iron was eventually sent but the customer service experience should be better than thisas much as i liked the original flat iron i can no longer recommend buying it because if it breaks you may not get a replacementoriginal review  4 stars january 6 2014the ts2 millennium flat iron is replacing a chi that i have been using for the past five years but has now stopped workingthe ts2 has a nice shape with a rounded tip and thin design making it easy to style my short frizzy hair it heats up fast and in about 30 seconds it was ready to usea few things to notethe flat iron defaults to 180c every time i turn it off i want the heat at 200c so i need to remember to turn it up each time i use it a small annoyancethe dual voltage for international use is nice to have but the downside is a much thicker cord that is a little more clunky to use than the flat lighter weight 110only type cord it took a few weeks to get used to itthe side edge of the plastic outer casing gets quite hot i have short hair and have to be very careful not to brush my neck when getting close to the hairline my old chi had an outer housing that stayed cool to the touch and i miss that safety featureoverall i am happy with the way the ts2 styles my hair and if it lasts five years like my last iron i will be thrilled

reviewText: the remington s9620 silk ceramic flat iron heats quickly lightweight and buttons that allow for the temperature to go hotter or cooler its a good straightener you definitely should have product used in conjunction with the straightener unlike other more expensive ceramic flat irons it doesnt work immediately at dealing with the frizz even if you take small portions of hair my hair is course and thick and long but ive used other flat irons that worked better on my hair without so much product to ease the frizz and give my hair the silky appearancedecent enough though if you need something for shorter finer hair
summary: Nice Features... especially if you have thin hair.

reviewText: got these for my goddaughter she is really into nail design so i bought her a bunch of items from this seller because the prices were so great going to put it all together and give her a nail design kit for christmas these are cute and i think seh will be very creative with them but i wish each container was fullerthere are not that many in each tub

i bought this because i wanted to try some fun nail art and this seemed like the perfect set of dotting tools i really love the design of these and the fact that both sides of the dotting pens can be used although they are different sizes as far as price these cant be beatas far as quality my only qualm is that when i was doing my sisters nails it was my first time using on of the dotting pens and the metal tip the whole metal piece that has the 34dot34 sphere at the end came right out of the pen base the clearpink middle section i am just going to superglue it back in but it makes me wonder if this will happen to the other ones in any case in any case this is not a deal breaker for me because i dont mind that i will reglue it back ini would recommend to someone looking for a nice compact set of dotting tools

ive been doing the red thing on and off for ten years now this hair color is my favoritei have naturally mousybrown hair but when i dont color it red i color it black this means that when its time to go back to red i have to bleach it i bleach it until it turns orangeishred so im coloring over hair very similar to the color in the box still i dont come out like a koolaidheaded punk or eightyearold this past time i had to color twice because i missed a giant patch how why i used two full applications back to back two days in a row and though the color looked deeper it didnt look unnatural at all i was very impressedon me this hair color comes out looking anywhere from a rich auburn to a justcolored pomegranate color depending on the light and yes i know those are two other hair color shades by this company my hair never looks like the hair on the front of the boxthe most important thing in selecting a hair color is to look not at the model on the front of the box but at the swatch of hair closest to yours on the before and after chart that will give you the best idea of how hair color will look on you  because guess what results vary the color is the same but it can look very different on different peopledetails about the product you mix the hair color with a packet of grapeseed oil which i think smells heavenly and shake to mix the color will thicken and become pretty easy to apply although it may gloop or drip the conditioner comes in a packet and really helps seal in the color youll need to rinse well and dont be surprised if the next couple of times you wash your hair you see a red tinge to the water after this happens your hair should look even more naturalif you get it on your skin it will come off easily even if its on your skin the whole 25 minutes you color its even washed out of a white tshirt i have who knew all in all this is the right shade of red for me and the product is easy to use and very affordable

this had such huge potential so much to like about this product the low price the great sharpener thats included i love the depth of the dark brown color and i love how beautifully it applies  no tugging or skipping smudges easily during application for a natural or smokey look unfortunately even with primer urban decay primer potion is my fave this stuff smears all over the place on me within a few hours i have hooded lids and it ends up all over my upper lid and also smudges below my lower lashes for the raccooneye look bummer ended up throwing it out after trying it five times
summary: Lovely at first but smudges like crazy

i was sent some coppertone for both kids and babies which is perfect because jace is 6 months and sophia is 6 years old i love that these are both tear free and have an spf of 50 the higher the spf the higher the protection with how dangerous sun rays are having a good protection for my children is important to me as far as the scent goes it smells like your typical sunscreen but not quite as strong so its pretty close to fragrance free but not 100 free of fragrance i guess is the best way to put it the sunscreen lotion comes out of the bottle easily and appears similar in texture and viscosity to your average chemical sunscreen lotion water babies pure  simple sunscreen does take a little extra rubbing to apply and is a tad 34chalky34 to spread onto your skin depending upon how much you rub there may still be a tinge of a white ghostly appearance but this did not bother me water babies pure  simple sunscreen dries on your skin after application and does not leave a 34sticky34 or 34greasy34 feeling as is the case with some physical block sunscreens as far as having any dry skin i did not notice this also it was not obvious that water babies pure  simple sunscreen is water resistant as is visually apparent with some of the other physical sun blocks i have tested with other water resistant physical block sunscreens water has beaded on our skin which did not occur with water babies pure  simple sunscreen i am not suggesting the sunscreen is not water resistant like it claims but merely that i was unable to confirm their claims in any visual manner this sunscreen has been tested by the ewg and they rate it well because it protects the skin like it is suppose to many sunscreens do not it does absorb but it takes about 20 minutes overall i think both lotions are great we followed the directions and while we did still tan no burns occurred and im the type to burn easily

reviewText: this product is working well for my daughter and her sensitive skin  she used to break out in rashes and weird skin bumps and especially around her ears until we visited the dermatologist and he recommended this product  my daughters skin has cleared up and the shampoo works well to cleanse her hair gently without scents or harsh chemicals  the smell isnt has fun as all the kids products out there to choose from but really there is no scent to note  i highly recommend to others suffering from sensitive skin  weve used it as bath wash in a pinch too  works fine
a great selection of colors  the glosses are shiny and moisturizing and unflavored which i like  for the price these stand up to any of the glosses that sell for twelve dollars and up per gloss

wonderful product i use it ever week to treat my hair and allow it to heal from what damage i put it from my styling products heating tools etc this product does what it says and i am glad got one  it makes my hair feel so soft and adds a great shine

ill be honest i didnt expect much out of this whole light therapy thing after all you look at it and no heat or anything is felt from it you simply see the led lighting you can keep it in an on going mode or have it pulse you can also change out the colors doesnt sound like anything too special except maybe a fancy flashlight right that was my initial thought of it as well the brighttherapy is light weight and very easy to use it also comes with an instruction book to follow as to using the light therapy properly so you dont harm your skin the way the lights work are stop acne with the high power blue led light reduce hyperpigmentation  varicose veins with green led light fight wrinkles and aging with red and infrared led lightfor the little bit of acne i had i went ahead with the 24 minute treatment of the blue light for a week just to see if anything changed maybe its coincidental but i saw my acne had reduced it didnt 100 go away but it reduced which is a good sign to me also it lasts once you start getting results they dont go away the longer you use the therapy the better the results are of course by longer i mean by using it every day for the treatments  not longer than instructed in the instructions also another thing i noticed was my face was less oily i dont generally have high oily skin but my face is slightly more oily than normal and this regiment helped out with that as well so as you can see i got some positive results and hoping to see further improvement as i go along with it i can definitely say its on my recommended list

i have combination skin parts of my face get really dry during the winter while other parts stay a little oily and tend to break out  usually by november with the furnace running and all that i get horrible dry patches but this cleanser has kept those at bay  im in love with itit smells nice and has a nice texture and it doesnt irritate my sensitive skin at all  however it does tend to overmoisturize my oilier areas so i would suggest making sure you use a toner on any oily spots after washing your face with this  if you have oily skin id probably not recommend this product  but its absolutely awesome for dry skinim also very pleased that its great for removing makeup  some face cleansers just dont do the job and i end up having to basically wash again after i get out of the shower  with this one i washed off foundation and eyeshadoweyeliner and had nothing left on my face  i did a toneronacottonpad test and had absolutely no makeup or dirt come off on the padi would definitely recommend this product to anyone who has trouble with very dry skin  its amazing and ill definitely be keeping this on hand in the future

i totally agree with lotion in the winter as the heat in most hotels that i stay in dries my skin so badly i put this on right after i shower while my skin is still a little damp as to lock in the moisture feels so good i can get through the day without that itchy winter skin
summary: The Only Lotion for Dry skin......
